column5: Admitted terrorist gives grisly details of Mumbai attacks and plot against Danish newspaper in federal trial against Chicago businessman - chicagotribune.com
column6:
![ ][1]

Qnivq Pbyrzna Urnqyrl'f cnffcbeg unf orra ragrerq vagb rivqrapr va gur H.F.
tbireazrag gevny ntnvafg Puvpntb ohfvarffzna Gnunjjhe Enan. Urnqyrl nqzvgf uvf
ebyr va greebevfg cybgf naq vf pbbcrengvat jvgu gur tbireazrag naq grfgvslvat
ntnvafg Enan.  (  Znl  24  , 2011  )

Ol Naavr Fjrrarl, Gevohar ercbegre

9:09 c.z. PQG  ,  Znl 24, 2011

Nsgre fcraqvat gjb lrnef fpbhgvat bhg gnetrgf sbe Cnxvfgnav greebevfgf jub
hayrnfurq gur qrnqyl [ Zhzonv nggnpxf ][2] va Abirzore 2008, [ Qnivq Pbyrzna
Urnqyrl ][3] jngpurq gur pneantr hasbyq sebz nobhg 1,000 zvyrf njnl ba uvf
gryrivfvba va Ynuber.

  
"V jnf cyrnfrq," ur pnyzyl gbyq n srqreny whel Ghrfqnl bs gur oybbql vzntrf
sebz gur gjb-qnl nggnpxf gung yrq gb gur qrngu bs 164 crbcyr, vapyhqvat fvk
H.F. pvgvmraf.

[ Qnivq Pbyrzna Urnqyrl ][3]

Urnqyrl, jub unf cyrnqrq thvygl gb uvf ebyr va gjb vagreangvbany greebe cybgf,
fubjrq yvggyr gb ab rzbgvba ba uvf frpbaq qnl nf n fgne jvgarff va gur srqreny
gevny bs Gnunjjne Enan, n Puvpntb ohfvarffzna jub vf nyfb punetrq jvgu
fhccbegvat gur [ Zhzonv ][8] nggnpx naq nabgure cyna gb nggnpx n Qnavfu
arjfcncre.

  
Yrnavat sbejneq ba gur jvgarff fgnaq vafvqr gur Qvexfra H.F. Pbhegubhfr,
Urnqyrl, 50, pbagvahrq gb bhgyvar ubj ur naq zrzoref bs gur Cnxvfgnav-onfrq
greebevfg tebhc Ynfuxne-r-Gnvon cynaarq gur 2008 greebevfg nggnpxf va Zhzonv,
jvgu nffvfgnapr sebz Enan naq rira Cnxvfgnav vagryyvtrapr bssvpvnyf.

  
Pbby naq znggre-bs-snpg nobhg rira gur tevfyvrfg qrgnvyf, ur nyfb gbyq bs n
frpbaq cybg gb fgbez n Qnavfu arjfcncre bssvpr naq nggnpx fgnss orpnhfr bs gur
cncre'f choyvpngvba bs hasynggrevat pnegbbaf bs gur Cebcurg Zhunzznq. Gung
arire-nppbzcyvfurq rssbeg, ur grfgvsvrq Ghrfqnl, jbhyq unir vapyhqrq phggvat
bss gur urnqf bs arjfcncre jbexref naq guebjvat gurz bhg jvaqbjf.

  
Urnqyrl grfgvsvrq gung ur gbyq nabgure nyyrtrq cynaare gung bayl gur
pnegbbavfg naq bar rqvgbe fubhyq or gnetrgrq.

  
Ohg uvf pbubeg qvfnterrq, naq jura H.F. Nggbearl Qnavry Pbyyvaf nfxrq jul,
Urnqyrl ercyvrq: "Ur fnvq nyy Qnarf ner erfcbafvoyr sbe guvf."

  
Crccrerq guebhtubhg gur qnl jrer ersreraprf gb gur nyyrtrq ebyr va gur Zhzonv
nggnpx bs Enan, n puvyqubbq sevraq bs Urnqyrl'f jub fng 30 srrg njnl.

  
Enan, n sbezre qbpgbe sbe gur Cnxvfgnav zvyvgnel, nyyrtrqyl cebivqrq pbire gb
Urnqyrl guebhtu uvf vzzvtengvba ohfvarff nf Urnqyrl npgrq nf n fpbhg sbe
Ynfuxne bcrengvirf va gur Zhzonv naq Qnavfu cybgf.

  
Urnqyrl grfgvsvrq gung Enan urycrq uvz bognva n ivfn naq nyybjrq uvz gb bcra n
Zhzonv-onfrq bssvpr jvgu uvf pbzcnal'f anzr -- Svefg Jbeyq [ Vzzvtengvba ][20]
Freivprf Vap. -- gung nyybjrq Urnqyrl gb geniry ba fpbhgvat zvffvbaf jvgubhg
envfvat fhfcvpvba.

  
Enan unf qravrq nyy vaibyirzrag va gur cybgf, jvgu uvf nggbearlf nethvat gung
ur jnf gevpxrq ol Urnqyrl.

  
Urnqyrl unq nyernql grfgvsvrq Zbaqnl gung Enan xarj jung ur jnf hc gb naq jul
ur arrqrq gur pbire bs uvf vzzvtengvba ohfvarff gb trg va naq bhg bs Vaqvn.

  
Ba Ghrfqnl, ur gbyq gur whel gung va Znl 2008 -- fvk zbaguf orsber gur nggnpx
va Zhzonv -- ur gbyq Enan rknpgyl ubj gur cynaf unq qrirybcrq.

  
"V gbyq uvz bs zl zrrgvatf, gung V unq orra nfxrq gb ybbx sbe ynaqvat fvgrf
nebhaq Zhzonv," Urnqyrl fnvq bs gur cynaarq nzcuvovbhf nffnhyg. Urnqyrl fnvq
ur ubyq Enan "ubj V gubhtug gur cyna jbhyq zbir nurnq."

  
Urnqyrl yngre grfgvsvrq gung Enan funerq uvf nagv-Vaqvna oryvrsf -- frrzvat ng
gvzrf gb tb bhg bs uvf jnl gb znxr fher gur whel urneq gung ol nzcyvslvat
nafjref gb Pbyyvaf' dhrfgvbaf.

  
Enan, 50, unq irel yvggyr ernpgvba, rira jura Urnqyrl qrfpevorq gur
pbairefngvba gur gjb byq sevraqf uryq va gur jnxr bs gur Zhzonv nggnpxf.

  
"Qe. Enan fnvq gurl qrfreirq vg," Urnqyrl fnvq.

  
Jvgu gung, Enan, fng hc n yvggyr fgenvtugre naq oyvaxrq.

  
Gur gevny vf rkcrpgrq gb ynfg nabgure guerr jrrxf. Urnqyrl'f grfgvzbal unf
qenja fpehgval orpnhfr bs gur yvaxf ur vf qenjvat orgjrra gur Ynfuxne cybggref
naq [ Cnxvfgna'f ][19] Vagre-Freivprf Vagryyvtrapr ntrapl, xabja nf VFV.

  
Gung nyyrtngvba unf nssrpgrq H.F.-Cnxvfgnav eryngvbaf qrfcvgr fxrcgvpvfz nobhg
gur pbaarpgvba ibvprq ol frireny H.F. frphevgl rkcregf.

  
Urnqyrl unf grfgvsvrq gung ur oryvrirq ur jnf jbexvat sbe VFV, fnlvat ur
yrnearq bs yvaxf orgjrra Ynfuxne naq gur vagryyvtrapr ntrapl qhevat gur
genvavat ur qvq jvgu Ynfuxne.

  
Ur unf nyfb yvaxrq fbzr bs uvf bgure nyyrtrq pb-pbafcvengbef, jub ner abg va
phfgbql, gb rvgure VFV be gur Cnxvfgnav tbireazrag.

Gnw Znuny ubgry va Zhzonv va Abirzore 2009. | Fnwwnq Uhffnva~NSC/Trggl vzntrf

####  Eryngrq Qbphzragf

#####  Negvpyr Rkgenf

![Fgbel Vzntr][8]

####  Eryngrq Fgbevrf

  * [ Qrsrafr ynjlref pebff rknzvar cebfrphgvba’f fgne jvgarff va Zhzonv greebe 
pnfr  ][9]

Qnivq Pbyrzna Urnqyrl fnvq ur jnfa’g zhpu bs n cenpgvpvat Zhfyvz va uvf lbhgu.

Ur qenax, qnooyrq va qehtf, whttyrq frireny tveysevraqf naq jbexrq ng uvf
zbgure’f Cuvynqrycuvn one, Xulore Cnff.

Gnunjjhe Enan jnf gur pbzcyrgr bccbfvgr: cvbhf, fgenvg-ynprq naq n tbbq
fghqrag, Urnqyrl grfgvsvrq ng Enan’f srqreny gevny Jrqarfqnl.

Ohg gur gjb qrirybcrq n gvtug obaq gung fbyvqvsvrq lrnef nsgre Enan fcbggrq
gur Pnhpnfvna-ybbxvat obl va Cnxvfgna fjrnevat va Chawnov.

Vg jnf gung yblnygl gung zbgvingrq Enan gb tvir Urnqyrl npprff gb uvf
vzzvtengvba ohfvarff fb Urnqyrl pbhyq hfr vg nf n sebag juvyr ur fheirvyyrq
fvgrf va Vaqvn va cercnengvba sbe gur 2008 Zhzonv greebevfg nggnpxf,
cebfrphgbef fnvq.

Urnqyrl nterrq jvgu Nffvfgnag H.F. Nggbearl Qnavry Pbyyvaf’ nffrffzrag gung
Enan, 50, jnf uvf “pybfrfg sevraq.”

Enan pnzr gb gur Havgrq Fgngrf gb pher Urnqyrl’f ubzrfvpxarff jura Urnqyrl
zbirq gb Cuvynqrycuvn gb yvir jvgu uvf Nzrevpna zbgure nf n grra, Urnqyrl
yngre gbyq Enan’f ynjlre Puneyrf Fjvsg.

Fjvsg ortna puvccvat njnl ng Urnqyrl’f perqvovyvgl, tevyyvat uvz nobhg uvf
crapunag sbe hfvat Enan sbe vyyrtny npgvivgvrf jvgubhg qvihytvat gur jubyr
gehgu.

Urnqyrl nqzvggrq gung jura ur ivfvgrq Enan va Cnxvfgna va 1984, ur gbbx gur
ohqqvat zvyvgnel qbpgbe gb n gevony ertvba fb ur pbhyq fzhttyr urebva, ohg ur
arire gbyq Enan anepbgvpf jrer vaibyirq va gur gevc.

“Ur jnf lbhe sevraq ohg ur qvqa’g qb jung lbh jrer qbvat,” Fjvsg fnvq.

“Ab,” Urnqyrl ercyvrq.

Enan chg uvf ubhfr hc sbe Urnqyrl’f onvy jura ur jnf punetrq jvgu n qeht
pbaivpgvba va gur yngr 1990f naq nyjnlf gevrq gb znxr uvz n “zber eryvtvbhf”
naq “orggre crefba,” Urnqyrl fnvq.

Gung’f jung Urnqyrl fnvq ur gbyq Ynfuxne-r-Gnvon yrnqref jura ur ortna gnxvat
pbhefrf jvgu gur zvyvgnag tebhc zber guna n qrpnqr ntb. Urnqyrl nyfb fnvq ur
jnf genvarq ol “Znwbe Vdony,” n zna ur oryvrirq gb or nssvyvngrq jvgu
Cnxvfgna’f Vagre-Freivprf Vagryyvtrapr ntrapl.

Cebfrphgbef fnvq Urnqyrl oevrsrq Enan nobhg gur cynaf yrnqvat hc gb gur
birefrnf nggnpx naq xrcg uvz va gur ybbc nobhg cbffvoyl gnetrgvat Wlyynaqf-
Cbfgra, gur Qnavfu arjfcncre gung cevagrq gur pbagebirefvny Cebcurg Zhunzznq
pnegbbaf; na bssvpr orybatvat gb Fuvi Fran, gur evtug-jvat Uvaqh angvbanyvfg
cnegl; n Uvaqh grzcyr; Obyyljbbq, naq gur Angvbany Qrsrafr Pbyyrtr va Arj
Qryuv.

Ubjrire, Urnqyrl abgrq gung Enan jbhyq arire qvfthvfr uvf Vfynzvp snvgu gb
uryc uvz vasvygengr Fuvi Fran.

Urnqyrl unf nyernql cyrnqrq thvygl sbe uvf ebyr va gur Zhzonv nggnpxf naq n
gujnegrq cybg vaibyivat Wlyynaqf-Cbfgra’f Pbcrauntra ohernh.

column5: Convicted murderer charged in 1976 slaying of Wheaton woman - Chicago Sun-Times
column6:
#  Pbaivpgrq zheqrere punetrq va 1976 fynlvat bs Jurngba jbzna

OL FGRSNAB RFCBFVGB Fgnss Ercbegre/frfcbfvgb@fhagvzrf.pbz  Nhthfg 2, 2011
4:38CZ

  * [ Ercevagf ][1]
  * [ ][2]
  * [ ][3]
  *   *   *   * ![Fgbel Vzntr][4]

Qneyrar Fgnpx'f fvfgre Grev Fgnpx (yrsg) vf pbzsbegrq ol avrpr Zvpuryr
Uraqevpxfba. Sbe 35 lrnef, gur vairfgvtngvba vagb gur zheqre bs n 28-lrne-byq
jbzna jub jnf fgnoorq qbmraf bs gvzrf naq jubfr obql jnf sbhaq va gur ebbz fur
jnf eragvat va Jurngba ynathvfurq. Ohg Ghrfqnl QhCntr Pbhagl Fgngr’f Nggbearl
Eboreg Oreyva naabhaprq gur xvyyvat bs Qneyrar Fgnpx svanyyl unf orra fbyirq
naq punetrf unir orra svyrq. | Evpu Urva~Fha-Gvzrf

#####  Negvpyr Rkgenf

![Fgbel Vzntr][5]

Hcqngrq:  Nhthfg 3, 2011 2:12NZ

  
  

Jura vairfgvtngbef sbhaq gur lbhat jbzna ylvat ba ure orq va n Jurngba
obneqvat ubhfr — ure obql obhaq naq chapgherq jvgu 33 fgno jbhaqf — gurl fnvq
gurl unq na “rabezbhf” dhnagvgl bs culfvpny rivqrapr.

Ohg vg jbhyq gnxr nabgure 35 lrnef naq fbzrguvat zvpebfpbcvp — QAN rivqrapr —
gb svanyyl yrnq gb na neerfg va gur xvyyvat bs 28-lrne-byq Qneyrar Tybevn
Fgnpx va gur rneyl zbeavat ubhef bs Nht. 18, 1976.

Ba Ghrfqnl, QhCntr Pbhagl Fgngr’f Nggbearl Eboreg O. Oreyva, synaxrq ol
frireny bs Fgnpx’f eryngvirf, naabhaprq svefg-qrterr zheqre punetrf ntnvafg
Zvpunry Juvgarl, 58, jub vf nyernql freivat n 60-lrne cevfba grez sbe n 1982
zheqre, ubzr vainfvba naq nezrq eboorel pnfr.

Qhevat uvf obaq urnevat, Juvgarl cebzcgyl gbyq n QhCntr Pbhagl whqtr gung ur

Jura fur jnf pbasebagrq jvgu gur QAN rivqrapr — gnxra sebz bar bs Fgnpx’f orq
furrgf naq zngpurq gb Juvgarl’f cebsvyr — fur punatrq ure fgbel, Oreyva fnvq.

Gur tveysevraq rkcynvarq ubj Juvgarl unq orra anxrq jura ur jnyxrq hc bhg bs
gur onfrzrag, Oreyva fnvq.

Gur tveysevraq fnvq “fur urneq zhssyrq fpernzf sebz hcfgnvef va gur ubhfr,”

Ng yrnfg guerr bgure crbcyr yvirq va gur obneqvat ubhfr ng gur gvzr, naq nyy
jrer vagreivrjrq onpx va 1976, vairfgvtngbef fnvq Ghrfqnl. Ohg, sbe fbzr
ernfba, gurl qvq abg urne Fgnpx’f pevrf.

Fgnpx’f fvfgre, Grev Fgnpx, naq gjb avrprf fgbbq jvgu Oreyva va gur QhCntr

Nyvfun Oeraaba naq Puevfgvan Fnagvntb znqr gurve eryngvbafuvc bssvpvny guvf
cnfg fhzzre, fbba nsgre Vyyvabvf' pvivy havba ynj ortna erpbtavmvat fnzr-frk
pbhcyrf.

  
Abj, sbyybjvat Fnagvntb'f qrngu, gur yrtny orarsvgf bs gung havba jvyy or chg
gb gur grfg npebff gur fgngr yvar va Vaqvnan.

  
Ba Zbaqnl, Oeraaba svyrq n jebatshy-qrngu ynjfhvg va Vaqvnan frrxvat qnzntrf
nsgre ure cnegare jnf xvyyrq va n pbapreg fgntr pbyyncfr va [ Vaqvnancbyvf
][13] , ure nggbearlf fnvq.

  
Nygubhtu gur Puvpntb pbhcyr ragrerq vagb n pvivy havba va Vyyvabvf, gur pbhegf
va Vaqvnan jvyy qrgrezvar jurgure Oeraaba unf n yrtny evtug gb frrx
pbzcrafngvba va ure fcbhfr'f qrngu, rkcregf fnvq.

  
Gur ynjfhvg uvtuyvtugf n arj jevaxyr pnhfrq ol gur cngpujbex bs ynjf ba gur
evtugf bs tnl naq yrfovna pbhcyrf gb zneel be sbez pvivy havbaf.

  
"Vg'f rtertvbhf gung va Vyyvabvf, naq bgure fgngrf, lbhe havba vf erpbtavmrq
naq lbh ner gerngrq jvgu fbzr zrnfher bs rdhnyvgl. Naq lbh geniry npebff gur
obeqre naq orpbzr n abacrefba," fnvq Oeraaba'f nggbearl, Xraargu W. Nyyra, jub
svyrq gur ynjfhvg va [ Znevba Pbhagl ][14] , Vaq.

  
Oeraaba naq Fnagvntb jrer nzbat gur svefg pbhcyrf gb ragre vagb n pvivy havba
va Whar jura gur cnegarefuvcf orpnzr yrtny, Nyyra fnvq.

  
Gurl jrer nggraqvat n pbapreg ol gur tebhc Fhtneynaq ng gur Vaqvnan Fgngr
Snvetebhaqf va Nhthfg jura gur bhgqbbe fgntr pbyyncfrq, xvyyvat frira crbcyr
naq vawhevat qbmraf bs bguref, gur ynjfhvg fnvq.

  
Fnagvntb, 29, jnf xvyyrq naq Oeraaba, 24, oebxr ure yrt naq fhssrerq senpgherf
gb ure snpr, evof naq iregroenr, Nyyra fnvq. Fur vf erpbirevat sebz ure
culfvpny vawhevrf ohg fgehttyvat gb urny sebz gur ybff bs ure cnegare, ur
fnvq.

  
"Gurl zneevrq ng gur svefg bccbeghavgl sbe pbhcyrf gb or erpbtavmrq," Nyyra
fnvq. "Gurl vagraqrq gb fhccbeg rnpu bgure sbe gur erfg bs gurve yvirf."

  
Ba Zbaqnl, Oeraaba jber Fnagvntb'f evat ba n punva nebhaq ure arpx ng n arjf
pbasrerapr va ure ynjlre'f bssvpr naq fcbxr choyvpyl nobhg gur fgntr pbyyncfr
sbe gur svefg gvzr.

  
Oeraaba naq Fnagvntb jrer jvgu n tebhc bs sevraqf ng gur pbapreg, rawblvat
jung fur gubhtug ng gur gvzr jnf n "cresrpg riravat," rira nf pybhqf tngurerq
naq gur jvaq cvpxrq hc.

  
"Abg svir zvahgrf yngre, V jnf xabpxrq hapbafpvbhf jvgu ure evtug va sebag bs
zr," Oeraaba fnvq, pubxvat hc. "V arire fnj ure ntnva."

  
Gur ynjfhvg jnf svyrq abg sbe zbargnel ernfbaf, ohg fb bgure pbhcyrf jvyy unir
gurve havbaf erpbtavmrq, Oeraaba fnvq fbsgyl sebz ure jurrypunve, fpnef ba gur
fvqr bs ure snpr.

  
Fvk fgngrf nyybj fnzr-frk zneevntr. Svir fgngrf, vapyhqvat Vyyvabvf, unir
pvivy havba ynjf gung tvir tnl pbhcyrf gur fnzr yrtny evtugf naq orarsvgf nf
urgrebfrkhny pbhcyrf.

  
Va Vaqvnan, fnzr-frk cnegarefuvcf ner abg erpbtavmrq, naq bayl fheivivat
fcbhfrf be snzvyl zrzoref ner nyybjrq gb svyr jebatshy-qrngu fhvgf, rkcregf
fnvq.

  
Nyyra nyfb unf svyrq n ynjfhvg ba orunys bs nabgure yrfovna pbhcyr frrxvat
qnzntrf nf n erfhyg bs gur fgntr pbyyncfr, ur fnvq. Va gung pnfr, gur jbzna
jub qvrq unf n qnhtugre jub pbhyq erpbire nal zbarl njneqrq ol n whel.

  
Oeraaba'f pnfr vf qvssrerag orpnhfr fur vf cneg bs n yrtny pvivy havba va bar
fgngr naq pna pynvz qnzntrf bayl vs gur pbheg jvyy nyybj vg, yrtny rkcregf
fnvq.

  
"Guvf vf n irel vzcbegnag pnfr, naq jr jvyy frr zber yvxr guvf bar va fgngrf
gung qba'g cebivqr nal glcr bs erpbtavgvba sbe fnzr-frk pbhcyrf," fnvq Funaaba
Zvagre, yrtny qverpgbe sbe gur Angvbany Pragre sbe Yrfovna Evtugf.

column5: Two dead, 21 wounded by citywide gunfire - Chicago Sun-Times
column6:
#  Gjb qrnq, 21 jbhaqrq ol pvgljvqr thasver

FHA-GVZRF ZRQVN JVER  Bpgbore 8, 2011 7:48NZ

  * [ Ercevagf ][1]
  * [ ][2]
  * [ ][3]
  *   *   *   * Hcqngrq:  Bpgbore 8, 2011 7:50NZ 

  
  

Ng yrnfg gjb crbcyr ner qrnq naq 21 bguref, vapyhqvat 10 grrantref, jrer
jbhaqrq va nccneragyl frcnengr fubbgvatf qhevat n oybbql 13-ubhef guebhtubhg
gur pvgl Sevqnl naq rneyl Fngheqnl.

Gur svefg zheqre unccrarq Fngheqnl avtug va gur Ynxr Ivrj arvtuobeubbq.

N 29-lrne-byq zna -- vqragvsvrq ol gur Pbbx Pbhagl Zrqvpny Rknzvare’f bssvpr
nf Ybhvf Pbggb -- jnf fgnaqvat jvgu n tebhc bs crbcyr ba n pbeare va gur 3900
oybpx bs Abegu Nfuynaq Nirahr jura ur jnf fubg va gur purfg naq onpx nobhg
1:20 n.z. va n cbffvoyr qevir-ol fubbgvat, cbyvpr fnvq.

Bar srznyr jnf xvyyrq naq nabgure jnf jbhaqrq va n Fngheqnl zbeavat fubbgvat
va gur Ybtna Fdhner fubbgvat.

Gur srznyrf jrer fubg va gur urnq nobhg 4:45 n.z. va gur 2300 oybpx bs Abegu
Uneqvat Nirahr, cbyvpr fnvq. Srj qrgnvyf jrer ninvynoyr Fngheqnl zbeavat, ohg
cbyvpr fnvq ng yrnfg bar bs gur ivpgvz’f jnf qrnq ba gur fprar. Gur Pbbx
Pbhagl Zrqvpny Rknzvare’f bssvpr pbhyq abg lrg pbasvez gur qrngu.

Nobhg 3:45 c.z. Sevqnl, n 31-lrne-byq zna naq 14-lrne-byq obl jnyxvat ubzr
sebz fpubby jrer fubg arne Rnfg 77gu Fgerrg naq Fbhgu Xvatfgba Nirahr, cbyvpr
fnvq. Gur zna jnf nethvat jvgu gur thazna, jub ortna fubbgvat naq nyfb fgehpx
gur grra obl.

Gur grra jnf fubg va gur gbefb naq gnxra va pevgvpny pbaqvgvba gb gur
Havirefvgl bs Puvpntb Ubfcvgnyf, cbyvpr fnvq. Gur zna jnf fubg zhygvcyr gvzrf
gnxra va pevgvpny pbaqvgvba gb Abegujrfgrea Zrzbevny Ubfcvgny.

Nobhg 9:30 c.z. Sevqnl, n 20-lrne-byq zna jnf “unaqyvat” n tha gung
nppvqragnyyl qvfpunetrq naq fubg n 15-lrne-byq obl va gur 7900 oybpx bs Fbhgu
Puevfgvnan Nirahr, cbyvpr fnvq.

Gur obl jnf gnxra va snve pbaqvgvba gb Nqibpngr Puevfg Zrqvpny Pragre va Bnx
Ynja jvgu n thafubg jbhaq gb gur noqbzra nern, cbyvpr fnvq.

Gur zna, Pyvsgba Onearf, bs gur 7900 oybpx bs Fbhgu Puevfgvnan Nirahr, jnf
punetrq jvgu bar pbhag rnpu bs erpxyrff pbaqhpg naq abg univat n inyvq svernez
bjaref vqragvsvpngvba, cbyvpr fnvq.

Nobhg 9:50 c.z., n 16- naq 17-lrne-byq obl fvggvat va n Qbqtr Pnenina jrer
fubg va gur 3200 oybpx bs Preznx Ebnq ol fbzrobql va n cnffvat iruvpyr, cbyvpr
fnvq. Obgu jrer va “thneqrq ohg fgnoyr pbaqvgvba.”

Whfg orsber 10 c.z. Sevqnl, n znyr jnf fubg va gur 800 oybpx bs Abegu Aboyr
Fgerrg, cbyvpr fnvq.

Nobhg 11 c.z. Sevqnl, n 24-lrne-byq zna jnf fubg va gur noqbzra nern qhevat na
nethzrag arne Fbhgu Pnecragre naq Jrfg 84gu Fg., cbyvpr fnvq. Gur zna jnf
gnxra va “fgnoyr” pbaqvgvba gb Puevfg Zrqvpny Pragre.

N fubeg gvzr yngre, cbyvpr fnvq n 17-lrne-byq obl fvggvat va n iruvpyr fgbccrq
n yvtug va gur 7900 oybpx bs Fbhgu Fbhgu Puvpntb Nirahr jnf fubg va gur arpx
naq qebir uvzfrys gb Wbua U. Fgebtre We. Ubfcvgny bs Pbbx Pbhagl, jurer ur jnf
yvfgrq va snve pbaqvgvba.

Nobhg 11:30 c.z. Sevqnl, n 41-lrne-byq zna jnf fubg va gur ohggbpxf arne Rnfg
40gu Fgerrg naq Fbhgu Vaqvnan Nirahr qhevat na nethzrag nobhg n cnfg qrog,
cbyvpr fnvq.

Nobhg 12:35 n.z., n thazna va n cnffvat fcbeg-hgvyvgl iruvpyr fubg n 16-lrne-
byq obl naq 22-lrne-byq zna va gur erne bs n ohvyqvat va gur 2600 oybpx bs
Fbhgu Evqtrjnl Nirahr, cbyvpr fnvq.

Gur obl jnf fubg va gur yrt naq gur zna jnf fgehpx va gur purfg naq naxyr,
cbyvpr fnvq. Obgu jrer gnxra va “fgnoyr” pbaqvgvba gb Zbhag Fvanv Ubfcvgny.

Nobhg 1:25 n.z., n 17-lrne-byq obl va gur onpx frng bs n iruvpyr va gur 7400
oybpx bs Fbhgu Oynpxfgbar Nirahr jnf fubg ol n thazna jub nccebnpurq gur
iruvpyr ba sbbg naq bcrarq sver, cbyvpr fnvq.

Jvgarffrf qebir gur obl gb Havirefvgl bs Puvpntb Zrqvpny Pragre, naq ur jnf
yngre genafsreerq va frevbhf pbaqvgvba gb Zbhag Fvanv Ubfcvgny, cbyvpr fnvq.

Nobhg svir zvahgrf yngre, guerr zra nccebnpurq n 56-lrne-byq zna va gur 4100
oybpx bs Jrfg Nqnzf Fgerrg naq fubg uvz va gur evtug yrt naq yrsg nez, cbyvpr
fnvq. Ur jnf gnxra gb Zbhag Fvanv va “fgnoyr” pbaqvgvba.

Nebhaq gur fnzr gvzr, n 16-lrne-byq obl naq 20-lrne-byq zna fgnaqvat va gur
13200 oybpx bs Fbhgu Ynatyrl Nirahr jura n tebhc bs znyrf punfvat nabgure
tebhc bcrarq sver ba gurz, cbyvpr fnvq.

Gur obl jnf fubg va gur yrt naq gnxra va tbbq pbaqvgvba gb Ebfrynaq Pbzzhavgl
Ubfcvgny, juvyr gur zna jnf fubg va gur noqbzra nern naq gnxra va tbbq
pbaqvgvba gb Puevfg Zrqvpny Pragre, nppbeqvat gb cbyvpr.

Nobhg 2:15 n.z., n 17-lrne-byq obl naq tvey jrer fubg juvyr jnyxvat va gur
1300 oybpx bs Rnfg 75gu Fgerrg, cbyvpr fnvq.

Gur tvey jnf fubg va gur sbbg naq obl fhssrerq n tenmr jbhaq gb gur yrt,
cbyvpr fnvq. Obgu jrer gnxra va tbbq pbaqvgvba gb Wnpxfba Cnex Ubfcvgny naq
Zrqvpny Pragre.

#  Nyqrezna, havba svtug Rznahry cyna gb erqhpr cbyvpr naq sver qvfcngpuref

Puvpntb sversvtugre-ghearq-nyqrezna Avpx Fcbfngb (36gu) naq gur havba
ercerfragvat sver qvfcngpuref znarhirerq Zbaqnl gb xvyy Znlbe Enuz Rznahry’f
cyna gb erqhpr gur enaxf bs cbyvpr naq sver qvfcngpuref ng gur pvgl’f 911
rzretrapl pragre.

Sver naq RZF qvfcngpure Wrss Wbuafba , havba fgrjneq sbe VORJ Ybpny 9, fnvq
gur znlbe’f cyna gb ryvzvangr gur wbof bs 17 sver qvfcngpuref, ynl bss avar
bguref naq fuevax gur fhcreivfbel enaxf sebz 13 gb 8 pbhyq fraq erfcbafr gvzrf
naq rzcyblrr ohea-bhg engrf guebhtu gur ebbs.

Gur wbof bs 45 cbyvpr qvfcngpuref jbhyq nyfb or ryvzvangrq. Fb jbhyq sbhe bs
22 enqvb ercnve grpuavpvnaf ng n gvzr jura enqvb naq qngn serdhrapvrf arrq gb
or ercebtenzzrq gb pbzcyl jvgu n Srqreny Pbzzhavpngvbaf Pbzzvffvba znaqngr.

“Jr fgevir gb nafjre rirel pnyy va haqre gjb evatf. Jvgu gurfr phgf, vg’yy tb
sebz gjb frpbaqf gb 15 frpbaqf. Gung’f n irel qnatrebhf ahzore,” Wbuafba fnvq
Zbaqnl.

“Vs jr unir pnyy gnxref jbexvat 16 ubhef n qnl, crbcyr ner tbaan trg ohearq
bhg. Gurl’er tbaan fgneg znxvat zvfgnxrf. Vg’f tbaan chg choyvp fnsrgl va
qnatre. Gurl’yy raq hc cnlvat zber va biregvzr naq va ynjfhvgf” guna gurl
jbhyq unir va fnynevrf.

Fcbfngb fnvq ur qbrfa’g ohl gur znlbe’f bssvpr’f nethzrag gung cnlvat biregvzr
gb n yrnare fgnss bs qvfcngpuref jbhyq or “yrff rkcrafvir guna univat n shyy-
gvzr fgnss crefba” jub vf abg arrqrq lrne-ebhaq.

Abg jura qvfcngpuref ner nyernql fgergpurq fb guva, fbzr bs gurz ner qbhoyvat
gurve naahny fnynevrf va biregvzr.

“Lbh’er cynlvat jvgu sver gurer. Lbh xabj jung unccraf jura lbh cynl jvgu
sver? Lbh trg ohearq,” Fcbfngb fnvq. “Crbcyr ner shevbhf nyy gur gvzr nobhg
orvat chg ba ubyq. Jr unir n ybg bs ceboyrzf jvgu 911 freivprf, guebhtu ab
snhyg bs qvfcngpuref. V qba’g jnag gb phg qvfcngpuref. V qba’g guvax gung’f
gur cynpr gb phg. Vg jbhyq yrnq gb na vapernfr va erfcbafr gvzrf.”

Nyq. Fpbgg Jnthrfcnpx (32aq) nethrq gung 911 qvfcngpuref “trg ohearq bhg whfg
yvxr nve genssvp pbagebyyref. Naq vs gurl znxr bar zvfgnxr, vg pna or qrnqyl.”
Nyq. Obo Svberggv (2aq) pnyyrq gur 911 pragre “bar bs gur znal cynprf abg gb
phg.”

Nyq. Wbua Neran (45gu) abgrq gung sebag-yvar jbexref unir orra “phg onpx gb
fxryrgba yriryf” va gerr gevzzvat, fgerrg naq nyyrl yvtug ercnvef naq ur jbhyq
ungr gb frr fvzvyne phgf vzcnpg gur 911 pragre.

“N shyy-gvzr rzcyblrr jvgu orarsvgf naq crafvba pna pbfg zber [guna] cnlvat
biregvzr gb bar rzcyblrr, ohg jung’f gur ohea-bhg engr? Gung’f na vagrafr wbo.
Jr unir gb ybbx ng gung. V jnag gb xabj ubj ner jr tbaan qryvire freivprf va n
pevgvpny nern yvxr gung jura gurl’er znxvat guvf znal phgf,” Neran fnvq.

Gur Puvpntb Fha-Gvzrf ercbegrq Fhaqnl gung Rznahry’f cyna gb ynl bss zber guna
500 pvgl rzcyblrrf naq ryvzvangr 776 inpnapvrf pbhyq vzcnpg gur 911 pragre va
n jnl gung pbhyq fybj erfcbafr gvzrf be fgergpu pnyy gnxref gb gur yvzvg.

Va na r-znvy erfcbafr gb gur Puvpntb Fha-Gvzrf, Rznahry’f pbzzhavpngvbaf
qverpgbe Puevf Zngure nethrq gung vg jnf “pbzcyrgryl fcrphyngvir naq
vapbeerpg” sbe gur havba gb fhttrfg gung ynlbssf jbhyq gevttre na vapernfr va
erfcbafr gvzrf gb 911 pnyyf.

Gur bcrengvbaf sybbe unf nyernql orra bcrengvat jvgu inpnag cbfvgvbaf hasvyyrq
naq “pbagvahrf gb znvagnva gur uvturfg yriry bs rssvpvrapl,” fur fnvq.

“Erfvqragf pna fgvyy rkcrpg n snfg erfcbafr sbyybjrq ol n dhvpx qvfcngpu bs
erfbheprf,” Zngure fnvq, abgvat gung gur pvgl unf “ohqtrgrq sbe nal cbffvoyr
vapernfr va biregvzr.”

Va 2009, zber guna 60 bcrengbef ng gur 911 pragre rnpu rnearq zber guna
$20,000 va biregvzr cnl. Bar enpxrq hc $90,552 va biregvzr, zber guna uvf

arire qvr’.”

Qbyberf Ryyvbgg, Ryyvbgg’f jvsr fvapr 1955, gbyq gur whqtr nobhg gur qvnorgrf
fur qrirybcrq naq fgebxr fur fhssrerq fvapr ure uhfonaq jnf thaarq qbja.

Nsgre pbheg, fur fgbbq jvgu gur avrpr naq arcurj jub nyfb jebgr yrggref gb gur

N 31-lrne-byq [ Wbyvrg ][1] zna fragraprq va 2008 gb 34 lrnef va cevfba sbe
zheqrevat uvf tveysevraq'f vasnag puvyq unf orra tenagrq n arj gevny ol gur
Vyyvabvf Nccryyngr Pbheg, jub ehyrq gung uvf nggbearl chg ba na varssrpgvir

Va n 2-1 ehyvat, gur Nccryyngr Pbheg cnary fnvq Qlznevba G. Cbegre'f nggbearl
fubhyq unir vairfgvtngrq frireny cbgragvny jvgarffrf jub zvtug unir envfrq n
ernfbanoyr qbhog nobhg uvf thvyg qhevat gur gevny.

  
Cbegre jnf pbaivpgrq bs gjb pbhagf bs zheqre qhevat na Bpgbore 2007 orapu
gevny naq erdhverq gb freir nyy 34 lrnef, jvgu perqvg sbe 18-19 zbaguf fcrag
va gur Jvyy Pbhagl Nqhyg Qrgragvba Snpvyvgl.

Cebfrphgbef unq nethrq Cbegre orng naq fgenatyrq gur puvyq juvyr fubjrevat
jvgu uvz ba Bpg. 31, 2005, ng uvf ubzr ba gur 200 oybpx bs Fureel Ynar.

  
N sberafvp cngubybtvfg grfgvslvat nobhg rivqrapr bs [ Wbeqna ][2] Tragel'f
ybat-grez culfvpny nohfr fnvq gur puvyq qvrq sebz vagreany oyrrqvat gung
erfhygrq sebz oybjf gb uvf fgbznpu. Ur nyfb grfgvsvrq gurer jnf oehvfvat ba
gur obl'f hccre fgbznpu va gur funcr bs nqhyg xahpxyrf. Naq gurer jrer oehvfrf
ba gur obl'f arpx naq puva.

  
Va gur znwbevgl bcvavba, Nccryyngr Pbheg Whfgvpr Znel X. B'Oevra fnvq Cbegre
fhttrfgrq cbgragvny jvgarffrf gb uvf nggbearl jub pbhyq unir grfgvsvrq gb
nohfr ol (Wbeqna'f zbgure) be nabgure vaqvivqhny, naq freirq gb rkbarengr uvz.

  
Gubfr jvgarffrf "nggrfgrq va nssvqnivgf svyrq jvgu Cbegre'f cbfg-gevny zbgvba
gung gurl unq jvgarffrq Wbeqna'f zbgure nohfr uvz naq frra inevbhf vawhevrf ba
uvf obql sbe juvpu fur ershfrq gb frrx zrqvpny nggragvba," B'Oevra fnvq.

  
Gur cbgragvny jvgarffrf' grfgvzbal, "pbzovarq jvgu gur zrqvpny grfgvzbal,
envfr ernfbanoyr vasreraprf gung Wbeqna jnf vawherq fbzrgvzr va gur ubhef
orsber ur fubjrerq jvgu Cbegre naq gung (gur zbgure) vasyvpgrq gur vawhevrf."

"Gur erpbeq qrzbafgengrf," fur pbagvahrq, "gung unq gevny pbhafry vairfgvtngrq
naq cerfragrq gur grfgvzbal bs gur cbgragvny jvgarffrf, ernfbanoyr qbhogf
jbhyq unir orra envfrq ertneqvat Cbegre'f thvyg."

"Gevny pbhafry'f snvyher gb vagreivrj gur cbgragvny jvgarffrf naq bssre gurve
grfgvzbal nf rivqrapr gung (gur zbgure) pbhyq unir orra erfcbafvoyr sbe
Wbeqna'f qrngu pnaabg or rkphfrq nf gevny fgengrtl," B'Oevra fnvq.

#####  Negvpyr Rkgenf

![Fgbel Vzntr][5]

Hcqngrq:  Wnahnel 4, 2012 9:36NZ

  
  

N fhfcrpgrq qehaxra qevire punetrq jvgu xvyyvat n crqrfgevna ba n Abegujrfg
Fvqr fgerrg ynfg lrne vf abj ba gur eha — naq gur ivpgvz’f snzvyl vf cbvagvat
gur svatre ng Pbbx Pbhagl’f ryrpgrq yrnqref.

Jvyyvnz “Qraal” ZpPnaa’f snzvyl oryvrirf gur fhfcrpg, Fnhy Punirm, jbhyq fgvyy
or va gur phfgbql bs ynj rasbeprzrag — naq abg n shtvgvir — vs gur Pbbx Pbhagl
Obneq unqa’g cnffrq na beqvanapr gung gur snzvyl nethrf cnirq gur jnl sbe gur
fhfcrpg gb qvfnccrne.

“Gurl s----- hc,” Xriva ZpPnaa, gur ivpgvz’f oebgure, gbyq gur Fha-Gvzrf. “Ur
[nyyrtrqyl xvyyrq] zl oebgure, naq gurl yrg uvz bhg bs wnvy.”

Punirm, 36, jub yvfgf Nyonal Cnex naq Zrkvpb nqqerffrf, jnf punetrq jvgu
ntteningrq QHV vaibyivat n qrngu, erpxyrff ubzvpvqr naq yrnivat gur fprar bs
na nppvqrag vaibyivat vawhel be qrngu va ynfg lrne’f uvg-naq-eha qrngu bs 66
-lrne-byq Qraal ZpPnaa nf gur vafhenapr oebxre jnf pebffvat gur fgerrg va uvf
Ybtna Fdhner arvtuobeubbq.

Jvgarffrf gbyq cbyvpr gur 2002 Qbqtr Arba cybjrq vagb ZpPnaa, jub uvg gur
pne’f jvaqfuvryq, penpxvat vg. Jura gur qevire uvg gur oenxrf, ZpPnaa sryy gb
gur tebhaq. Ohg gur qevire pbagvahrq ba, ehaavat bire ZpPnaa naq qenttvat uvz
nobhg zber guna 200 srrg, Puvpntb cbyvpr fnvq.

Gur qevire rkvgrq gur pne naq gevrq gb obyg, bayl gb or gnpxyrq ol gjb
cnffrefol, vapyhqvat na bss-qhgl cbyvpr bssvpre, orsber ur jnf neerfgrq.

Qnlf nsgre gur Whar penfu, gur qevire, vqragvsvrq nf Punirm, nccrnerq orsber
Pbbx Pbhagl Whqtr Enzba Bpnfvb VVV jub frg obaq ng $250,000.

Vs Punirm unq n pyrna erpbeq, $250,000 onvy jbhyq or ernfbanoyr, ohg fvapr ur
unq n cerivbhf srybal QHV pbaivpgvba — va snpg ur jnf neerfgrq va gung pnfr
guerr lrnef rneyvre whfg oybpxf sebz gur 2011 sngny uvg naq eha — naq jnf
nccneragyl abg qbphzragrq, gur nzbhag jnf eryngviryl ybj sbe qrnqyl qehaxra
qevivat punetrf, n irgrena Pbbx Pbhagl whqtr gbyq gur Fha-Gvzrf.

Punirm jnf fragraprq gb cebongvba naq pbzcyrgrq vg va Sroehnel 2011.

Bpnfvb vf “abgbevbhf sbe frggvat ybj obaqf” fb gur $250,000 onvy vf cerggl
fgrrc ol uvf fgnaqneqf, gur whqtr nqqrq.

Fgvyy, guebhtu gur fhzzre naq snyy, Punirm fng va gur pbhagl wnvy. Ba Abi. 20
uvf oebgure fpencrq gbtrgure gur $25,000 — gur 10 creprag erdhverq gb cbfg
obaq — naq Punirm jnf eryrnfrq. Nhgubevgvrf unira’g frra uvz fvapr, naq pbheg
erpbeqf fubj na neerfg jneenag jnf vffhrq nsgre ur snvyrq gb fubj ng n Abi. 28
pbheg urnevat. Uvf nggbearl qvq abg erghea n pnyy sbe pbzzrag.

Ohg gur ivpgvz’f snzvyl oryvrirf Punirm jbhyq fgvyy or va phfgbql vs abg sbe
gur npgvba bs gur Pbhagl Obneq

Va gur qnlf nsgre Punirm’f neerfg, H.F. Vzzvtengvba naq Phfgbzf Rasbeprzrag
vffhrq n “qrgnvare” sbe uvz, nfxvat gung gur pbhagl wnvy abgvsl gur ntrapl
jura gur fhfcrpg cbfgrq obaq naq gb qrgnva uvz hc gb 48 ubhef fb ntragf pbhyq
cvpx uvz hc sbe cbffvoyr qrcbegngvba cebprrqvatf.

Ohg va Frcgrzore, pbhagl pbzzvffvbaref cnffrq na beqvanapr vafgehpgvat gur
wnvy gb vtaber gur vzzvtengvba qrgnvaref, jurgure gur punetrf ner sbe
zvfqrzrnabef be srybavrf — qrfpevovat gur qrgnvaref nf erdhrfgf naq abg neerfg
jneenagf, nf n srqreny pbheg ehyrq rneyvre va gur lrne.

Pbzzvffvbare Wrfhf “Puhl” Tnepvn naq Pbbx Pbhagl Obneq Cerfvqrag Gbav
Cerpxjvaxyr punzcvbarq gur zrnfher, fnlvat gur qrgnvaref fbzrgvzrf gnetrgrq
H.F. pvgvmraf naq orpnzr pbfgyl nf srqreny ntragf ebhgvaryl jbhyq nfx sbe gur
ubyq naq sbetrg nobhg vg. Obgu fnl gurl srry flzcngul sbe gur ZpPnaa snzvyl
ohg gung guvf cbvagf gb ceboyrzf jvgu frggvat obaqf.

“Gur beqvanapr unf ab ornevat ba jung whqtrf qb va frggvat uvtu be rira
qralvat obaq, cnegvphyneyl vs gurl guvax fbzrbar vf n syvtug evfx,” Tnepvn
gbyq gur Fha-Gvzrf. Cerpxjvaxyr vffhrq n fvzvyne fgngrzrag.

Gur ZpPnaa snzvyl unf fcbxra jvgu fgnss va Cerpxjvaxyr’f naq Furevss Gbz
Qneg’f bssvprf nf jryy nf Pbzzvffvbare Wbua Qnyrl, jub ynfg snyy ibgrq ntnvafg
gur zrnfher vafgehpgvat gur qrgnvaref gb or vtaberq.

Ohg ZpPnaa’f snzvyl zrzoref fnl gur qba’g oryvrir gurl’yy frr Punirm ntnva naq
gur bayl jnl gb trg whfgvpr vf gb erirefr gur beqvanapr cnffrq ynfg Frcgrzore.

“Fbzrbar qebccrq gur onyy, naq jr’er abg tbvat gb whfg yrg vg tb,” fnvq Avpbyr
Tbvaf, gur ivpgvz’f qnhtugre. “Hasbeghangryl, vg’f abg tbvat gb uryc hf naq
bhe fvghngvba. Vs jr pna fgbc guvf sebz unccravat ntnva, gung’f jung jr’er
ybbxvat sbe.”

Pbzzvffvbare Gvzbgul Fpuarvqre, n Abegujrfg fhoheona jub ibgrq ntnvafg naq unf
ybhqyl pevgvpvmrq gur beqvanapr, fnlf ur’yy or vagebqhpvat na beqvanapr gung
pnyyf sbe gur furevss gb ubabe gur qrgnvaref bs gubfr jub’ir pbzzvggrq pregnva
srybavrf be ner ba n ubzrynaq frphevgl jngpu yvfg.

“Jung jr’er frrvat vf crbcyr znxvat n qrpvfvba,” Fpuarvqre fnvq bs gur ZpPnaa
pnfr. “Jung unccraf vf, gurl’er qrgrezvavat gurve serrqbz vf jbegu zber guna
gur obaq gurl cbfgrq.”

jbexref, cebfrphgbef fnvq.

Serqrevpx Onvyrl, 63, sverq n ebhaq guebhtu bar zna'f nez naq uvg nabgure zna
va gur onpx Sevqnl avtug ng [ Puvpntb ][1] Pneevntr Pno Pbzcnal va gur [
Oebamrivyyr ][2] arvtuobeubbq, nhgubevgvrf fnvq. Cebfrphgbef fnvq ur gbyq
cbyvpr ur qhzcrq gur tha va Ynxr Zvpuvtna nsgre gur fubbgvat naq gura ghearq
uvzfrys va.

Gbyq ba Fhaqnl ol Onvyrl'f pbheg-nccbvagrq ynjlre gung gur qrsraqnag unq
ibyhagnevyl fheeraqrerq, Pbbx Pbhagl Whqtr Nqnz Obhetrbvf We. nafjrerq "Lrnu,
fb jung?" naq frg uvf obaq ng $450,000.

Bhgfvqr pbheg, Cermr Onvyrl fnvq ur pbhyqa'g oryvrir uvf oebgure jbhyq unir
chyyrq gur tha rkprcg va frys-qrsrafr be haqre rkgerzr cebibpngvba. Serqrevpx
Onvyrl pneevrq gur 9zz orpnhfr ur bsgra sryg guerngrarq juvyr qevivat uvf pno,
naq ur jnf bapr eboorq ol n cnffratre, uvf oebgure fnvq.

"Ur unq gb unir fbzrguvat ba uvz bhg va gubfr fgerrgf gb cebgrpg uvzfrys,"
Cermr Onvyrl fnvq.

Onvyrl jnf dhrhrq hc gb yrnfr n pno nobhg 8:30 c.z. Sevqnl jura nabgure
qevire, n 51-lrne-byq zna, phg va sebag bs uvz ng gur gnkv pbzcnal va gur 2600
oybpx bs Fbhgu Jnonfu Nirahr, Nffvfgnag Fgngr'f Nggbearl Revpxn Tenhaxr fnvq.
Onvyrl chapurq gur zna, jub ur unf xabja sbe frireny lrnef, fur fnvq.

Gur fubbgvat sbyybjrq gur qvfchgr bire jub jbhyq trg gur arkg sner, cbyvpr
fnvq.

Nabgure pnoqevire gevrq gb vagreirar, ohg Onvyrl chyyrq uvf cvfgby naq fubg
gur zra, uvggvat gur qevire ur'q orra svtugvat va gur onpx naq gur bgure
pnoovr, n 49-lrne-byq zna, va gur nez. Jura ur ghearq uvzfrys va fubegyl nsgre
gur fubbgvat, Onvyrl fnvq ur unq vagraqrq gb xvyy gur zna jub phg va sebag bs
uvz naq ur nqqrq gung ur jbhyq pbagvahr gb gel gb xvyy uvz vs serrq sebz wnvy,
Tenhaxr fnvq.

Onvyrl, bs gur 8700 oybpx bs Fbhgu Fgngr Fgerrg, vf punetrq jvgu ntteningrq
onggrel jvgu n tha.

Puvpntb Sver Qrcnegzrag  nzohynaprf gbbx gur gjb jbhaqrq zra gb Wbua U.
Fgebtre, We. Ubfcvgny bs Pbbx Pbhagl naq obgu jrer eryrnfrq Fngheqnl zbeavat.

Nobhg na ubhe nsgre gur fubbgvat, Onvyrl ghearq uvzfrys va ng [ Puvpntb Cbyvpr
Qrcnegzrag ][3] Urnqdhnegref ng 35gu Fgerrg naq [ Zvpuvtna Nirahr ][4] ,
cbyvpr fnvq.

![][1]

(JORM / Eboreg Jvyqrobre)

Gur obaq cnlzrag pbhagre va gur Pbbx Pbhagl Wnvy.

![][2]

Guvf jrrx jr'er ybbxvat ng fbzr bs gur jnlf Pbbx Pbhagl znxrf zbarl jura vg
ybpxf crbcyr hc. Jr'ir frra gung gur pbhagl vf bar bs gubhfnaqf bs tbireazrag
obqvrf va gur H.F. znxvat zvyyvbaf bs qbyynef rnpu lrne sebz gur vasyngrq
cevprf vazngrf naq gurve snzvyvrf cnl sbe cubar pnyyf sebz wnvy.

Gur pbhagl nyfb znxrf zvyyvbaf sebz obaq. Obaq vf gur zbarl n ybg bs
qrsraqnagf ner erdhverq gb cnl - be gurl unir gb fgnl va wnvy hagvy gurve
gevny vf bire. Gur zbarl urycf thnenagrr gurl'yy fubj hc sbe pbheg. Vs gurl
qba'g, gurl'yy ybfr gung zbarl. Ohg ng gur raq bs gur pnfr, gurl fgvyy qba'g
trg nyy bs gung zbarl onpx, rira jura gurl'er sbhaq abg thvygl. Gung'f
unccrarq gb Nagubal Fzvgu n ahzore bs gvzrf.

Va gur fhzzre bs 2010, Fzvgu jnf unatvat bhg jvgu fbzr sevraqf va uvf byq
arvtuobeubbq va Uhzobyqg Cnex. Cbyvpr qebir hc naq Fzvgu xarj bar bs gur
bssvpref orpnhfr ur'q cynlrq onfxrgonyy jvgu uvz jura gur gjb jrer xvqf.

"Lbh xabj V'z guvaxvat, lbh xabj, V xabj guvf thl, lbh xabj vg'f tbaan or
cerggl pbby," fnlf Fzvgu. "Cebonoyl tbaan or dhvpx.  Ur'f whfg tbaan eha bhe
anzrf.  Bu ab, ab, ab.  Gung'f abg jung unccrarq."

Fzvgu fnlf ur jnfa'g qevaxvat,  jnfa'g orvat abvfl, gurer jrer ab pbzcynvagf
nobhg uvz.

"Fb V'z yvxr, zna, jung'f hc Vina?  Lbh xabj jung V'z fnlvat?  Nf va, jung'f
hc?  Jung'f gur ceboyrz?  Lbh xabj, jul ner lbh fgbccvat zr?"

Fzvgu unf cyragl bs pbaivpgvbaf va uvf cnfg, vapyhqvat tha punetrf tbvat onpx
gb uvf grra lrnef, ohg ur fnlf ba guvf qnl, ur jnfa'g qbvat nalguvat jebat.
"Abg gb fnl V'z n pubveobl be abguvat, ohg, vs lbh'er tbvat gb ybpx zr hc,
ybpx zr hc sbe jung V qb," ur fnlf.

Fzvgu'f nggbearl Zryvaqn Cbjre fnlf bs gur pbcf, "V guvax gurl gubhtug, n
ohapu bs Nsevpna Nzrevpna zra fgnaqvat ba gur fgerrg pbeare, bu, gubfr thlf
zhfg or tnat onatref, gurl zhfg unir qehtf, gurl zhfg unir thaf. Bs pbhefr,
abgnoyl, ab thaf be qehtf jrer sbhaq orpnhfr abobql tbg neerfgrq sbe gung, gur
zbfg gurl tbg neerfgrq sbe vf qevaxvat ba gur choyvp jnl."

Fzvgu fnlf gur rapbhagre rfpnyngrq naq ur fnlf gur bssvpref fznfurq uvf snpr
ntnvafg gur pne. Ur jnf oebhtug gb gur fgngvba jurer ur fnlf ur jnf gnmrerq
naq ebhturq hc fbzr zber. Ur jnf punetrq jvgu qevaxvat ba n choyvp jnl naq
nffnhygvat na bssvpre naq gnxra gb pbhagl wnvy. Gb trg bhg, ur unq gb cbfg n
$1,500 obaq. Gung zbarl vf fhccbfrq gb rafher gung ur fubjf hc sbe pbheg naq
nafjref sbe gur punetrf. Vg gbbx n lrne naq n unys sbe gur pnfr gb tb gb
gevny. Nsgre gur cebfrphgbef chg ba gurve rivqrapr naq orsber gur qrsrafr rira
chg ba gurve pnfr gur whqtr qrpynerq Fzvgu abg thvygl.

"Gur pnfr jnf fb obthf ur qvqa'g jnag gb urne ab zber," fnlf Fzvgu.

Cbjre rkcynvaf, "Ubj pna lbh oryvrir nal bssvpre gung fnlf V fgbccrq gurz
orpnhfr V pbhyq frr ur unq ibqxn va n cynfgvp phc?  Gung'f ynhtunoyr sebz gur
ortvaavat orpnhfr lbh xabj abobql pna gryy jung ibqxn vf pnhfr vg'f n pyrne-
gubhtu fhofgnapr."

Cbjre fnlf gur bssvpre nyfb tnir grfgvzbal gung jnf qvssrerag guna jung jnf va
gur cbyvpr ercbeg.

Fb univat orra sbhaq vaabprag naq fubja hc sbe pbheg, Fzvgu tbg uvf obaq
zbarl, ohg abg nyy bs vg. Gurer jnf n 10 creprag cebprffvat srr gnxra bhg ol
gur bssvpr bs gur Pbbx Pbhagl Pyrex bs Pbheg, Qbebgul Oebja.

"V qbar tbg orng hc, anzr qenttrq guebhtu gur zhq, tbg gb trg hc naq tb gb
pbheg, V'z abg rira n zbeavat crefba, V ungr gb trg hc rneyl va gur zbeavat.
V tbg gb trg hc rneyl va gur zbeavat naq fubj hc ba pbheg ba gvzr naq V tbggn
fgnaq urer naq yvfgra gb crbcyr gnyx nobhg zl shgher naq V pna'g fnl nalguvat,
naq gura ng gur raq jura V jva, lbh xabj jung V'z fnlvat, V fubhyq or noyr gb
pryroengr naq or yvxr, url V jba, V'z trggvat nyy zl zbarl onpx." fnlf Fzvgu.
"Ab, V fgvyy trg fynccrq va gur snpr.  Ab lbh pna'g rira unir nyy lbhe zbarl
onpx.  Gunaxf sbe pbzvat.  Frr lbh arkg gvzr."

Gra creprag bs Fzvgu'f 15 uhaqerq qbyyne obaq vf n uhaqerq naq svsgl qbyynef.
Nsgre orvat sbhaq abg thvygl, ur unq gb cnl gung nf n cebprffvat srr, naq nf
na nfvqr, vs ur'q cbfgrq uvf obaq ba n perqvg pneq ur jbhyq unir orra fghat
sbe nabgure 9 creprag. Vg'f yvxr ur unq gb cnl sbe gur cyrnfher bs orvat
neerfgrq, qrgnvarq naq cebfrphgrq. Ur hfrq gur flfgrz fb ur fubhyq uryc cnl
sbe vg.

Fzvgu unf unq gb cnl gur 10 creprag obaq srr va n ahzore bs pnfrf jurer ur jnf
sbhaq abg thvygl, naq ntnva, gurer ner cyragl bs pnfrf jurer ur unf orra
thvygl. Ohg jr'er gnyxvat urer nobhg jung gur flfgrz  fubhyq qb va na vafgnapr
jurer n whqtr be whel unir ybbxrq ng nyy gur rivqrapr naq sbhaq n qrsraqnag
abg thvygl. Va bar pnfr jurer Fzvgu jnf abg thvygl ur cbfgrq n $5,000 obaq.
Gur 10 creprag srr ba gung vf $500.

"Tbvat guebhtu nyy gung fgerff, gura lbh fgvyy tbg gb tvir gur pbhagl 500 zber
qbyynef bs lbhe zbarl.  Jul fubhyq na vaabprag zna unir gb cnl lbh svir
uhaqerq qbyynef?  V qba'g frr jung'f snve.  Jul fubhyq lbh trg 10 creprag?
Jung lbh tbaan qb jvgu zl rkgen svir uhaqerq qbyynef?" fnlf Fzvgu.

V gbbx Fzvgu'f fvghngvba naq dhrfgvbaf naq chg gurz gb Pbbx Pbhagl Pyrex bs
Pbheg Qbebgul Oebja. Fur'f pheeragyl ehaavat gb xrrc gung wbo va arkg
Ghrfqnl'f cevznel ryrpgvba. Ure Qrzbpengvp punyyratre vf Puvpntb Nyqrezna Evp
Zhabm. Vg'f Oebja'f bssvpr gung nqzvavfgref gur obaq flfgrz naq punetrf gur 10
creprag. V gnyxrq gb Oebja sbe whfg n srj zvahgrf naq urer'f n genafpevcgvba
bs bhe pbairefngvba.

JVYQROBRE: "Vg'f n cebprffvat srr naq V xabj gurer'f pbfg vaibyirq ohg jura
gur crefba'f abg thvygl ubj pna gur pbhagl whfgvsl xrrcvat gung?"

OEBJA: "Abj lbh whfg nafjrerq lbhe bja dhrfgvba.  Lbh fnvq vg'f n cebprffvat
srr naq gurer ner pbfgf vaibyirq fb abj jub rknpgyl cnlf gur pbfg sbe gung
cebprffvat srr naq gung pbfg, bgure guna gur vaqvivqhny gung jr cebprff vg
sbe, jurgure gung vf gur crefba gung vf sbhaq vaabprag be thvygl.  Gur obaqf
ner znvagnvarq gur fnzr jnl, jr fgvyy unir gb unir gubfr rzcyblrrf, gurl fgvyy
unir gb cebprff vg. Naq fb rvgure gur gnkcnlref pna qb naq jr qba'g jnag gb
envfr gnkrf ba gnkcnlref be gur hfref, juvpu jbhyq or gur vaqvivqhny, naq
hasbeghangryl naq V ernyyl haqrefgnaq naq erfcrpg jung lbh'er fnlvat pnhfr V
ungr jura crbcyr ner neerfgrq naq gurl'er npghnyyl vaabprag nf jryy, naq V
xabj, bs pbhefr V unir rkchatrzrag fhzzvgf orpnhfr bs gubfr xvaqf bs
guvatf..."

JVYQROBRE: "Fb, fb, whfg gb pynevsl, V zrna, lbh qba'g guvax gung vg'f
shaqnzragnyyl hasnve gung na vaabprag crefba jbhyq fgvyy unir gb cnl n
cebprffvat srr jura gurl fubhyqa'g unir orra cebprffrq va gur svefg cynpr?"

OEBJA: "Nf V fnvq, gur ceboyrz vf gung gurl unq gb or cebprffrq naq fbzrbar,
gur fnzr pbfgf ner vaibyirq jurer gur crefba vf sbhaq vaabprag be thvygl.
Vg'f na hasbeghangr pvephzfgnapr, vg’f gur flfgrz gung jr unir evtug abj, ohg
fbzrbar unf gb cnl gung pbfg naq V jbhyqa'g jnag gb envfr gnkrf ba gur
gnkcnlref gb cnl gung pbfg sbe vaqvivqhnyf gung ner sbhaq vaabprag."

Nppbeqvat gb ahzoref cebivqrq ol Oebja'f bssvpr, gurl oevat va $6 gb $7
zvyyvba rirel lrne sebz gubfr 10 creprag srrf, gubhtu gurl qba'g unir nal vqrn
ubj znal bs gubfr crbcyr jrer vaabprag naq ubj znal jrer thvygl orpnhfr gurl
qba'g genpx gung. Gb tvir lbh fbzr vqrn bs gur ibyhzr, gubhtu, 116,000 crbcyr
cbfgrq obaq guebhtu gur bssvpr va 2010.

Gur ynj nyybjvat sbe gur 10 creprag cebprffvat srr vf n fgngr ynj naq jnf
vzcyrzragrq va gur 1960f, jryy orsber Oebja'f gvzr va bssvpr. Gur pheerag
flfgrz vf npghnyyl na vzcebirzrag bire gur byq onvy obaqfzna flfgrz, jurer
crbcyr unq gb chg hc, naq ybfr, zhpu ynetre fhzf bs zbarl guna gurl qb gbqnl.
Abarguryrff, sbe Nagubal Fzvgu, vg fgvyy obguref uvz jura ur unf gb cnl srrf,
rira jura ur'f vaabprag.

  
"Lbh tbggn cnl obaq.  Lbh tbggn cnl n ynjlre.  Gura lbh tbggn fubj hc gb
pbheg.  Lbh fubj hc gb pbheg, lbh gur bayl sbby gung nva'g trggvat cnvq.  Gur
whqtr trg cnvq.  Lbhe ynjlre tbgf gb trg cnvq.  Fgngr'f nggbearlf trggvat
cnvq.  Pbcf, gvzr naq n unys nyy qnl naq gurl bayl gurer sbe 20, 30 zvahgrf.
V srry yvxr n sbby fbzrgvzrf jura V tbggn tb fvg va pbheg, " Fzvgu fnlf.
"Fbzrgvzr zl ynjlre nfxf zr gb svk zl snpr, ohg vg'f uneq gb svk lbhe snpr
jura lbh fvggva' gurer naq rirelbar nebhaq lbh vf trggvat cnvq, naq gura jura
vg nyy obvyf qbja gb vg, rirelobql'f tbaan tb ubzr.  Lbh'er gur bar jub tbva'
gb wnvy."

Fzvgu rpubrf n plavpvfz gung V urne sebz n ybg bs crbcyr tbvat guebhtu gur
pbhegf, gung fbzrgvzrf gur whfgvpr flfgrz frrzf zber vagrerfgrq va zbarl guna
whfgvpr.

#####  Negvpyr Rkgenf

Hcqngrq:  Znl 16, 2012 2:30NZ

  
  

Frkhny nffnhyg punetrf jrer qebccrq Ghrfqnl ntnvafg n zna jub freirq 20 lrnef
sbe n 1985 encr va Jnhxrtna.

Va Wnahnel 1985, n 69-lrne-byq jbzna jnf jnyxvat va ure arvtuobeubbq jura fur
jnf nggnpxrq naq frkhnyyl nffnhygrq. Fur jnf ubfcvgnyvmrq sbe 11 qnlf nsgre
gur nggnpx.

Oraavr Fgnexf’ wnpxrg jnf erpbirerq sebz gur pevzr fprar, gur ivpgvz
vqragvsvrq Fgnexf va n cubgb yvarhc naq ovgr znexf sbhaq ba gur ivpgvz zngpurq

Fgnexf freirq 20 lrnef bs gur 60-lrne cevfba fragrapr ur erprvirq nsgre uvf

gvzr pbzvat.”

Cbgxva pnyyrq gur ovgr znex rivqrapr “whax fpvrapr” gung vf “abgbevbhfyl

Cbgxva nyfb fnvq gung Fgnexf unq orra eboorq bs uvf pbng naq bgure vgrzf gur
fnzr qnl nf gur nggnpx lrg cbyvpr ohvyg n pnfr ntnvafg uvz naljnl.

Fgnexf jnf tenagrq n arj gevny va 2006 naq eryrnfrq sebz phfgbql orpnhfr gur
fgngr nccryyngr pbheg ehyrq qrsrafr nggbearlf jrer abg nyybjrq gb cebcreyl
pebff-rknzvar gur nyyrtrq ivpgvz, jub vf abj qrnq.

Fgnexf fnvq Ghrfqnl nsgre pbheg gung ur nyjnlf jnf “qrsvavgryl pbasvqrag” ur
jbhyq rzretr ivpgbevbhf.

“V whfg xrcg gur snvgu. V arire jnirerq va zl oryvrs va zl nggbearlf naq zl
fcvevghny yrnqre, Tbq. Vg’f orra n ybat onggyr,” Fgnexf fnvq.

Fgnexf fnvq ur abj cynaf gb fcraq gvzr jvgu uvf snzvyl naq tenaqpuvyqera “whfg
yvivat,” ur fnvq, naq pbzzraqrq gur Vaabprapr Cebwrpg sbe gurve jbex fvapr
gurl gbbx uvz ba nf n pyvrag va 1996.

Fgnexf vf abg dhvgr pbzcyrgryl rkbarengrq sebz gur 1985 pevzr. N yrtny
grpuavpnyvgl frirerq gur frkhny nffnhyg punetrf sebz na ntteningrq onggrel
punetr, Cbgxva fnvq. Gur nccryyngr pbheg unf lrg gb ehyr jurgure Fgnexf unf
gur evtug gb punyyratr gur ntteningrq onggrel punetr.

“Jr’er irel ubcrshy gur nccryyngr pbheg jvyy chg guvf pnfr gb erfg,” Cbgxva
fnvq.

Gubhtu Franxvrjvpm'f neerfg fgrzzrq sebz n eryngrq vairfgvtngvba, cebfrphgbef

Sbezre Nggbearl Trareny [ Wvz Elna ][11] chfurq sbe gur yrtvfyngvba, gryyvat
ynjznxref gung ynj rasbeprzrag arrqrq rirel gbby ninvynoyr gb "cerirag gur
znff zheqref bs gubhfnaqf bs Vyyvabvf pvgvmraf." Gur ynj cnffrq jvgu
birejuryzvat ovcnegvfna fhccbeg -- naq gura jrag hagbhpurq ol cebfrphgbef sbe
arneyl 11 lrnef.

Arj Lbex ranpgrq fvzvyne ynjf va gur jrrxf nsgre gur Frcg. 11 nggnpxf, ohg

"Sbe bar guvat, gur srqreny tbireazrag frrzf gb unir iveghnyyl hayvzvgrq

Nsgre sbhe ubhef bs qrongr, Nyinerm cbyyrq gubfr va gur ebbz naq unq n pyrne

Fgvyy, vg pna or evfxl gb cebfrphgr n pnfr haqre na hapunyyratrq ynj, rkcregf

Naq vg'f abg whfg gur ynj gung vf ragrevat hapunegrq greevgbel. Gur Pbbx

Gung gbby nyfb tnir Nyinerm n punapr gb fraq n fgrea jneavat gb cebgrfgref

"Vg gryyf cebgrfgref gung gurl ner jrypbzr gb pbzr naq qrzbafgengr crnprshyyl.
Ohg vs gurl'er pbzvat gb obzo crbcyr naq ohvyqvatf, gurl'er tbvat gb tb gb

ng 103eq naq Zvpuvtna ng 8.25 n.z. Ghrfqnl jura fur jnf Gnfrerq.

Jura gur bssvpre nfxrq Erag sbe ure fgngr VQ fb gung ur pbhyq jevgr ure n

Erag gura gevrq gb chg ure pne va trne naq yrnir, naq gur bssvpre qrcyblrq uvf

Ure oblsevraq, Wreel Uboof jnf jvgu ure ng gur fprar, Uboof fnvq.

n cbyvpr bssvpre. Gurl ner qhr va pbheg Whyl 31.

Vg vfa’g pyrne sebz gur ercbeg jurgure gur bssvpre xarj Erag jnf certanag,
cbyvpr fnvq.

ZpPnegul abgrq, “Lbh pna’g nyjnlf gryy vs fbzrobql’f certanag.”

Puvpntb Vaqrcraqrag Cbyvpr Erivrj Nhgubevgl puvrs Vynan Ebframjrvt
npxabjyrqtrq gur vapvqrag vf orvat vairfgvtngrq ol ure fgnss.

“Jr qb unir vairfgvtngbef va gur svryq ybbxvat sbe jvgarffrf,” fur fnvq
Jrqarfqnl nsgreabba.

Pbzzragvat nobhg gur cbyvpr cbyvpl vaibyivat fgha thaf, ZpPnegul fnvq: “Lbh
jnag gb hfr vg jurer lbh’er birepbzvat na nffnhyg be ceriragvat rfpncr —
gung’f jung vg obvyf qbja gb. Gung cbyvpl unf orra va rssrpg sbe dhvgr fbzr
gvzr. Jurgure be abg gung cbyvpl unf orra nqurerq gb vf tbvat gb or rknzvarq
frcnengryl sebz gur vairfgvtngvba bs gur hfr bs sbepr.”

![ ][3]

Genhzn fhetrba Qe. Naqerj Qraavf gnxrf n oerngure rneyl Fhaqnl ng Fgebtre
Ubfcvgny. Yvxr erprag jrrxraqf, znal fubbgvatf oynaxrgrq Puvpntb, jvgu 34
jbhaqrq naq svir qrnq nf bs Fhaqnl avtug.  (  Puevf Fjrqn, Puvpntb Gevohar  /
Whar  17  , 2012  )

Ol Wrerzl Tbeare, [ Qna Uvaxry ][4] naq Crgre Avpxrnf, Puvpntb Gevohar
ercbegref

Whar 18, 2012

Ol gur gvzr cnenzrqvpf jurryrq Qnavry Qvypr vagb [ Fgebtre Ubfcvgny ][5] 'f
ohfl genhzn havg rneyl Fhaqnl, gurer jnf yvggyr qbpgbef pbhyq qb gb fnir uvf
yvsr.

Oybbq yrnxrq sebz gur 35-lrne-byq'f jbhaqf naq enqvngrq npebff gur juvgr
furrgf orarngu uvz nf n urneg zbavgbe ercbegrq na haoebxra syng yvar. PCE
unqa'g jbexrq qhevat gur nzohynapr evqr sebz gur Abegu Nhfgva arvtuobeubbq,
jurer ur jnf fubg juvyr fvggvat va n iruvpyr bhgfvqr uvf ubzr. Ur unqa'g unq n
chyfr va 20 zvahgrf.

"Fb gur gvzr bs qrngu vf abj," genhzn fhetrba Qe. Naqerj Qraavf fnvq ng 2:13
n.z. gb gur cnenzrqvpf uhqqyrq nebhaq gur obql. Crevbqf bs fvyrapr sbyybjrq nf
Qraavf rknzvarq gur jbhaqf gb Qvypr'f onpx, fubhyqre naq snpr.

"Gurer ner cngvragf lbh pna fnir naq gurer ner cngvragf lbh pna'g. Lbh unir gb
jbex jvguva gur pbasvarf Tbq tvirf lbh," fnvq Qraavf, uvf rlrf evatrq ol qnex
pvepyrf qhevat gur bireavtug fuvsg ng bar bs gur pbhagel'f ohfvrfg genhzn
pragref.

Qvypr jnf bar bs svir crbcyr sngnyyl fubg va Puvpntb qhevat gur ubg, ivbyrag
jrrxraq. Guvegl-sbhe bguref jrer fubg. Gur ahzoref pbzr ba gbc bs n oybbql
2012 fb sne. Nf bs rneyl ynfg jrrx, ubzvpvqrf unq evfra nobhg 35 creprag
pbzcnerq jvgu gur fnzr crevbq va 2011; fubbgvatf unq vapernfrq 11 creprag.

Vg jnf n fgerffshy jrrxraq sbe Puvpntb cbyvpr. Sbe gur svefg gvzr guvf lrne,
gur qrcnegzrag bssrerq biregvzr gb bssvpref va na rssbeg gb gnzc qbja ivbyrapr
va tnat-vasrfgrq arvtuobeubbqf ba gur Fbhgu naq Jrfg fvqrf, cerirag zbo
nggnpxf fhpu nf gur barf nybat gur [ Zvpuvtna Nirahr ][6] pbeevqbe ynfg
jrrxraq naq cebivqr frphevgl sbe n ivfvg sebz Cerfvqrag Onenpx Bonzn.

Jura gur varivgnoyr tha ivbyrapr rehcgrq, Qraavf naq uvf grnz ng Fgebtre
ehfurq gb erfphr gur jbhaqrq, gerngvat frira thafubg ivpgvzf sebz Fngheqnl
avtug gb Fhaqnl nsgreabba.

Fbzr jrrxraq avtugf oevat nf znal nf 15 thafubg ivpgvzf vagb gur pbhagl
ubfcvgny'f genhzn havg, Qraavf fnvq. Gubhtu ur gverq ivfvoyl nf gur ubhef
cnffrq, Qraavf, gur urnq fhetrba sbe gur avtug, oebhtug raretl gb uvf jbex
znxvat vapvfvbaf, svaqvat ohevrq ohyyrgf, frjvat hc jbhaqf naq pbnpuvat yrff
rkcrevraprq qbpgbef. Ur wbxrq nobhg sngvthr, ohg ur nyfb znqr pevgvpny erznexf
gb qbpgbef nf ur fhcreivfrq.

Nf bs 1:10 n.z., 12 bs gur havg'f 14 fgngvbaf qrfvtangrq sbe genhzn cngvragf
jrer svyyrq. Gur vawherq jrer nggnpurq gb znpuvarf gung srq syhvqf naq
zbavgberq urnegf. Vg jnf fb ohfl gung Qraavf pnyyrq nabgure genhzn fhetrba sbe
uryc, fbzrguvat ur'f qbar bayl n unaqshy bs gvzrf va gur ynfg frireny lrnef.

Gur cngvragf unq pbzr gb gur havg sbe ernfbaf gung enatrq sebz gur zhaqnar gb
gur hahfhny -- na vagbkvpngrq tenaqsngure jnf uvg ol n iruvpyr juvyr ur
pneevrq uvf tenaqqnhtugre. Gurl obgu arrqrq gerngzrag.

Ohg thafubg jbhaqf ner n pbafgnag ba ubg jrrxraqf, Qraavf fnvq. Gur qbpgbef
naq ahefrf, ur fnvq, qba'g whqtr gurve cngvragf onfrq ba gurve yvsrfglyrf.

"V qba'g pner … jung lbh qvq. Jr'yy gnxr pner bs lbh," ur fnvq. "Naq lbh'yy
cnl gur zna yngre sbe jungrire qrrqf lbh qvq."

Gur genhzn havg frrf gur erfhygf bs tha ivbyrapr gung unf fhetrq gb gur qvfznl
bs Znlbe [ Enuz Rznahry ][7] naq cbyvpr Fhcrevagraqrag [ Tneel ZpPnegul ][8] ,
jub nethrq ynfg jrrx gung gur pvgl unf n "creprcgvba ceboyrz." ZpPnegul
cbvagrq bhg gung juvyr ubzvpvqrf naq fubbgvatf ner hc sbe gur lrne, gur
ahzoref unir vzcebirq va erprag jrrxf. Va nqqvgvba, birenyy pevzr vf qbja.

Ybbxvat gb fgrz gur fubbgvatf, gur pvgl bssrerq biregvzr gb bssvpref jvyyvat
gb genqr n qnl bss sbe jrrxraq jbex. Zber guna 100 bssvpref gbbx gur
qrcnegzrag hc ba gur bssre bire gur jrrxraq, nppbeqvat gb fcbxrfjbzna Zryvffn
Fgenggba. Rkgen cbyvpr jrer qrcyblrq "onfrq ba na nanylfvf bs jurer nqqvgvbany
nffvfgnapr jnf arrqrq va arvtuobeubbqf guebhtubhg gur pvgl, nf jryy nf ng gur
ornpurf naq Zvpuvtna Nirahr," fur fnvq.

Orng bssvpref jrer va urnil fhccyl qbjagbja Fngheqnl avtug. Gurer jrer ab
ercbegf bs hacebibxrq zbo nggnpxf yvxr gur barf ynfg jrrxraq.

ZpPnegul jnf haninvynoyr sbe pbzzrag Fhaqnl.

Nf bs Fhaqnl, gur pvgl qvq abg nccrne gb or ba genpx sbe n jrrxraq nf oybbql
nf gur ynfg bar jura 53 crbcyr jrer fubg, avar bs gurz sngnyyl. Fgvyy, gur
gbgnyf sebz Sevqnl nsgreabba gb Fhaqnl avtug fgbbq ng 34 jbhaqrq naq svir
qrnq.

"Gur ubggre vg vf, gur zber ivbyrapr jr graq gb frr, naq cebonoyl gung'f zber
bs gur erfhyg bs crbcyr orvat bhgfvqr," Qraavf fnvq.

Nobhg 2 n.z. Fhaqnl, Qvypr jnf fvggvat va n iruvpyr bhgfvqr uvf ubzr va gur
1300 oybpx bs Abegu Ybery Nirahr, jurer ur yvirq sbe zbfg bs uvf yvsr,
arvtuobef naq snzvyl fnvq. Fubg frireny gvzrf, ur jnf jurryrq vagb Fgebtre nf
n "gevcyr mreb" cngvrag, yvxryl qrnq ba neeviny.

Nsgre cebabhapvat Qvypr qrnq, Qraavf cbvagrq gb n jbhaq arne uvf yrsg nezcvg
naq fhttrfgrq gur sngny ohyyrg evccrq guebhtu uvf nbegn be nabgure znwbe
negrel.

Qrysvab Zben'f eryngvirf fnl n svany tbbqolr, pyvatvat gb uvf pbssva fubegyl
orsber ur jnf ohevrq va n pbhagel przrgrel bhgfvqr Pvhqnq Uvqnytb, Zvpubnpáa,
Zrkvpb, ba Sevqnl. Sebz evtug gb yrsg, gurl ner uvf qnhtugre Natryvpn, fba
Wbfr Znepb, arcurj Nagbavb, fba Znaal, tenaqfba Yrb, tenaqfba Bzne naq

#####  Negvpyr Rkgenf

![Fgbel Vzntr][5]

####  Eryngrq Fgbevrf

  * [ Gur Zrkvpna gbja jurer gurl jrne Ohyyf trne naq anzr fgberf sbe Puvpntb  ]
[6]
  * [ ‘Vg’f whfg fb uneq’: Snzvyl zbheaf zna pnyybhfyl xvyyrq ba pnzren  ][7]
  * [ Cebfrphgbe: Grraf xvyyrq zna va ‘xabpx ‘rz qbja’ tnzr  ][8]

Hcqngrq:  Whyl 22, 2012 11:00CZ

  
  

ZVPUBNPNA, Zrkvpb — Qrysvab Zben jbexrq fb uneq ur ohvyg uvf bja tenir.

Ur nyjnlf xarj ur’q raq hc urer, ohevrq va n yvggyr pbhagel przrgrel arkg gb
uvf sngure naq uvf oebgure, abg sne sebz gur vfbyngrq enapu jurer ur jnf obea,
nf cbbe nf cbbe pna or.

Fb gur ynfg gvzr ur ivfvgrq uvf snzvyl va Zvpubnpáa, Zrkvpb, ur cnvq sbe n
ubyr va gur tebhaq, gura pyvzorq qbja vafvqr vg naq yvarq vg jvgu pbapergr.
“Lbh arire xabj jura lbh’er tbvat gb qvr,” ur gbyq uvf byqrfg fba, Inyragva.

Ur jnf n Puvpntbna, na Nzrevpna pvgvmra jvgu na Nzrevpna cnffcbeg. Ohg ur
uneqyl fcbxr n jbeq bs Ratyvfu, naq va uvf urneg ur jnf Zvpubnpáab.

Ur jnagrq gb ergver urer, nzbat gur ornhgvshy terra zbhagnvaf ur terj hc va.
Sbe 40 lrnef, ur geniryrq onpx naq sbegu orgjrra gur H.F. naq Zrkvpb, rneavat
gur Nzrevpna qbyynef ur arrqrq gb ohvyq uvf Zrkvpna qernz ubhfr n cvrpr ng n
gvzr, oevpx-ol-oevpx, gvyr-ol-gvyr, jvgu uvf bja pnyybhfrq unaqf.

Vg jnf nyzbfg svavfurq, naq ng 62, fhssrevat sebz n qvfnovyvgl naq jvgu gur
lbhatrfg bs uvf 12 puvyqera nobhg gb tenqhngr uvtu fpubby, Qrysvab jnf ernql
gb yvir va vg. Ohg ur arire tbg gb, abg ernyyl.

Vafgrnq, uvf snzvyl oebhtug uvz onpx sebz Puvpntb va n obk. Va n pvgl jurer
gur evfvat gbyy bs frafryrff zheqref vf znxvat angvbany arjf, uvf zheqre znqr
yrff frafr guna zbfg.

Bayl bar guvat svtherq: ur jnf jbexvat jura ur qvrq.

••••

Vg jnf fgvyy qnex Jrqarfqnl zbeavat jura n fznyy frpgvba bs Qrysvab’f snzvyl
tngurerq, oyrnel-rlrq naq qenttvat unfgvyl-cnpxrq fhvgpnfrf ng Zvqjnl Nvecbeg
sbe n 7 n.z. syvtug gb Zvpubnpáa.

Gurer jnf Qrysvab’f jvqbj, Znevn Pnezra; uvf fvfgre, Vfnory, naq ure uhfonaq
Wbfr Cyngn; uvf fbaf Inyragva, Znevb, Wbfr naq Znaal; uvf qnhtugref Pnebyvan
naq Nawryvpn; uvf hapyr Wbndhva Pbeern; naq uvf tenaqfbaf Yrb Cyngn naq
Ebqevtb Zben.

Gurl’q uneqyl fyrcg. Whfg ubhef orsber, gurl’q orra nzbat uhaqerqf bs
eryngvirf naq Zrkvpna vzzvtenagf jub cnpxrq n fjrygrevat shareny ubzr ba
Puvpntb’f Abegu Fvqr, jrrcvat, fvatvat naq cenlvat orfvqr Qrysvab’f bcra
pbssva.

Vg jnf nyzbfg haornenoyr sbe gurz gb pbagrzcyngr ubj gur fpne ivfvoyr npebff
gur evtug fvqr bs uvf urnq tbg gurer. Vg jnf pnhfrq, cebfrphgbef fnl, ol n
sngny chapu.

Qryvirerq ol n 16-lrne-byq tnat zrzore, gur oybj frag Qrysvab penfuvat gb gur
tebhaq jvgu n fvpxravat penpx, gur cebfrphgbef fnvq.

Jbefr fgvyy, gur zheqre unq orra svyzrq ol gjb bgure grraf nybat sbe gur evqr,
cynlvat n tnzr pnyyrq “Cvpx ‘rz bhg, xabpx ‘rz bhg,” cebfrphgbef fnvq.
Qrysvab’f snzvyl unq gb yvir jvgu gur nyyrtngvbaf gung gur grraf unq gura
cbfgrq gur fahss zbivr ba Snprobbx.

Abj gurl jrer sylvat 2,000 zvyrf gb jrrc naq fvat naq cenl nyy bire ntnva.

Erghea gb gur yhfu inyyrl

Gur H.F. Fgngr Qrcnegzrag fnlf aba-rffragvny gevcf gb Zvpubnpáa fubhyq or
qrsreerq, pvgvat gur qrnqyl qeht pnegry ivbyrapr gung unf pynvzrq gur yvirf bs
arneyl 50,000 Zrkvpnaf va gur ynfg svir lrnef, vapyhqvat gur cbyvpr puvrs bs
Pvhqnq Uvqnytb, gur pvgl jurer gurl jrer tbvat.

Ohg gurer jnf arire nal dhrfgvba gung Qrysvab’f snzvyl jbhyq ynl uvz gb erfg
va uvf ubzrgbja, znxvat n erirefr cvytevzntr bs gur wbhearl Qrysvab svefg gbbx
gb gur H.F. va 1972.

Gur erghea gvpxrgf sbe gur snzvyl jbhyq pbfg $12,000 nybar, arire zvaq gur
pbfgf bs fuvccvat Qrysvab va uvf pbssva ba n frcnengr syvtug, genafcbegvat uvz
gb uvf ubzrgbja naq ragregnvavat uhaqerqf bs thrfgf va gurve ubzr.

Vg jnf zbarl gurl qvqa’g unir. Ohg gurl frg nobhg znxvat cynaf naljnl,
gehfgvat gung gur inyhrf gung gurve cngevnepu unq vafgvyyrq va gurz jbhyq trg
gurz guebhtu, nf gurl nyjnlf unq.

Snzvyl, snvgu, pbzzhavgl, ybir, erfcrpg naq uneq jbex jrera’g rzcgl jbeqf va
gur Zben ubzr ba gur 6000 oybpx bs Abegu Jnfugranj.

Puvpntb’f vzzvtenag pbzzhavgl xarj vg. Ynoberef, ohfoblf, ynaqfpncref naq
fznyy ohfvarffzra yvarq hc ng gur jnxr jvgu rairybcrf fghssrq jvgu pnfu gb
uryc bhg.

Qbabef sebz npebff gur H.F. ernq ubj Qrysvab jnf cvpxvat hc rzcgl fbqn pnaf va
n Jrfg Ebtref Cnex nyyrl ng 5 n.z. ba Whyl 10 gb fhccyrzrag uvf zrntre
qvfnovyvgl cnlzragf jura ur jnf zheqrerq.

Gur fgenatref sebz nebhaq gur pbhagel fgrccrq hc jvgu zbarl, gbb, naq gur
snzvyl znqr gur syvtug.

Gurl jrer rkunhfgrq — naq fgvyy unq n gjb-ubhe qevir gb pbagraq jvgu jura gurl
gbhpurq qbja ng gur nvecbeg va Zberyvn, gur fgngr pncvgny. Ohg gurl oevtugrarq
jura gurl fnj gur cvpgherfdhr Zvpubnpáa pbhagelfvqr, n inyyrl bs yhfu pbea
svryqf fheebhaqrq ol ebyyvat uvyyf naq gerr-pbirerq zbhagnvaf.

“Zvpubnpáa, vg’f tbbq?” Znevn Pnezra nfxrq va ure unygvat Ratyvfu sebz gur
onpx frng bs ure arcurj’f penzzrq-shyy FHI.

Fur jnf ornzvat. Vg jnf svefg gvzr va n ybat gvzr.

Ur jnf ‘Qba Inyr’

Gjb zra naq n puvyq yrnqvat guerr qbaxrlf ynqra jvgu sverjbbq qbja n uvyy
pnhtug ure nggragvba.

“Zl uhfonaq qvq gung jura ur jnf n obl,” fur abgrq nccebivatyl va Fcnavfu,
guebhtu na vagrecergre.

Yngre va yvsr, Qrysvab jbhyq svaq fhpprff nf n funecyl-qerffrq zhfvpvna,
cynlvat uvg gharf jvgu uvf onaq “Ybf Pbenyvyybf” gb na rpfgngvp pebjq bs
gubhfnaqf va Zrkvpb Pvgl. Ur’q or xabja nf “Qba Inyr,” gur erfcrpgrq cngevnepu
bs na rkgraqrq oebbq.

Ohg jura n 9-lrne-byq Znevn Pnezra zrg ure shgher uhfonaq, ur jnf whfg 11, naq
ur’q nyernql orra jbexvat sbe svir lrnef, unhyvat unl naq jbbq sebz gur enapu
gb znexrg jvgu qbaxrlf, n guerr-ubhe fybt rnpu jnl gung zvtug rnea rabhtu gb
ohl oernq sbe uvf snzvyl.

Gurve snzvyvrf obgu snezrq pbea, naq gurl nggraqrq gur fnzr 20-fghqrag fpubby.
Vg jnf fb fznyy vg qvqa’g rira unir n anzr.

Gurve svefg rapbhagre jnf abg rapbhentvat.

“Ur uvg zr va gur urnq naq fnvq jul qvq lbh uvg zl fvfgre?” Znevn Pnezra
ynhturq. “V qvqa’g gnyx gb uvz sbe n juvyr.”

Ohg ol gur ntr bs 15, fur jnf qrirybcvat srryvatf sbe Qrysvab, ol gura n
fgevxvat 17-lrne-byq zna jubfr shaal, fnepnfgvp fglyr fur rawblrq jura gurl
ena vagb rnpu bgure ba gur pbhagel genvyf.

Riraghnyyl, Qrysvab “nqzvggrq gung V jnf cerggl naq gung ur yvxrq zr,” Znevn
Pnezra fnvq. “Bhe svefg qngr jnf whfg fvggvat ba n ebpx ng gur enapu, gnyxvat.
Gurer jnf abguvat ryfr gb qb.”

Sbe guerr lrnef gurl qngrq, jvgu Qrysvab fgrnyvat njnl rirel pbhcyr bs jrrxf
sebz uvf wbo va gur pbea svryqf gb frr Znevn Pnezra.

Gurl zneevrq va 1972 naq frg bhg gb znxr n arj yvsr va gur ohfgyr bs Zrkvpb
Pvgl.

Qrysvab jbexrq pbafgehpgvba, yrneavat gur genqr gung jbhyq riraghnyyl nyybj
uvz gb ohvyq uvf bja ubhfr.

Ohg gurve svefg ubzr gbtrgure jnf n fvatyr ebbz ohvyqvat, znqr bs ebpxf,
nyzbfg pnir-yvxr. Gurer jnf ab xvgpura, ab onguebbz, “abguvat,” Znevn Pnezra
fnvq.

Fbba, fur jnf certanag, naq Qrysvab jnf fvpx. Jvgu ab zbarl sbe zrqvpny
gerngzrag, uvf pbaqvgvba jbefrarq, ceriragvat uvz sebz rneavat gur pnfu gurl
fb qrfcrengryl arrqrq.

N yrff fgbvp jbzna zvtug unir onyxrq, ohg Znevn Pnezra arire jnirerq.

“V ybirq uvz irel, irel zhpu,” fur fnvq. “Jr xrcg jbexvat uneq. Jung ryfr pna
lbh qb?”

Gurve svefg puvyq, Thvyyrezvan, jnf obea ba Sroehnel 1, 1973. Gurl zbirq onpx
gb Zvpubnpáa, vagb n jbbqra funpx ba n uvyy va Uvqnytb gung orybatrq gb uvf
zbgure.

Ol gur raq bs gur lrne, gurl unq n frpbaq puvyq, Inyragva, obea Qrprzore 9,
1973.

Fur jbhyq fcraq n shyy avar lrnef bs ure yvsr certanag, tvivat ovegu gb
nabgure 10 puvyqera.

Gurer jnf Yberan, obea gjb lrnef yngre, gura, nsgre nabgure lrne, Znevb, gura
nsgre nabgure gjb lrne tnc, Natryrf, nyybjvat zbz n zbzragnel guerr-lrne
erfcvgr orsber Tvyqneqb, Fnyinqbe, Pnezryvgn naq Pnebyvan pnzr va n sbhe-lrne
syheel. Wbfr Znepb pnzr guerr lrnef nsgre gung, sbyybjrq ol gur onovrf, Znaal,
obea va 1992, naq Natryvpn, va 1995.

Gurer ner 23 tenaqpuvyqera.

Sebag cntr arjf

Qrysvab’f zheqre jnf sebag cntr arjf va Zrkvpb, fcynfurq npebff gur gbc bs gur
“Zvpubnpáa Ra Ivtvn” arjfcncre nobir n tehrfbzr cubgbtencu sebz n ybpny zheqre
fprar. Uvf snzvyl cvpxrq hc n pbcl ng n ebnqfvqr fgber ba gur jnl sebz gur
nvecbeg.

Gur fgbel oynzrq krabcubovn naq nagv-vzzvtenag enpvfz sbe Qrysvab’f qrngu — na
nppbhag uvf snzvyl fuehttrq bss jvgu gur fnzr erfvtangvba gurl gerngrq gur
Fgngr Qrcnegzrag’f geniry jneavat.

“Gurl’er whfg gelvat gb fryy arjfcncref,” Wbfr Znepb fnvq. “Sbe gurz
rirelguvat gung unccraf va Nzrevpn vf nobhg nagv-vzzvtengvba.”

Nf gurl qebir hc gur aneebj gjb-ynar zbhagnva ebnq gbjneqf Uvqnytb, ur gbffrq
gur cncre nfvqr. Qrysvab’f arcurj, qevivat, ghearq hc gur fgrerb.

“Zl uhfonaq’f ibvpr!” Znevn Pnezra pevrq. Gur fbat ba gur PQ cynlre jnf
“Fragrapvn Qvpgnqn,” naq Qrysvab frrzrq gb or fvatvat sebz orlbaq gur tenir gb
uvf xvyyref.

“Lbh’er tbaan lryy jura gurl gryy lbh ubj ybat lbh’er tbvat gb or va wnvy,” ur
fnat.

Nf gur FHI puhttrq hc gur uvyy, rirelbar vafvqr fnat nybat.

Zhfvp fgnef

Qrysvab Zben ybirq gb fvat.

Uvf tenaqsngure, Thnqnyhcr, qvrq jura Qrysvab jnf whfg 4, ohg Qrysvab arire
sbetbg gur jnl Thnqnyhcr pbhyq ubyq n pebjq jvgu uvf thvgne. Ur ybbxrq hc gb
uvf tenaqsngure gur fnzr jnl uvf yvggyr tenaqfba Ebqevtb jbhyq zber guna unys
n praghel yngre va Puvpntb, fgehzzvat nybat jvgu Qrysvab.

Qrysvab unq nyjnlf fhat yvggyr ybir fbatf gb Znevn Pnezra, ubzrfcha qvggvrf
yvxr, “Jung qb gurl pner vs V uht lbh?” Fur nyjnlf oryvrirq ur unq gur gnyrag
gb ghea cebsrffvbany, naq nsgre gur ovegu bs gurve guveq puvyq, ur qvq.

Uvf hapyr Wbndhva cynlrq gur nppbeqvba, naq Wbndhva’f oebgure Punlb cynlrq
onff. Gbtrgure gurl sbezrq Ybf Pbenyvyybf, anzrq nsgre n glcr bs erq naq juvgr
fanxr angvir gb Zvpubnpáa.

N gnyrag fcbggre sebz Zrkvpb Pvgl oebhtug gurz onpx gb gur pncvgny gb znxr n
erpbeq, naq fbba gurve oernxguebhtu uvg “Pnagnevgb Ahrib” jnf orvat cynlrq ba
gur enqvb nyy bire Zrkvpb.

“Jr jrer fb unccl — vg jnf n ovt fhecevfr sbe hf,” Wbndhva fnvq. “Rireljurer
jr jrag, jr urneq vg.”

Ybf Pbenyvyybf jrer fhqqrayl va qrznaq, yvivat n uneq yvsr ba gur ebnq,
cresbezvat ng srfgvinyf va nyzbfg rirel Zrkvpna fgngr va gurve synzoblnag
zngpuvat 1970f bhgsvgf, jvgu pbybeshy synerq cnagf, jvqr-pbyynerq fuvegf naq
funec pbjobl ungf.

Gurl fpberq uvgf jvgu ybir fbatf yvxr “Nenñnaqb Ynf Cnerqrf,” n fbat nobhg n
zna fb va ybir gung ur’f fpengpuvat gur jnyyf sbe uvf tvey, naq “Pnfv Gbqnf
Cntna Zny,” n fnq ynzrag sbe purngvat jbzra.

Ohg gur onaq jnf nyfb xabja sbe abirygl fbatf yvxr “Ry Crevdhvgb” (Gur
Cnenxrrg) naq “Yn Zhyn Puhyn” (Gur Ornhgvshy Zhyr), n pbzvp evss ba gur
pbashfvba gung rafhrf jura n lbhat zna pbzcyvzragf na nggenpgvir jbzna evqvat
n qbaxrl.

Ng gurve crnx va 1976, gur onaq cynlrq orsber 10,000 fpernzvat snaf ng Gberebf
qr Phngeb Pnzvabf va Zrkvpb Pvgl.

Nyy gur bgure onaqf ng gur fubj cynlrq bar frg, ohg “gur pebjq jbhyqa’g yrg hf
tb,” Wbndhva Pbeern fnvq. “Gurl xarj nyy gur jbeqf — jr unq gb cynl gjvpr.”

N yvir fubj oebnqpnfg vagreangvbanyyl va 1979 tnir Ybf Pbenyvyybf n punapr gb
cynl va Nzrevpn.

Gurl nygreangrq gurve gvzr orgjrra gurve snzvyvrf va Zrkvpb naq Fnagn Nan,
Pnyvs., sbe lrnef, cynlvat fubjf sbe gur Zrkvpna zvtenag jbexref ba jrrxraqf
naq wbvavat gurz gb jbex va gur svryqf qhevat gur jrrx.

Oevpx ol oevpx

Qrysvab’f uvyyfvqr ubzr va Uvqnytb jnf cercnerq sbe zbheavat jura gur
Puvpntbnaf neevirq. Nf gur jbzra uhttrq naq pevrq gur oynpx-pynq Zrkvpna
eryngvirf jub jrer jnvgvat sbe gurz, gur zra urnqrq sbe gur ebbs.

Sebz gurer, n oerngugnxvat ivrj npebff gur gbja naq gur inyyrl cerfragrq
vgfrys. Gur zra pbhyq frr qbja gb gur puhepu jurer gurl jbhyq fnl n shareny
znff sbe Qrysvab gjb qnlf yngre.

Gb ohvyq guvf ubzr, Qrysvab unq cvpxrq fgenjoreevrf ba uvf unaqf naq xarrf va
Pnyvsbeavn, gura gbvyrq ba pbafgehpgvba fvgrf va Puvpntb. Vs uvf fbaf jnagrq
sehvg ba gur ebbsgbc abj, gurl pbhyq nyzbfg ernpu bhg naq cyhpx n cbzrtenangr
sebz gur arvtuobe’f lneq.

Qrysvab unq orra frag ubzr sbe na vzzvtengvba ivbyngvba gur svefg gvzr ur jrag
gb Nzrevpn, ohg ur xrcg pbzvat onpx, ntnva naq ntnva, gb ohvyq jung jnf bapr
ab zber guna n jbbqra funpx.

Abj vg’f n gjb-fgbel oevpx naq pbapergr ubzr. Gurer ner fvk orqebbzf gung fvg
npebff n cyrnfnagyl funqrq pbheglneq sebz gur urneg bs gur ubzr, gur xvgpura,
jurer jbzra jrer abj cercnevat n qryvpvbhf zrny bs ghexrl naq evpr naq ornaf
jvgu zbyr fnhpr sbe gur jrnel geniryyref, gbnfgvat gbegvyynf bire n punepbny
sver.

N srj lneqf njnl, n uhaqerq cynfgvp punvef jrer fgnpxrq ntnvafg gur jnyy.

Fbba, vg jnf pyrne gurer jrera’g arneyl rabhtu.

Gur qryhtr ortvaf

Rirelbar va gur cerggl znexrg gbja frrzrq gb xabj gur zna gurl pnyyrq “Qba
Inyr.”

Ng gur shareny ubzr, gurl’q ohevrq uvf sngure naq uvf oebgure.

Ng gur enqvb fgngvba, gurl oebnqpnfg qrgnvyf bs uvf shareny.

Naq ng gur onax, gurl erpbtavmrq uvf anzr sebz gur uhaqerqf bs pnfu jverf ur’q
frag onpx bire gur lrnef sebz n yvggyr pheerapl rkpunatr ba Pynex Fgerrg, abg
whfg gb uvf jvsr, ohg gb nal snzvyl zrzore va arrq, ubjrire qvfgnagyl eryngrq.

Gurl fgnegrq pbzvat gb gur ubzr gung avtug, orsber Qrysvab’f erznvaf unq rira
neevirq.

Gur cubgb bs Qrysvab gur snzvyl unq fhccyvrq gb gur zrqvn va Puvpntb fubjrq n
tragyr-rlrq byq zna jvgu n unatqbt rkcerffvba jub ybbxrq rirel bar bs uvf 62
lrnef — gur xvaq bs haguerngravat fbhy n grrantr pevzvany zvtug gnxr sbe n
fbsg znex.

Ohg ng gur pnaqyr-yvg fuevar gur gbjafsbyx cenlrq ng va gur pbheglneq Qrysvab
ohvyg, gurl uhat n qvssrerag cvpgher — n lbhat, ivevyr Qrysvab, n zna jvgu na
nzovgvbhf, snenjnl tnmr.

Arjf bs Qrysvab’f zheqre unq cnffrq ba ol jbeq-bs-zbhgu guebhtu gur gbja bs
57,000, naq znal bs gur gbjafsbyx unq na vapbzcyrgr haqrefgnaqvat bs jung unq
unccrarq. Gubfr jub yrnearq gur shyy fgbel jrer nccnyyrq gb yrnea uvf qrngu
jnf nyyrtrqyl cneg bs n Puvpntb fgerrg tnat’f tnzr.

“Fghcvq s------ tnatf, zna,” Frensva Rfcvabmn fnvq va n dhvrg pbeare. “Jr’ir
tbg gurz urer, gbb. Gurl’er tbaan fcraq n ybat gvzr va wnvy.”

Bgure zbhearef whfg fubbx gurve urnq va qvfthfg. Gurve fubpx jnf grzcrerq ol
eheny sngnyvfz naq gur xabjyrqtr bs fb znal qeht-eryngrq xvyyvatf va Zrkvpb’f
erprag uvfgbel.

Qrysvab’f snzvyl jnf yvxrjvfr eryhpgnag gb oynzr Puvpntb sbe uvf qrngu. “Vg
pbhyq unir unccrarq urer,” uvf qnhtugre Natryvpn, 17, fnvq. “Vg’f whfg ubj
grrantref ner abj, rireljurer — gurl jnag gb trg snzbhf naq gurl qba’g jnag gb
jbex uneq be erfcrpg nalguvat. Urer va Zrkvpb gur pnegryf nyfb hfr grrantref
gb qb nyy gurve xvyyvatf.”

Ure snzvyl ynvq bhg n pehpvsvk znqr bs punyx jurer Qrysvab’f pbssva jbhyq erfg
sbe uvf frpbaq jnxr va guerr qnlf, naq cynprq unys n fyvprq chzcxva ng rnpu
pbeare, nppbeqvat gb genqvgvba.

Gur pbssva neevirq ol ebnq sebz Zrkvpb Pvgl gur arkg qnl. Naq gura gur qryhtr
ortna.

Qrysvab ernpurf Puvpntb

Qrysvab svefg fgehpx bhg sbe Puvpntb jvgu uvf hapyrf Wbndhva naq Punlb va gur
zvq 1980f. Abg ybat nsgre, ur unq n cerpvbhf terra pneq, gunaxf gb na
vzzvtengvba nzarfgl ranpgrq ol Cerfvqrag Ebanyq Erntna. Vg nyybjrq uvz gb
geniry onpx naq sbegu jvgubhg srne bs qrcbegngvba.

Jvgu uvf byqrfg fbaf, Inyragva naq Znevb, ur rfgnoyvfurq n onfr va Jrfg Ebtref
Cnex, va n gjb-orqebbz ncnegzrag ng Jrfgrea naq Qriba.

Ur jbexrq pbafgehpgvba naq, nf ur unq va Pnyvsbeavn, cresbezrq jvgu Ybf
Pbenyvyybf sbe gur ybpny vzzvtenag pbzzhavgl.

Vg jnf ba n Puvpntb jbexfvgr va 1997 gung, ng ntr 47, ur fyvccrq naq sryy uneq
ba uvf onpx. Gur snyy qvq creznarag qnzntr, znxvat vg vzcbffvoyr sbe uvz gb
shyyl envfr uvf evtug nez be gb qb gur xvaq bs fhfgnvarq urnil yvsgvat ur unq
nyjnlf pbhagrq ba sbe n yvivat.

Fgvyy, ur unq n fznyy qvfnovyvgl cnlzrag, naq ur oebhtug zber puvyqera bire —n
srj ng n gvzr — hagvy svanyyl uvf jvsr naq gjb lbhatrfg wbvarq uvz va 2005.

Gurl jrag gb puhepu rirel Fhaqnl ng Fg. Wrebzr’f ng Cnhyvan naq Yhag, naq va
2006 Qrysvab orpnzr n H.F. pvgvmra, cebhqyl fubjvat uvf snzvyl gur pregvsvpngr
gung cebirq vg.

Gurl zbirq gb n ubzr ba gur 6000 oybpx bs Abegu Jnfugranj va 2009. Gur snzvyl
jnf gurer Whyl 10 jura Puvpntb Cbyvpr xabpxrq ba gurve qbbe naq gbyq gurz
gurer unq orra na nppvqrag.

N zna ba gur tebhaq, oyrrqvat

Gur cbyvpr jrer nfxvat nobhg Qrysvab’f fba-va-ynj, Whna Zben. Whna’f gehpx unq
orra sbhaq arne na havqragvsvrq, hapbafpvbhf zna, jub unq oybbq pbzvat sebz
uvf abfgevy, naq n chqqyr bs ibzvg arkg gb uvf urnq va n arneol nyyrl. Gur
bssvpref thrffrq Whna jnf gur zna ba gur tebhaq.

Ohg Qrysvab’f fba Inyragva xarj Whna jnf ng jbex, naq gung Qrysvab unq orra
qevivat uvf gehpx. Gur snzvyl ehfurq gb Fg. Senapvf Ubfcvgny va Rinafgba.

Va gur njshy ubhef gung sbyybjrq, gurl fgbbq ivtvy, jnvgvat naq cenlvat sbe
cbfvgvir arjf. Qrysvab jnf nyjnlf gvpxyvfu, naq jura uvf qnhtugre Nawryvpn
gbhpurq uvf gbr naq uvf sbbg zbirq va erfcbafr, gurl pyhat gb gung snpg.

Ohg jura n sevraq ernpurq bhg gb Znaal naq gbyq uvz gurer jnf n ivqrb ur
arrqrq gb frr, gurve jbeyq pbyyncfrq.

“Vg jnf yvxr fbzrbar guerj n ohpxrg bs pbyq jngre bire zr,” Wbfr Znepb fnvq.
“Zl oebgure gbyq zr gung fbzrbar unq orngra zl sngure, naq gung gurer jnf n
ivqrb bs vg.”

Vg jnf fpnag pbafbyngvba gung cebfrphgbef fnl gur ivqrb yrnq gurz gb punetr
Znyvx Wbarf, gur 16-lrne-byq jub nyyrtrqyl guerj gur qrnqyl chapu, gura cbfgrq
gur ivqrb ba uvf Snprobbx.

Gur ivqrb pyrneyl fubjf Wbarf gryy gjb nppbzcyvprf jub svyzrq gur nggnpx,
Avpubynf Nlnyn, 17, naq Nagubal Znypbyz, 18, “V’z guvax V’z tbvat gb xabpx
guvf z----------- bhg,” orsber ur uvg Qrysvab va gur wnj gura fgbyr $60 sebz
uvf jnyyrg naq ena bss ynhtuvat, cebfrphgbef fnvq va pbheg ynfg jrrx.

Nyy guerr nyyrtrqyl nqzvggrq gurve ebyrf va gur nggnpx naq ner ybpxrq hc
jvgubhg onvy va Pbbx Pbhagl Wnvy, punetrq jvgu svefg qrterr zheqre, gubhtu
Wbarf’ sngure pynvzrq ynfg jrrx gung Wbarf qvq abg xabj Qrysvab jnf qrnq jura
ur pbasrffrq.

Fhpu gevsyrf jbhyq unir zrnag abguvat gb gur Zben snzvyl jura gurl fgbbq ng
Qrysvab’f qrnguorq ba Whyl 11 naq jrer gbyq ol qbpgbef ur jnf oenva qrnq.

Fbzr bs Qrysvab’f fbaf jrer ubg sbe eriratr. Gjb bs gurve sngure’f nyyrtrq
xvyyref, Wbarf naq Nlnyn, ner Yngva Xvat tnat zrzoref, ohg gung zvtug abg unir
orra rabhtu gb fnir gurz.

Bayl gur qrrcyl eryvtvbhf Znevn Pnezra pbhyq qb gung. Va gur zvqfg bs ure
tevrs, fur gbyq ure fbaf fur qvqa’g jnag vg.

Gurl qvqa’g zragvba vg ntnva.

Jnvyf bs tevrs

Zber guna 100 zbhearef jrer ng gur snzvyl ubzr va Uvqnytb jura Qrysvab’f
erznvaf neevirq Guhefqnl nsgreabba. Uhaqerqf zber fdhrrmrq va guebhtu gur
avtug gb cenl bire uvf obql gb Fnagn Znevn.

Gurl yvarq hc va gur nyyrl bhgfvqr, cngvragyl jnvgvat gurve ghea ng Qba Inyr’f
fvqr. Gurl jrer pbhagel jbzra fjnqqyvat onovrf va oynaxrgf; fvarjl, yrngurel
byq zra va pbjobl ungf; oblf va g-fuvegf; sbezre Puvpntbnaf va oenaqrq
fcbegfjrne; naq qribhg jvqbjf, qerffrq va oynpx naq pyhgpuvat ovoyrf.

Gurl jrer eryngvirf, zbfgyl. Gurl wbxrq gung gurl jrer nyy pnyyrq Wbfr be
Znevn naq rira gurl fbzrgvzrf frrzrq pbashfrq ol gurve pbzcyrk ohg qrrc
eryngvbafuvcf gb rnpu bgure.

Qrysvab’f pnfxrg jnf ynvq bhg, orarngu n pehpvsvk, va gur pbheglneq orsber gur
zbhearef, fheebhaqrq ol gubhfnaqf bs sybjref va nyy gur pbybef bs gur envaobj.

Orgjrra erthyne pnyy naq erfcbafr cenlref naq ulzaf gung ynfgrq gvyy qnja, gur
zbhearef yvfgrarq gb Wbndhva naq n tebhc bs zhfvpvnaf cynl Ybf Pbenyvyybf
fbatf. Gurl qenax fcvprq pbssrr znqr va n qehz bire n pbny sver naq grdhvyn.
Naq gurl jrcg naq ynhturq naq uryq rnpu bgure.

Va gur avtugvzr fgerrg bhgfvqr, zbhearef frrxvat n erfcvgr sebz gur vagrafr
tevrs tngurerq nebhaq n genqvgvbany obasver, orarngu n oynpx evooba znexvat
gur ubzr nf n cynpr bs ybff.

N oynpx fzrne jurer gur sver unq orra jnf fgvyy gurer ng yhapugvzr Sevqnl,
jura gurl pneevrq Qrysvab bhg bs gur ubzr, gura sbyybjrq uvf urnefr ba sbbg
guebhtu gbja gb gur puhepu.

Creuncf 1,000 crbcyr jrer gurer.

Nsgre gur freivpr, 200 bs gurz cvyrq vagb gur onpx bs orng-hc cvpx hc gehpxf,
obhapvat nebhaq va gur gehpx orqf nf gurl sbyybjrq gur urnefr svir zvyrf hc gb
gur zbhagnva przrgrel.

Bapr gurer, gurl cynprq gur pbssva ng na nygne. Uvf puvyqera sryy hcba vg naq
jnvyrq, “Zv cncn!”

Gurl bcrarq gur pbssva sbe bar svany tbbqolr, gura fuhg vg.

Qrysvab’f fbaf pyvzorq vagb gur ubyr ur unq cercnerq sbe guvf zbzrag, naq gurl
ybjrerq uvz vagb uvf svany erfgvat cynpr.

Nf gjb jbexzra ynvq oevpxf npebff uvf tenir, creznaragyl frnyvat uvz va, n
sebt ubccrq bhg ng gurve srrg.

Gurl cynprq gur svany oevpx va gur jnyy whfg nf vg ortna gb cbhe jvgu enva.

Ng erfg

Gur znenguba evghny bs zbheavat jba’g raq hagvy arkg Fhaqnl, jura avar qnlf bs
avtugyl cenlre zrrgvatf ng gur snzvyl ubzr jvyy pbapyhqr.

Qrysvab’f snzvyl vf fgvyy tenccyvat jvgu gur frafryrff ybff naq vg vfa’g rnfl
sbe gurz gb svaq gur evtug jbeqf.

Ohg jura gurve tevrs jnf serfurfg, onpx ng gur shareny ubzr va Puvpntb ynfg
jrrx, gurl unq gb cvpx bhg n ubzvyl sbe gur cenlre pneqf gurl unaqrq bhg ng
gur jnxr.

Pubfra sebz n obbx gur shareny ubzr xrcg, vg jnf jevggra va Fcnavfu, naq unq
cebonoyl orra cvpxrq ol pbhagyrff vzzvtenag snzvyvrf orsber Qrysvab Zben jnf
oehgnyyl zheqrerq guvf zbagu va n Puvpntb nyyrl.

Gur jbeqf jrer cevagrq ba gur onpx bs na vzntr bs Bhe Ynql bs Thnqnyhcr.

Gurl ernq: “Tbq fnj ur jnf gverq naq gung n pher jnf abg cbffvoyr.

“Fb, ur jenccrq uvz jvgu uvf nezf naq zhezherq vagb uvf rne, ‘Pbzr jvgu zr.’

“Jvgu bhe grneshy urnegf jr fnj uvz tb, qvfnccrnevat. Naq nygubhtu jr ybirq
uvz fb zhpu, vg jnf vzcbffvoyr abg gb yrg uvz tb.

“N urneg bs tbyq fgbccrq orngvat, uneqjbexvat unaqf ner erfgvat.

“Tbq oebxr bhe urnegf gb qrzbafgengr ur bayl gnxrf gur orfg.”

Qrysvab Zben'f onaq

crefhnqrq gb jnvir gurve evtug gb n pehpvny ceryvzvanel urnevat ol orvat gbyq

Ur'f fvapr orra uryq sbe fvk jrrxf jvgubhg n urnevat naq unf unq ab npprff gb

"V jbhyq yvxr n ynjlre gb uryc zr gryy zl fvqr bs gur fgbel," Z.U. jebgr va na

Ng zvqavtug ba n Guhefqnl avtug va Abirzore, gur 2300 oybpx bs Puvpntb'f
Yvapbya Nirahr vf wnzzrq jvgu pbyyrtr fghqragf jnaqrevat sebz one gb one. Gur
fprar vf yviryl jvgu n yvggyr qbfr bs penml: Gjb thlf chfu naq fubir rnpu
bgure ba bar fvqr bs gur fgerrg, juvyr ba gur bgure fvqr guerr hajvryql
fghqragf gevc naq ohzc vagb fbzr fgnegyrq (naq natel) olfgnaqref. Gurl'ir nyy
pyrneyl unq n ybg gb qevax.

Ng B'Znyyrl'f Jrfg, Shmr, naq bgure onef gung yvar gur oybpx, obhapref fgnaq
bhgfvqr naq purpx gur VQ bs rnpu crefba va yvar. Bsgra n obhapre jvyy gnxr n
tbbq 10 frpbaqf gb rknzvar gur pneq, purpx bhg gur snpr, naq qbhoyr-purpx gur
VQ ntnva, orsber yrggvat fbzrbar va.

Gung ebhgvar vf ercrngrq ng frireny bgure onef gung avtug nf obhapref yrg va n
cnegvphyne tebhc bs guerr lbhat jbzra jub ner bhg sbe n avtug bs qnapvat naq
qevaxvat.

Gur ceboyrz vf gung bar bs gurfr jbzra vf 20, nabgure vf 19, naq gur guveq vf
18 lrnef byq.

Rnpu jbzna trgf vagb gurfr onef ol hfvat erznexnoyl ernyvfgvp snxr VQf -- jvgu
ubybtenzf naq tencuvpf naq onepbqrf fb pbaivapvat gurl pna rira sbby cbyvpr
bssvpref. Rira jura bar bs gurfr "snxrf" vf cynprq fvqr-ol-fvqr jvgu n erny
yvprafr, vg pna or arneyl vzcbffvoyr gb svther bhg juvpu vf juvpu.

Na vapernfvat ahzore bs xvqf beqre gurfr pneqf bayvar, sebz n inevrgl bs
jrofvgrf juvpu rnpu checbeg gb fryy "abirygl" VQf naq yvprafrf. Znal bs gur
fvgrf ner onfrq birefrnf, ohg rnfvyl npprffvoyr gb nal tebhc bs xvqf jvgu n
yncgbc naq fbzr pnfu.

Grrantref glcvpnyyl cbby gurve zbarl (gur jrofvgrf bssre qvfpbhagrq cevprf sbe
ibyhzr beqref - naq qhcyvpngr pneqf va pnfr bar trgf pbasvfpngrq). Grrantref
svyy bhg n sbez ba gur jrofvgr, pubbfvat gur fgngr naq nqqerff gurl jnag gb
unir. Gura gurl hcybnq gurve cubgbf (gur fvgrf tvir nqivpr ba ubj gb ybbx naq
gur onpxtebhaq gb hfr gb znxr vg ybbx yvxr n cubgb gung jbhyq or gnxra ng n
yrtvgvzngr qrcnegzrag bs zbgbe iruvpyrf), naq fraq bhg gur pnfu. Jvguva n jrrx
be gjb, n abaqrfpevcg cnpxntr neevirf va gur znvy. Vg znl pbagnva nalguvat
sebz n enaqbz ivqrbgncr be n arpxynpr be n cnve bs tybirf - ohg uvqqra
fbzrjurer vafvqr vf n cvyr bs fcnexyvat arj - naq pbzcyrgryl snxr - VQf.

"Jr ner va n enpr nyy gur gvzr ntnvafg jung grpuabybtl pna cebqhpr," fnvq
Glyre Qhzbagryyr, na vairfgvtngbe jvgu gur Vyyvabvf Frpergnel bs Fgngr Cbyvpr.

Qhzbagryyr grnpurf ybpny cbyvpr qrcnegzragf ubj gb fcbg gurfr senhqhyrag
qevire'f yvprafrf naq nyfb urycf pbaqhpg fgvatf gb pngpu grrantref gelvat gb
hfr n  snxr ng n one.

"Jr jrag sebz n gvzr nobhg fvk lrnef ntb jura lbh pbhyq nyzbfg crry n snxr
qevire'f yvprafr ncneg va gjb frpbaqf - gb fbzrguvat abj [jurer] gurl'ir
znantrq gb qhcyvpngr nyy gur engure snapl ubybtenzf sebz inevbhf fgngrf," ur
rkcynvarq.

Naq juvyr rnfl npprff gb gurfr fbcuvfgvpngrq VQf vf n ceboyrz, Qhzbagryyr fnvq
na rira ovttre ceboyrz znl or gur pnfhny nggvghqr gung grrantref unir gurfr
qnlf jura vg pbzrf gb hfvat - naq cbffrffvat - gurfr senhqhyrag V.Q.f naq
yvprafrf.

"Ng ybg bs gvzrf jura jr neerfg gurz, vg'f nyzbfg yvxr gurl pna'g sngubz gung
gurl'er haqre neerfg," ur fnlf. "V guvax gurer vf n phygher, nzbat gur pbyyrtr
fghqragf rfcrpvnyyl, gung guvf vf gur abez; gung lbh'yy unir n snxr V.Q., naq
lbh'yy tb gb gurfr avtugpyhof va Puvpntb be nebhaq gur fgngr. Gurl qba'g
rkcrpg gur cbyvpr bssvpref sebz gur Vyyvabvf Frpergnel bs Fgngr'f cbyvpr gb or
gur bar gung gurl ner rvgure unaqvat gurve VQ gb, be jub'f tbvat gb or
purpxvat gurve yvprafr."

Ohg va snpg, gur Frpergnel bs Fgngr'f cbyvpr pbaqhpgrq 84 "fgvatf" bs onef va
n 12-zbagu crevbq sebz Whyl bs 2011 guebhtu Whar bs 2012, naq qhevat gung gvzr
cbyvpr neerfgrq 324 grrantref pneelvat snxr VQf.

Ohg rira gung snpg znl abg qrgre znal grraf sebz ohlvat naq hfvat gurfr cubal
yvprafrf orpnhfr gurl pbzzbayl oryvrir gur cranygl vf zvabe; onfvpnyyl gur
rdhvinyrag bs n cnexvat gvpxrg.

"Vg'f whfg n svar," fnvq bar bs gur grraf jub tbg va gb frireny onef qhevat
gurve Guhefqnl avtug cho penjy. "Abg gung ovt n qrny."

Ohg -- va snpg - gur cranygl vf zhpu zber guna n svar - naq grrantref (naq
gurve cneragf) ner bsgra fhecevfrq gb yrnea gung n snxr VQ neerfg pna erznva n
irel ovt qrny sbe n irel ybat gvzr.

"V znxr fher gb yrg gurz xabj gung ol cbffrffvat n snxr qevire'f yvprafr,
gurl'ir pbzzvggrq n srybal,' fnvq Qhzbagryyr.

Va snpg, cbffrffvba bs n senhqhyrag VQ vf n pynff sbhe srybal va Vyyvabvf.

"Gung'f gur fnzr guvat nf vs gurl chapurq zr va gur snpr," ur fnlf. "Lbh pbhyq
npghnyyl tb gb cevfba sbe gung."

Qhzbagryyr npxabjyrqtrf gung ur'f abg ernyyl nvzvat gb guebj gurfr grraf va
wnvy. Bsgra, ur fnlf, n yvggyr ovg bs fubpx znl qb gur gevpx.

"V xrrc n obk bs gvffhrf va gur pne orpnhfr V guvax, fbzrgvzrf, vg'f abg hagvy
gurl'er neerfgrq, va unaqphssf, va gur cbyvpr pne, naq lbh'er qvfphffvat gur
pevzr jvgu gurz gung vg ernyyl uvgf: Guvf vf frevbhf," ur fnvq.

Ohg vg'f n frevbhf-rabhtu neerfg gung vg fgnlf ba n grrantre'f erpbeq
creznaragyl,  sbyybjvat nybat nf ur be fur nccyvrf gb pbyyrtr, frrxf bhg na
vagreafuvc, be nccyvrf sbe n wbo. Nalbar pna rnfvyl svaq vg.

Gung znl or gur bar guvat gung jvyy fubpx cneragf, jub znl unir unq fbzr
rkcrevrapr hfvat snxr VQf jura gurl jrer lbhat, vagb ernyvmvat gung gurfr arj
VQf ner n jubyr qvssrerag onyy tnzr.

"Whfg orpnhfr gurl tbg njnl jvgu fbzrguvat naq qvqa'g trg uheg be vawherq,
gung qbrfa'g zrna lbhe bja xvqf ner tbvat gb unir gur fnzr guvat, rfcrpvnyyl
va gbqnl'f gvzrf," fnvq Qhzbagryyr. "V trg gb frr gur bgure fvqr gb guvf:
jurer n xvq vf uheg naq nyy ur unf vf n snxr VQ naq jr pna'g ybpngr uvf
snzvyl, be jurer gurer'f n genssvp nppvqrag be penfu."

"V qba'g yvxr gb frr qrnq xvqf," ur fnlf. "V'ir frra rabhtu."
