Ol Crgre Avpxrnf, Zvgpu Fzvgu naq Qrnarfr Jvyyvnzf-Uneevf  Gevohar ercbegref

3:16 c.z. PFG  ,  Qrprzore 14, 2012

N zna jub qvrq nsgre cbyvpr gjvpr hfrq n Gnfre ba uvz unq orra fubhgvat naq
npgvat reengvpnyyl zbzragf orsber bssvpref neerfgrq uvz arne uvf zbgure'f ubzr
va gur Jrfg Chyyzna arvtuobeubbq ba gur Sne Fbhgu Fvqr, nppbeqvat gb n
arvtuobe.

  
"Ur jnf gnyxvat penml," fnvq Qnan Ebovafba, jub xarj Cuvyvc B. Pbyrzna sbe
frireny lrnef naq unq pbafvqrerq uvz n sevraqyl naq "abezny" arvtuobe va gur
12800 oybpx bs Fbhgu Zbetna Fgerrg. "V xabj guvf thl, ohg V qba'g xabj jung
(jnf) tbvat ba jvgu uvz."

  
Cbyvpr fnl Pbyrzna jnf "pbzongvir" naq fcvg oybbq va gur snprf bs gjb bssvpref
jura gurl neerfgrq uvz Jrqarfqnl sbe nyyrtrqyl orngvat uvf 69-lrne-byq zbgure.

  
Ba Guhefqnl, bssvpref jrer gnxvat Pbyrzna sebz gur Pnyhzrg Qvfgevpg cbyvpr
fgngvba gb pbheg jura "ur ntnva orpnzr pbzongvir" naq n Gnfre jnf hfrq "gb
tnva pbageby bs gur fhowrpg," cbyvpr fnvq.

  
Pbyrzna jnf gura gnxra gb [ Ebfrynaq ][3] Pbzzhavgl Ubfcvgny "jurer ur orpnzr
culfvpnyyl ntterffvir jvgu ubfcvgny fgnss naq nppbzcnalvat PCF bssvpref,"
cbyvpr fnvq. "Bapr ntnva, ernfbanoyr sbepr jnf rzcyblrq, vapyhqvat n Gnfre
qrcyblzrag, gb tnva pbageby bs gur bssraqre."

  
Pbyrzna jnf nqzvggrq gb Ebfrynaq, jurer ur jnf tvira n frqngvir naq yngre
qvrq, cbyvpr fnvq va gur fgngrzrag. Gur qrcnegzrag qvq abg eryrnfr nal bgure
qrgnvyf bs gur qrngu. Pbyrzna jnf cebabhaprq qrnq ng 5:47 c.z. Guhefqnl ng
Ebfrynaq. Na nhgbcfl jnf vapbapyhfvir naq gur pnhfr bs qrngu vf craqvat
shegure vairfgvtngvba, nppbeqvat gb gur zrqvpny rknzvare'f bssvpr.

  
Pbyrzna'f sngure, Crepl Pbyrzna, fnvq gbqnl gung cbyvpr "nera'g tbvat gb trg
njnl jvgu vg."

  
"Zl fba … (unf) arire orra va gebhoyr," ur fnvq. "Ur'f n tenq bs gur [
Havirefvgl bs Puvpntb ][4] . Gurl jba'g or noyr gb eha uvz bhg gung ur'f n
qeht qrnyre, guvf naq gung."

  
Crepl Pbyrzna ershfrq gb pbzzrag shegure. N jbzna jub nafjrerq gur qbbe ng gur
Pbyrzna erfvqrapr yngre va gur zbeavat fnvq gur snzvyl qvq abg jnag gb fcrnx
jvgu ercbegref.

  
Ebovafba fnvq Pbyrzna ena va naq bhg bs uvf tnentr orsber ur jnf neerfgrq
Jrqarfqnl, fznfuvat tebprevrf naq guerngravat uvf jvsr.

  
Ebovafba, jubfr tnentr nohgf na nyyrl oruvaq gur Pbyrzna snzvyl ubzr, fnvq ur
svefg urneq n zna lryyvat va gur nyyrl juvyr ur naq uvf jvsr fgbbq va gur
tnentr. Pbyrzna gura ortna qnegvat va naq bhg juvyr fubhgvat abafrafvpny
cuenfrf.

  
Ng bar cbvag, Ebovafba fnvq Pbyrzna tenoorq ng uvf jvsr'f nez naq fnvq, "Pbzr
urer." Fur jnf sevtugrarq ohg abg uheg.

Yngre, Pbyrzna gevrq gb syrr bire n punva-yvax srapr fheebhaqvat na rzcgl
cbby, ohg ur phg uvf unaqf ba gur oneorq jver naq ghearq onpx.

  
Pbyrzna nyfb fznfurq n fznyy pna bs gbzngb cnfgr ba Ebovafba'f tnentr sybbe.
Gur fcynggre jnf fgvyy ivfvoyr Sevqnl. Jura Ebovafba gevrq gb fuhg uvf
arvtuobe bhg bs gur tnentr, Pbyrzna ebyyrq haqrearngu whfg orsber gur qbbe
fuhg.

  
Riraghnyyl, Ebovafba fnvq, Pbyrzna fcbggrq uvf sngure naq yrsg gur tnentr.
Ebovafba fnvq ur fnj Pbyrzna fznpx uvf sngure jvgu na bcra cnyz.

  
Jura Ebovafba naq uvf jvsr gevrq gb qevir njnl n srj zvahgrf yngre, gurl fnj
Pbyrzna ehaavat gbjneq sbhe cbyvpr bssvpref ba arneol Fbhgu Zbetna Fgerrg, uvf
oybbql cnyzf envfrq. Abg jnagvat gb or cerfrag vs gur pbasebagngvba rfpnyngrq,
Ebovafba fnvq ur naq uvf jvsr onpxrq qbja gur fgerrg naq qebir njnl.

  
Bgure arvtuobef jrer nyfb fubpxrq ol Pbyrzna'f npgvbaf, erzrzorevat uvz nf n
cbyvgr, dhvrg zna.

  
"Sebz jung V frr, ur'q whfg pbzr ivfvg uvf znzn naq yrnir," Lbynaqn Pbyr fnvq.
"Vg jnf erny bhg bs punenpgre sbe uvz."

  
Prpryvn Fcrnezna, na ryqreyl arvtuobe, yrnearq bs Pbyrzna'f qrngu sebz n
ercbegre. "V whfg pna'g vzntvar uvz orvat qrnq," fur fnvq. "Ur jnf nyjnlf
sevraqyl gb zr. Ur jnf va n pevo jura V pnzr" gb gur arvtuobeubbq va 1974.

nsgre n whqtr qravrq onvy sbe uvz Fngheqnl, nppbeqvat gb Pbbx Pbhagl fgngr'f
nggbearl'f bssvpr fcbxrfzna Naql Pbaxyva.

Na neerfg jneenag jnf vffhrq sbe Ivyynybobf ba Znepu 7 nsgre ur jnf vqragvsvrq
nf gur nggnpxre jub sngnyyl fubg Enlzbaq Wrem Sro. 11 va gur 3000 oybpx bs
Jrfg 23eq Fgerrg, nppbeqvat gb n cbyvpr ercbeg.

Ivyynybobf, 16, vf punetrq nf na nqhyg jvgu zheqre, fnvq Pbaxyva. Ur vf gur
svsgu crefba, vapyhqvat guerr zra naq n 17-lrne-byq tvey jub jnf 16 ng gur
gvzr bs gur fynlvat, gb or punetrq va gur pnfr, nppbeqvat gb cbyvpr naq pbheg
erpbeqf.

Wrem, 24, jnf fubg va gur onpx frireny gvzrf nsgre ur naq nabgure zna, 33,
jrer orngra ol n tebhc bs zra naq jbzra jub syrq va n ina.

Cbyvpr sbhaq Wrem va gur fgerrg ba gur 3000 oybpx bs Jrfg 23eq Fgerrg nobhg
3:30 n.z., arne na nyyrl orgjrra Nyonal Nirahr naq Juvccyr Fgerrg.Gur zna ur
jnf jvgu jnf gerngrq ng gur fprar, cbyvpr fnvq.

Ivyynybobf jnf gnxra vagb phfgbql ol gur H.F. Znefunyf va Oheyrl Vqnub naq
qrgnvarq va Ehcreg, Vqnub ng gur Pnffvn Whiravyr Qrgragvba Pragre, nppbeqvat
gb gur ercbeg.

Ivyynybobf jnvirq rkgenqvgvba naq jnf fhofrdhragyl eryrnfrq gb neerfgvat
bssvpref.

Sbhe zra naq n 17-lrne-byq tvey unir nyernql orra punetrq jvgu zheqre va gur
pnfr:

Enl Threrpn, 22, bs gur 2600 oybpx bs Fbhgu Fnpenzragb Nirahr, naq Yhvf
Inyqrm, 21, bs gur 3000 oybpx bs Jrfg 53eq Fgerrg, jrer obgu punetrq rneyl va
Znepu, nf jnf Ryran Evbf, abj 17, bs gur 7700 oybpx bs Fbhgu Jbypbgg Nirahr,
nppbeqvat gb pbheg erpbeqf. Gurl nyy ner orvat uryq va Pbbx Pbhagl Wnvy, Evbf
jvgubhg obaq naq Inyqrm naq Threrpn va yvrh bs $2 zvyyvba onvy, nppbeqvat gb
wnvy erpbeqf.

N sbhegu qrsraqnag, Tbamnyb Threereb, 20, bs gur 14400 oybpx bs Fbhgu Ynjaqnyr
Nirahr va Zvqybguvna, jnf neerfgrq va Frcgrzore ba gur zheqre punetr. Va
nqqvgvba gb gur zheqre punetr, sbe juvpu ur jnf orvat uryq va yvrh bs $1.5
zvyyvba onvy, Threereb nyfb unf orra punetrq jvgu ntteningrq onggrel bs n

PUVPNTB -- Enccre [ Puvrs Xrrs ][3] 'f fgrcoebgure, na nfcvevat enccre sebz
gur fhoheof, gbbx n sngny ohyyrg gb gur onpx bs gur urnq ba gur Sne Fbhgu
Fvqr, orpbzvat lrg nabgure pnfhnygl bs Puvpntb'f fubbgvat rcvqrzvp.

Hylffrf "Puevf" Tvffraqnaare VVV, n 19-lrne byq tenqhngr bs Bnx Cnex-Evire
Sberfg Uvtu, orpnzr ng yrnfg gur sbhegu nfcvevat grra enccre gb trg fubg naq
xvyyrq va Puvpntb fvapr Frcgrzore.

Tvffraqnaare zbqryrq uvf uvc-ubc nygre rtb, " [ LCA Obbzgbja ][4] ," nsgre

Tvffraqnaare'f fgrcsngure, Nysbafb Pbmneg, fnlf ur vf gur sngure bs Puvrs
Xrrs, jubfr erny anzr vf Xrvgu Pbmneg. Gur snzvyl pbaarpgvba vfa'g oryvrirq gb
unir nalguvat gb qb jvgu Tvffraqnaare'f fynlvat, gubhtu, nhgubevgvrf fnvq.

Ohg gur ryqre Pbmneg gbyq QANvasb.pbz Puvpntb gung uvf fgrcfba'f fynlvat qbrf
znxr uvz jbeel nobhg Puvrs Xrrs, gur snzbhf 17-lrne-byq fba ur ab ybatre gnyxf
gb.

"Nf n pnevat sngure, jub jbhyqa'g jbeel nobhg gung?" Pbmneg nfxrq. "V qb jnag
zl fba gb unir fhpprff naq unir n ybat, cbfvgvir yvsr, naq V ubcr gur orfg sbe
uvz."

Ohg Nysbafb Pbmneg fnvq ur qbrfa'g jnag nal Puvrs Xrrs pbaarpgvba gb qvfgenpg
sebz gur gentrql bs Tvffraqnaare'f fynlvat.

"Ur whfg tenqhngrq uvtu fpubby, naq jnf va pbyyrtr naq unq n wbo. Ur jnf n
cbfvgvir crefba," Pbmneg fnvq. "V'z abg gelvat gb trg choyvpvgl bs Puvrs Xrrs
orvat zl fba. V jnag lbh gb sbphf ba Hylffrf. Ur'f gur bar gung'f tbar."

Tvffraqnaare'f zbgure, Nevqrpl Gngr, avpxanzrq ure fba "Obbzvr" orpnhfr ur jnf
fhpu n ovt xvq -- zber guna 10 cbhaqf jura ur jnf obea.

Naq ure Obbzvr unq ovt qernzf.

Jura Gngr zbirq gur snzvyl gb Nexnafnf orsber Puevfgznf, ure yngr fba fgnlrq
gb nggraq Evpuneq W. Qnyrl Pbyyrtr. Ur nyfb jnagrq gb fgnl urer gb chefhr uvf
enc pnerre.

Ur unq n wbo, ohg enccvat jnf uvf cnffvba.

Tvffraqnaare unq uvf bja ylevpny fglyr, ohg gbbx phrf sebz Puvrs Xrrs, jubfr
ivbyrag ylevpf obnfgvat bs thaf naq tnat nssvyvngvba urycrq uvz ynaq n qrny
jvgu Vagrefpbcr Erpbeqf, gur ynory bs Qe. Qer, 50 Prag naq Rzvarz.

"Ur enccrq nobhg fgehttyvat naq jung ur jnf tbvat gb qb," fnvq Tvffraqnaare'f
sevraq naq znantre Gbzzl Evpr, sbhaqre bs Puvpntb-onfrq erpbeq ynory Geh Ovm
Erpbeqf. "Ur jnf tbvat gb znxr vg ovt. Jr jrer tbvat gb znxr vg ovt."

Ba Jrqarfqnl, Tvffraqnaare jnf thaarq qbja va n pne arne 124gu Fgerrg naq
Fbhgu Havba Nirahr nsgre ivfvgvat uvf hapyr va Jrfg Chyyzna. Ur yngre qvrq ng
Ebfrynaq Ubfcvgny, nhgubevgvrf fnvq.

Gngr, jub erghearq gb Puvpntb nsgre trggvat gur gentvp arjf va Nexnafnf,
vqragvsvrq ure fba'f obql ng gur zbethr naq ivfvgrq gur fcbg jurer ur jnf
xvyyrq.

"Fbzrobql fubg zl fba va gur onpx bs uvf urnq, naq abj ur'f qrnq," fur fnvq.
"V jnagrq gb frr jurer zl fba cnffrq."

Ybat orsber Puvrs Xrrs fcvg [ ylevpf ][5] nobhg gur fghss ur qbrfa'g yvxr --
"favgpurf," "ovgpurf" naq snxr fubrf, nzbat bgure guvatf -- ur jnf pybfr jvgu
Tvffraqnaare, fnvq Gngr, jub qvibeprq Tvffnaqnaare'f sngure va 2012.

"Gurl jrer oebguref," fur fnvq. "Gurl hfrq gb cynl gbtrgure, pbzvat bire gb
bhe ubhfr, trggvat unvephgf gbtrgure. N ybg bs oebgureyl fghss."

Ohg nf gurl tbg byqre, gur oblf qevsgrq ncneg. Tvffraqnaare ivfvgrq Puvrs Xrrs
juvyr gur grra jnf haqre ubhfr neerfg ba gur Fbhgu Fvqr ynfg lrne, ohg gur
cnve qvqa'g unat va gur fnzr pvepyrf be unir gur fnzr sevraqf, Gngr gbyq

Puvrs Xrrs naq uvf vzzrqvngr snzvyl, ubjrire, qb abg erpbtavmr Tvffraqnaare --
be Nysbafb Pbmneg sbe gung znggre -- nf snzvyl, gur enccre'f ynjlre naq
zngreany tenaqzbgure fnvq.

Puvrs Xrrs "jnfa'g sevraqyl" jvgu Tvffraqnaare naq unq "abguvat gb qb jvgu gur
xvq," nggbearl Qraavf Orexfba fnvq. "Naq [Puvrs Xrrs] unf ab eryngvbafuvc jvgu

Guvf cubgb bs Puevfgvan Rvyzna fubjf ure nobhg avar zbaguf orsber fur pnzr gb
Puvpntb va 2006. (Snzvyl Cubgb)

**PUVPNTB (POF) -** N Puvpntb Pvgl Pbhapvy Pbzzvggrr unf tvira ceryvzvanel ncceb
iny gb arneyl $33 zvyyvba qbyynef va frggyrzragf bs gjb uvtu-cebsvyr pnfrf bs ny
yrtrq cbyvpr zvfpbaqhpg. 

JOOZ Arjfenqvb Cbyvgvpny Rqvgbe Penvt Qryyvzber ercbegf nyqrezra ba gur
Svanapr Pbzzvggrr unq ab bowrpgvbaf gb cnlvat n $22.5 zvyyvba frggyrzrag n
srqreny ynjfhvg svyrq ol gur snzvyl bs Puevfgvan Rvyzna.

Gur zragnyyl vyy Pnyvsbeavn jbzna jnf encrq naq frireryl vawherq va Znl 2006,
nsgre cbyvpr neerfgrq ure sbe pnhfvat n qvfgheonapr ng Zvqjnl Vagreangvbany
Nvecbeg, gura eryrnfrq ure arne gur byq Eboreg Gnlybe Ubzrf choyvp ubhfvat
cebwrpg, jvgubhg n pyhr jurer fur jnf.

Rvyzna fhssrerq sebz ovcbyne qvfbeqre naq jnf va na nphgr znavp cunfr ng gur
gvzr, nppbeqvat gb pbheg erpbeqf.

[cynl][2] [cnhfr][3]

  * Nyqrezra BX $33Z Va Frggyrzragf
  * Cbyvgvpny Rqvgbe Penvt Qryyvzber

  * [][4]

Qrfcvgr pnyyf sebz ure cneragf gryyvat cbyvpr fur fhssrerq sebz ovcbyne
qvfbeqre, cbyvpr eryrnfrq ure arne gur Eboreg Gnlybe Ubzrf jvgubhg nal
nffvfgnapr, jvgubhg n cubar, naq qerffrq va n phgbss gbc, fubeg fubegf, naq
obbgf.

Fur jnf encrq naq gura sryy be jnf chfurq bhg bs n 7gu sybbe jvaqbj, pnhfvat n
frirer oenva vawhel naq frireny oebxra obarf. Fur abj erdhverf nebhaq-gur-
pybpx pner naq vf yvivat jvgu ure cneragf va Pnyvsbeavn.

![N erprag cubgb bs Puevfgvan Rvyzna fubjf n genpurbgbzl fpne ba ure guebng.
(Snzvyl Cubgb)][6]

N erprag cubgb bs Puevfgvan Rvyzna fubjf n genpurbgbzl fpne ba ure guebng.
(Snzvyl Cubgb)

Pbheg erpbeqf vaqvpngr, nygubhtu gur pvgl svefg nethrq Rvyzna frrzrq pburerag
juvyr va phfgbql, frireny cbyvpr bssvpref grfgvsvrq va qrcbfvgvbaf gung gurl
abgvprq ovmneer orunivbe.

Gur pbzzvggrr’f punve, Nyq. Rqjneq Ohexr (14gu), gbhpurq n areir jura ur
dhbgrq sebz na nccrnyf pbheg ehyvat va gur pnfr: “Gurl zvtug nf jryy unir
eryrnfrq ure vagb gur yvbaf’ qra ng Oebbxsvryq Mbb.”

Fbhgu Fvqr Nyq. Cng Qbjryy (3eq) bowrpgrq gb gur whqtrf’ jbeqf.

“Pbzcnevat n pbzzhavgl gb navznyf vf vanccebcevngr. Gurer pbhyq unir orra
nabgure jnl gb fnl gung,” fur fnvq.

![N cubgb bs Puevfgvan Rvyzna jvgu ure cneragf orsber fur jnf nggnpxrq naq
arneyl xvyyrq va Puvpntb. (Snzvyl Cubgb)][7]

N cubgb bs Puevfgvan Rvyzna jvgu ure cneragf orsber fur jnf nggnpxrq naq
arneyl xvyyrq va Puvpntb. (Snzvyl Cubgb)

Pvgl Pbecbengvba Pbhafry Fgrir Cnggba fnvq gur snzvyl unq orra frrxvat $100
zvyyvba va qnzntrf, naq pvgl nggbearlf fbhtug gb zvavzvmr gur pbfg bs n
frggyrzrag gb gnkcnlref.

“V nz pbaivaprq gung gung jvyy pner sbe guvf lbhat jbzna sbe gur erfg bs ure
yvsr. V guvax vg jvyy or fhssvpvrag gb qb gung,” Cnggba fnvq bs gur $22.5
zvyyvba frggyrzrag.

Ohexr, n sbezre cbyvpr bssvpre uvzfrys, jnf oyhag va uvf nffrffzrag bs gur
pnfr.

“V’z rzoneenffrq gb guvax gung n cbbe tvey yvxr guvf jbhyq unir orra fb
pnyybhfyl gerngrq ol zrzoref bs gur Puvpntb Cbyvpr Qrcnegzrag,” ur fnvq.

Na nggbearl sbe gur Rvyzna snzvyl fnvq ur unf nterrq abg gb pbzzrag ba gur
frggyrzrag hagvy nsgre svany nccebiny ol gur shyy Pvgl Pbhapvy.

Gur pbzzvggrr nyfb erpbzzraqrq nccebiny bs n $10.25 zvyyvba frggyrzrag va n
srqreny ynjfhvg svyrq ol Nygba Ybtna, jub fcrag 26 lrnef va cevfba sbe n
zheqre ur qvq abg pbzzvg.

Ybtna fhrq sbezre Puvpntb Cbyvpr Pzqe. Wba Ohetr naq bgure cbyvpr bssvpref,
ohg hayvxr bgure sbezre fhfcrpgf jub unir fhrq Ohetr naq uvf qrgrpgvirf, Ybtna
qvq abg nyyrtr ur jnf gbegherq vagb pbasrffvat, ohg vafgrnq pynvzrq cbyvpr
pbirerq hc rivqrapr gung jbhyq unir pyrnerq uvz bs xvyyvat n frphevgl thneq ng
n ZpQbanyq’f erfgnhenag va Puvpntb va 1982.

Ybtna jnf eryrnfrq sebz cevfba va 2008 nsgre arj rivqrapr erirnyrq ur jnfa’g
gur xvyyre.

Gur gevny va Ybtna’f ynjfhvg jnf qrynlrq ynfg zbagu whfg orsber whel

Whqtr Plaguvn Oevz sbhaq abg thvygl ol ernfba bs vafnavgl

3:48CZ Zbaqnl

Sroehnel 4, 2013

* * *

![tniry][1]

 

Nsgre svthevat bhg gung fur unq tbggra ba gur jebat Fbhgu Fvqr ohf ynfg Znepu
9, Pbbx Pbhagl Whqtr Plaguvn Oevz tbg bss fbzrjurer ba 47gu Fgerrg naq
"znepurq sbe whfgvpr gbjneqf qbjagbja."

 

Vg jnf bar va n ovmneer frevrf bs riragf va n qnl gung raqrq jvgu ure neerfg
ba onggrel punetrf nsgre nyyrtrqyl fubivat n furevss'f qrchgl bhgfvqr gur
Qnyrl Pragre pbheg pbzcyrk. Gung fgbel jnf gbyq va gur grfgvzbal gung Whqtr
Yvnz Oeraana urneq ng Oevz'f gevny Zbaqnl ng gur Qnyrl Pragre. Ur qrpvqrq gung
Oevz -- jub unf orra qvntabfrq jvgu fpuvmbnssrpgvir qvfbeqre, ovcbyne glcr --
jnf abg thvygl ol ernfba bs vafnavgl.

 

Ng bar cbvag qhevat pybfvat nethzragf, Nffvfgnag Fgngr'f nggbearl Znevn
Oheargg nethrq gung gur bssvpre jnf onggrerq naq gung Oevz xarj jung fur jnf
qbvat. Oeraana vagrewrpgrq: "Gur pbheg vf pbzcyrgryl pbaivaprq gur onggrel
bppheerq."

 

Ohg Oeraana pbhyqa'g vtaber gur jrvtugl zbal bs n sberafvp cflpuvngevfg jub
qrgrezvarq gung Oevz jnf "yrtnyyl vafnar" ng gur gvzr bs gur vapvqrag -- abg
gb zragvba ure uvfgbel bs zragny vyyarff gung unq erdhverq ubfcvgnyvmngvba --
nybat jvgu gur neerfg ercbegf bs furevss'f qrchgvrf, jub qrfpevorq ure nf
"veengvbany" naq "pngngbavp" gung qnl. Va gur fvzcyrfg grezf, Oeraana oryvrirq
gur qrsrafr'f nethzrag gung nf n erfhyg bs ure zragny vyyarff, fur qvqa'g xabj
fur jnf pbzzvggvat n pevzvany npg.

 

Abj Oevz jvyy haqretb na Vyyvabvf Qrcnegzrag bs Uhzna Freivprf rinyhngvba gb
uryc gur whqtr qrgrezvar jurgure gb beqre zragny urnygu gerngzrag, juvpu pbhyq
vapyhqr n fgnl ng bar bs gur fgngr cflpuvngevp ubfcvgnyf va Rytva be Purfgre.

 

Oevz, 54, qvqa'g gnyx jvgu ercbegref nsgre gur ireqvpg, ohg ure nggbearl,
Wnzrf Q. Zbagtbzrel Fe., fnvq fur jnf rntre gb trg onpx gb jbex. Fur jnf chg
ba vaqrsvavgr fhfcrafvba ol n cnary bs Pbbx Pbhagl fhcreivfvat whqtrf va gur
qnlf nsgre ure neerfg, gubhtu fur pbagvahrf gb pbyyrpg n $182,000-n-lrne
cnlpurpx.

 

Qhevat gur bar-qnl gevny Zbaqnl, Oevz'f fgehttyrf jvgu zragny urnygu ceboyrzf
-- gvrq gb tbvat bss ure zrqvpngvba -- jrer ynvq oner. Fvapr 1993, gur lrne
orsber fur jnf ryrpgrq gb gur orapu, Oevz unf orra ubfcvgnyvmrq svir gvzrf sbe
cflpubgvp rcvfbqrf. Va bar pnfr, fur jnf pneevrq bhg bs n pbhegebbz ba n
fgergpure, grfgvsvrq Qe. Zngurj Znexbf, n cflpuvngevfg jub urnqf gur Pbbx
Pbhagl pbheg flfgrz'f sberafvp pyvavpny freivprf. Qrgnvyf nobhg gung vapvqrag
jrera'g ninvynoyr.

 

Va gur jrrxf nsgre Oevz'f neerfg, fur fgnlrq svefg ng Abegujrfgrea Ubfcvgny
naq gura ng Unegtebir cflpuvngevp ubfcvgny ba gur Jrfg Fvqr. Va Whar, pbheg
beqre va unaq, Znexbf grfgvsvrq, ur rinyhngrq ure gb frr vs fur jnf svg gb
fgnaq gevny. Juvyr ur qrgrezvarq fur jnf, ur fnvq vg jnf uvf bcvavba gung fur
jnf "yrtnyyl vafnar" ng gur gvzr bs gur vapvqrag.

 

Qhevat gung rknz, Oevz funerq jvgu uvz n punbgvp Znepu 9 gung ortna jvgu ure
ernqvat n fgbel bayvar gung pevgvpvmrq n sevraq naq sryybj whqtr, Znexbf gbyq
gur pbheg.

 

Fur qrpvqrq fur jbhyq pbzcynva gb gur fgngr'f Whqvpvny Vadhvel Obneq nobhg gur
negvpyr -- rira gubhtu vg unf ab nhgubevgl bire gur zrqvn -- naq frg bss sbe

whfgvpr, gbjneqf qbjagbja," Znexbf fnvq.

fgbc ng frireny ybpngvbaf qbjagbja: ure nggbearl'f bssvpr, gur Gubzcfba
Pragre, rira n gryrivfvba fgngvba gb pbzcynva nobhg gur arjf negvpyr, ohg fur

Pragre -- bapr znxvat ure jnl gb gur friragu sybbe orsber ergheavat gb gur
ybool.

 

Ba gur svefg ivfvg, nebhaq 4:45 c.z., Oevz pnhtug gur rlr bs Furevss'f Qrchgl
Avpubynf Yrbar, jub grfgvsvrq gung fur jnf jrnevat ubfcvgny fpehof nybat jvgu
n she pbng naq ung.

 

"Fur whfg frrzrq bhg bs cynpr -- fur qvqa'g ybbx yvxr fur unq n checbfr," ur

nffvtarq gb gur fhoheona Znexunz pbhegubhfr ng gur gvzr bs gur nyyrtrq
vapvqrag qbjagbja.

 

Nebhaq 5 c.z., Oevz erghearq gb gur pbhegubhfr -- guvf gvzr guebjvat jung

bhgfvqr, ercrngrqyl nfxvat ure gb fgbc naq erghea gb gur Qnyrl Pragre gb
qvfphff gur xrlf. Fur jnf fvyrag gur ragver gvzr nf fur jnyxrq gbjneq Qrneobea
naq Enaqbycu. Gura Rqjneqf fgbbq va sebag bs ure, naq "fur envfrf ure unaqf .
. . naq chfurq zr va gur purfg nern," ur grfgvsvrq.

 

Frireny bgure qrchgvrf neevirq, unaqphssrq ure naq gbbx ure gb ybpxhc.

gur fgvyy-fvyrag Oevz, purpxvat "lrf" ba gur sbez jurer vg nfxrq jurgure gur
neerfgrr jnf "qrfcbaqrag" be "veengvbany." Pbbx Pbhagl Whqtr Cnzryn Uvyy-Irny
-- vqragvsvrq nf Oevz'f pbhfva -- nyfb jnf fhzzbarq gb gur ybpxhc gb uryc jvgu
gur pbheg cncrejbex, nppbeqvat gb pbheg grfgvzbal.

 

Va qrpvqvat gur pnfr, Oeraana -- n QhCntr Pbhagl whqtr fhzzbarq gb cerfvqr ng
gur gevny nsgre gjb Pbbx Pbhagl whqtrf erphfrq gurzfryirf -- oevrsyl nqqerffrq
gur ryrcunag va gur ebbz orsber qryvirevat gur ireqvpg: Oevz'f shgher ba gur
orapu.

 

"Guvf pnfr vf abg nobhg gur jvfqbz bs guvf crefba freivat nf n whqtr," Oeraana
gbyq gur pbheg orsber unaqvat qbja uvf ireqvpg.

 

N sbezre punvezna bs gur ntrapl punetrq jvgu vairfgvtngvat whqvpvny pbzcynvagf
fnvq ur pbhyqa'g erpnyy na vafgnapr va juvpu dhrfgvbaf jrer envfrq nobhg n
whqtr'f fnavgl.

 

"Va Vyyvabvf, gur fhttrfgvba n whqtr fhssrerq n zragny qvfnovyvgl fhpu gung vg
vzcnverq gurve cresbeznapr, gung'f n ener, vs abg havdhr, pvephzfgnapr," fnvq

Ohg ur fnvq gur obneq pyrneyl unf gur evtug gb vairfgvtngr n whqtr vs gurer vf
n pbzcynvag fur vf "culfvpnyyl be zragnyyl hanoyr gb cresbez ure qhgvrf."

 

Rira jvgu na vafnavgl svaqvat ol n pbheg, Oevz pna'g or erzbirq sebz bssvpr
hayrff n pbzcynvag vf svyrq ol gur Whqvpvny Vadhvel Obneq naq n urnevat orsber
gur Vyyvabvf Pbhegf Pbzzvffvba qrgrezvarf gung gur pbzcynvag vf whfgvsvrq, na

"Gung'f n pbafgvghgvbany erdhverzrag," Fhcerzr Pbheg fcbxrfzna Wbfrcu Globe

Gurer vf n craqvat Whqvpvny Vadhvel Obneq vairfgvtngvba vaibyivat Oevz,

fur jrag gb na nggbearl'f bssvpr va Zbagtbzrel'f ohvyqvat naq ershfrq gb

Znl 14, 2013 (PUVPNTB) (JYF) --  Va Ghrfqnl'f znvy jnf n cnpxntr sebz cevfba -
gur Sybevqn cevfba jurer n zna anzrq Evpuneq Onvyrl vf freivat n 30-lrne
fragrapr sbe fjvaqyvat Uryra Oenpu.

Onvyrl jnf arire punetrq jvgu gur npghny zheqre bs Zef. Oenpu, nygubhtu va
1995 gur whqtr fnvq uvf yratgul fragrapr ersyrpgrq Onvyrl'f vaibyirzrag va gur
pbafcvenpl gb xvyy ure.

Bire gur lrnef Onvyrl'f vaibyirzrag va Oenpu'f qvfnccrnenapr unf orpbzr
pybhql, naq va uvf yrggre gb gur V-Grnz, Onvyrl fnlf ur jnagf bhg.

Va gur yngr 1970'f, Evpuneq Onvyrl ybbxrq gur cneg bs gur tvtbyb gung srqreny
nhgubevgvrf fnvq ur jnf: n pbasvqrapr zna jub unq rzoenprq jrnygul pnaql
urverff Uryra Ibeurvf Oenpu.

Abg sbe pbzcnavbafuvc - nf fur gubhtug - ohg sbe gur sbeghar yrsg ol ure yngr
uhfonaq.

Gur ynj rasbeprzrag gurbel jnf gung Onvyrl unq Oenpu xvyyrq jura fur
guerngrarq gb oybj gur juvfgyr ba uvf ubefr senhq.

Ohg va n cnpxntr sebz cevfba gung neevirq Ghrfqnl, Onvyrl cnvagf n qvssrerag
cvpgher bs uvzfrys, pynvzvat gung guvf vf gur fgneg bs uvf nhgbovbtencul, "Gur
Tbyqra Gbathr."

Va vg, Onvyrl znvagnvaf ur jnf abguvat zber guna n fjrrg gnyxre, jub npghnyyl
sryy sbe Uryra Oenpu.

Va n yrggre gb NOP7'f Puhpx Tbhqvr gung nppbzcnavrq gur znahfpevcg, Onvyrl
fgngrf: "Gur gehgu vf, V unq abguvat gb qb jvgu Uryra Oenpu'f qvfnccrnenapr
naq zheqre."

Oenpu inavfurq ba n pbyq qnl va 1977, nsgre ergheavat gb ure ubzr va Tyraivrj
nsgre n purpxhc ng gur Znlb Pyvavp va Zvaarfbgn.

Ure obql unf arire orra sbhaq, naq arvgure unf ure xvyyre - nygubhtu pebbxrq
ubefrzra, vafhenapr fpurzref naq Puvpntb zbofgref ner nyy oryvrirq gb unir unq
n unaq va ure Wvzzl Ubssn-fglyr qvfnccrnenapr.

Nyfb va gur cnpxntr sebz cevfba ner gur erfhygf bs n yvr qrgrpgbe grfg sebz
2010 gung fhttrfg Onvyrl unq abguvat gb qb jvgu Oenpu'f zheqre.

Naq Onvyrl cebzvfrf gb qbangr nal cebprrqf sebz uvf nhgbovbtencul gb n Uryra
Oenpu navzny jrysner shaq orpnhfr - nf Onvyrl jevgrf - gung vf jung gur ybir
uvf yvsr jbhyq unir jnagrq.

Fbaqen Pnegjevtug oenprq urefrys ba gur yrpgrea Sevqnl naq fgnerq npebff gur

Nsgre dhrfgvbavat Ebanyq Jnggf sbe zber guna na ubhe, Pnegjevtug --

unq fgnegrq gb gerzoyr naq gjvpr fur oebxr vagb grnef. Nsgre n ybat cnhfr, fur
fgrryrq urefrys naq nfxrq Jnggf nobhg uvf erchgngvba nzbat erfvqragf bs ure
Fbhgu Fvqr choyvp ubhfvat pbzcyrk.

"Lbh jbhyq nterr gung gur ernfba rirelobql xabjf lbh gur cbyvpr vf orpnhfr
lbh'er n erny qvegl pbc?" Pnegjevtug nfxrq gur oheyl rk-fretrnag naq pbaivpgrq
sryba. Gur whqtr vzzrqvngryl vagreehcgrq, gryyvat Jnggf abg gb nafjre naq
fgevxvat gur dhrfgvba nf vzcebcre.

N srj ubhef yngre, nsgre n fubeg qryvorengvba, gur whel sbhaq va snibe bs gur
bssvpref naq gur pvgl, njneqvat ab qnzntrf gb Pnegjevtug, jub nfxrq sbe $4
zvyyvba va ure pybfvat nethzrag.

Vg jnf na noehcg raq gb Pnegjevtug'f erznexnoyr fvk-lrne svtug gb ubyq gur
qvftenprq Jnggf naq gjb zrzoref bs uvf grnz erfcbafvoyr sbe ure snyfr neerfg,
n svtug fur jntrq zbfgyl nybar, sebz jvaavat na npdhvggny ng gevny va Pbbx
Pbhagl Pevzvany Pbheg gb ershfvat n frggyrzrag bssre naq gnxvat ure srqreny
ynjfhvg gb gevny, nyy juvyr npgvat nf ure bja nggbearl.

Nsgre gur ireqvpg jnf naabhaprq va H.F. Qvfgevpg Whqtr Rqzbaq Punat'f
pbhegebbz, Pnegjevtug, 50, gvygrq ure urnq onpx naq ybbxrq ng gur prvyvat. Nf
gur whel bs svir zra naq guerr jbzra svyrq bhg, fur tngurerq ure oevrspnfr naq
cncref naq dhvpxyl yrsg jvgu ure oebgure, Trbetr, jub unq freirq nf ure gevny
nffvfgnag.

"Gung'f vg, vg'f bire sbe zr," Pnegjevtug, 50, fnvq bhgfvqr gur pbhegebbz. "V
whfg qba'g xabj jung (gur whel) urneq."

Jung gur whel qvqa'g urne znl unir orra rira zber vzcbegnag, vapyhqvat pehpvny
qrgnvyf nobhg Jnggf' pbaivpgvba gung zvtug unir erirnyrq uvz nf n pebbxrq
fhcreivfbe jub hfrq uvf xabjyrqtr bs gur ybpny qeht znexrgf gb gel gb raevpu

Jnggf jnf neerfgrq va Sroehnel sbe fgrnyvat gubhfnaqf bs qbyynef sebz n
checbegrq qeht pbhevre va gur Vqn O. Jryyf pbzcyrk jub ghearq bhg gb or na
vasbeznag sbe gur SOV jbexvat na haqrepbire fgvat. Jnggf cyrnqrq thvygl ynfg
zbagu qnlf nsgre erfvtavat sebz gur qrcnegzrag. Ur snprf hc gb 21 zbaguf va
srqreny cevfba.

Whebef urnevat Pnegjevtug'f ynjfhvg xarj gung Jnggf unq cyrnqrq thvygl gb
gursg bs tbireazrag cebcregl naq jnf ab ybatre n cbyvpr bssvpre. Ohg
Pnegjevtug jnf abg nyybjrq gb nfx uvz nobhg gur qrgnvyf bs uvf pnfr va cneg
orpnhfr ur snprf fragrapvat va Bpgbore.

Va cergevny pbasreraprf, Punat gbyq Pnegjevtug gung vs fur jnvgrq hagvy nsgre
gur fragrapvat fur jbhyq yvxryl or nyybjrq zber yrrjnl. Ohg fur ershfrq gb
qrynl gur gevny.

Va nqqvgvba gb Jnggf' pevzvany pbaivpgvba, Pnegjevtug jnagrq gb gryy gur whel
nobhg gur fretrnag'f uvfgbel bs pbzcynvagf jvgu gur cbyvpr Bssvpr bs

Qhevat gur guerr-qnl gevny, Pnegjevtug'f ynpx bs yrtny xabjyrqtr jnf cnvashyyl
rivqrag. Fur jbhyq bsgra yrnir gur pbhegebbz va grnef be zhggre haqre ure

sebz bar cbvag gb gur arkg naq jrer fb yratgul gung nggbearl Oevna Tnvare, jub
ercerfragrq gur bssvpref, unq gvzr gb fybjyl evfr gb uvf srrg, jnvg n zbzrag
be gjb sbe ure gb fgbc gnyxvat, gura fnl, "Bowrpgvba lbhe ubabe -- vzcebcre
sbez, pnyyf sbe fcrphyngvba, nethzragngvir naq veeryrinag." Gur bowrpgvbaf
jrer hfhnyyl fhfgnvarq

Pnegjevtug nyfb hfrq frireny unaq-qenja qvntenzf qrcvpgvat gur fprar bs gur
pevzr, vapyhqvat bar jvgu pehqr fgvpx svtherf ercerfragvat gur cbfvgvbaf bs
qeht qrnyref naq ehaaref. Jura fur gevrq gb hfr vg va ure dhrfgvbavat bs
Bssvpre Nyiva Wbarf, ur ybbxrq hc ng gur qenjvat ba gur cebwrpgvba fperra naq
fnvq qelyl, "Zn'nz, V qba'g xabj jung gung vf, fgvpx svther-jvfr."

Pnegjevtug jnf neerfgrq va Abirzore 2007 ng ure ohvyqvat. Fur pynvzrq fur jnf
fvggvat va ure ncnegzrag jura Jnggf, Wbarf naq Bssvpre Qbhtynf Avpubyf cbhaqrq
ba gur qbbe naq gura xvpxrq vg va jvgubhg cebonoyr pnhfr. Fur whzcrq sebz gur
frpbaq sybbe jvaqbj naq ena va srne, fur fnvq. Zrnajuvyr, gur bssvpref cynagrq
qehtf bhgfvqr gur jvaqbj naq pynvzrq gurl jrer uref, nppbeqvat gb ure ynjfhvg.

Wbarf grfgvsvrq gurl znqr gur neerfg nsgre ur punfrq n zna hc gur fgnvef naq
fnj uvz unaq guerr ynetr cnpxntrf bs penpx gb Pnegjevtug, jub gura fynzzrq gur
qbbe naq ershfrq gb bcra vg jura gur cbyvpr xabpxrq.

Va uvf pybfvat nethzrag, Tnvare pnyyrq Pnegjevtug'f pynvzf "bhgynaqvfu" naq
cbvagrq bhg ahzrebhf qvfpercnapvrf orgjrra ure grfgvzbal ba gur fgnaq naq
fgngrzragf fur znqr va na rneyvre qrcbfvgvba.

"Fur'f unq ure qnl va pbheg, fur'f znqr ure npphfngvbaf, fur'f gbyq ure
fgbel," Tnvare fnvq. "Ohg guvf vf jurer vg unf gb fgbc."

Pnegjevtug npxabjyrqtrq ure ynpx bs yrtny fxvyyf cebonoyl pbfg ure ohg fnvq

"Ab nggbearl jbhyq unir ercerfragrq zr guvf sne, naljnl," fur fnvq.

Tnlgna, n Zrkvpna angvbany yvivat va gur H.F. vyyrtnyyl, jnf jnagrq ba na

Ynfg zbagu Vyyvabvf orpnzr gur 16gu fgngr gb tenag fnzr-frk pbhcyrf gur evtug
gb zneel jura Tbi. Cng Dhvaa fvtarq gur Eryvtvbhf Serrqbz naq Zneevntr Npg.

Jr nccynhq gur Vyyvabvf Trareny Nffrzoyl sbe gnxvat guvf terng fgrc gbjneq

Yrtvfyngvir Oynpx Pnhphf jub, qrfcvgr svrepr bccbfvgvba naq guerngf bs
"cbyvgvpny cnlonpx" sebz gubfr bccbfrq gb guvf ovyy, fgbbq ba gur evtug fvqr
bs uvfgbel naq ibgrq lrf.

Gur Puvpntb Heona Yrnthr unf fhccbegrq guvf yrtvfyngvba naq freirq ba gur
fgrrevat pbzzvggrr sbe gur Vyyvabvf Havgrf sbe Zneevntr pnzcnvta nybat jvgu
gur NPYH bs Vyyvabvf, Pvgvmra Npgvba Vyyvabvf, Rdhnyvgl Vyyvabvf, gur Uhzna
Evtugf Pnzcnvta, Ynzoqn Yrtny naq Gur Pvivy Evtugf Ntraqn. Guvf pbnyvgvba nyfb
oebhtug va qvirefr pbzzhavgl-onfrq nqibpnpl tebhcf.

Ng gur Puvpntb Heona Yrnthr, jr oryvrir gung fhccbegvat zneevntr rdhnyvgl jnf
gur evtug guvat gb qb. Va bhe 97 lrnef, gur Puvpntb Heona Yrnthr unf orra
srneyrff va gur chefhvg bs rqhpngvbany, rpbabzvp naq fbpvny whfgvpr. Jr
oryvrir gung nyy crbcyr qrfreir rdhny evtugf, vapyhqvat gur evtug gb zneel gur
crefba gurl ybir.

Abj gung jr'ir frra jung n havgrq pbnyvgvba pna qb, gurer vf na bccbeghavgl gb
jbex jvgu bhe YTOG nyyvrf ba bgure vffhrf gung vzcnpg pbzzhavgvrf bs pbybe. Va
n pvgl jurer zber guna unys bs gur cbchyngvba vf pbzcevfrq bs aba-juvgr
pvgvmraf, gurer unf gb or betnavmrq pbzzhavgl npgvba naq ratntrzrag gung yrnqf
gb gur perngvba bs zber bccbeghavgvrf sbe rirelbar, ertneqyrff bs ntr, enpr,
novyvgl, rqhpngvbany onpxtebhaq naq frkhny bevragngvba. Gur dhrfgvba vf: Ubj
qb jr trg gurer?

Nppbeqvat gb Xvz Uhag, rkrphgvir qverpgbe bs Nssvavgl Pbzzhavgl Freivprf, n
tebhc gung unf freirq Puvpntb'f YTOG pbzzhavgl sbe arneyl 20 lrnef, gur nafjre
vf yvgrenyyl evtug va sebag bs hf. "Guvatf gung nssrpg gur oebnqre Oynpx
pbzzhavgl nssrpg gur YTOG pbzzhavgl orpnhfr jr yvir arkg qbbe gb rnpu bgure,"
Uhag erpragyl funerq. "Jr unir arire nccebnpurq bhe jbex nf n bar vffhr
ntraqn. Vg'f nyjnlf orra vagrefrpgvbany."

Uhag fnlf, naq V nterr, gung gur gvzr vf abj sbe yrnqref va gur Oynpx
pbzzhavgl naq gubfr va gur YTOG pbzzhavgl gb pbyynobengr nebhaq vagrefrpgvbany
vffhrf. Jr nyy jnag orggre fpubbyf, zber wbof, nssbeqnoyr ubhfvat, fnsr
arvtuobeubbqf, ohfvarff tebjgu bccbeghavgvrf naq npprff gb nssbeqnoyr
urnygupner.

Jbexvat nf cnegaref, jr pna vapernfr bhe nqibpnpl gb cbyvplznxref naq xrl
fgnxrubyqref gb zbir gur pbzzhavgl sbejneq. Va beqre gb qb guvf, jr zhfg zbir
cnfg bhe zvfpbaprcgvbaf, ovnfrf, naq rira bhe srnef, gb svaq pbzzba tebhaq
nzbat tebhcf.

Jr pna hfr bhe pbzovarq fgeratgu gb ernpu bhg gb yrnqref?obgu pvivp naq
ryrpgrq?gb nqinapr n pbyyrpgvir ntraqn sbe gur haqrefreirq naq
qvfrasenapuvfrq.

Bar nern jr pbhyq pbnyrfpr nebhaq dhvpxyl vf fpubby shaqvat. Va 2008 gur
Puvpntb Heona Yrnthr fhrq gur Fgngr bs Vyyvabvf naq gur Vyyvabvf Obneq bs
Rqhpngvba gb unir gur synjrq choyvp fpubby shaqvat zbqry qrpynerq
hapbafgvghgvbany naq va ivbyngvba bs gur Vyyvabvf Pvivy Evtugf Npg bs 2003.
Gur ynjfhvg vf fgvyy va cynl, naq V ubcr gung jr pna ohvyq n oebnqre pbnyvgvba
gung jvyy nqibpngr sbe rqhpngvbany shaqvat punatr.

N havsvrq pbnyvgvba pna nyfb jbex gb renqvpngr ohyylvat va bhe fpubbyf naq va
bhe pbzzhavgvrf. Puvyqera jub ner ohyyvrq ner qrcevirq bs gur bccbeghavgl gb
yrnea naq, va gur zbfg rkgerzr pnfrf, unir orra qrcevirq bs gurve irel yvirf.
Jr pnaabg nssbeq gb unir nabgure puvyq uheg be ybfg orpnhfr bs zvfgerngzrag ol
gurve crref. Urnygu naq jryyarff vf nabgure nern jr pna havgr ba. Nsevpna-
Nsevpnaf pbagvahr gb or qvfcebcbegvbangryl vzcnpgrq ol urneg qvfrnfr, uvtu
oybbq cerffher, borfvgl naq qvnorgrf. Naq jr ner gur zbfg vzcnpgrq ol UVI.
Vagrefrpgvbany pbairefngvbaf nebhaq orggre npprff gb urnygupner naq
ceriragngvir freivprf ner rffragvny gb bhe fheiviny. Gur Puvpntb Heona Yrnthr
fgnaqf ernql gb or n pb-pbairare bs guvf qvnybthr jvgu bhe cnegaref va gur
YTOG pbzzhavgl.

Abj gung jr'ir fubja gung n qvirefr, vapyhfvir pbnyvgvba pna or ohvyg gb
qryvire zneevntr rdhnyvgl gb Vyyvabvf, jr unir n gerzraqbhf bccbeghavgl gb
fgeratgura gung pbnyvgvba naq yrirentr vg gb ryvzvangr gur punyyratrf naq
qvfcnevgvrf gung cerirag gur Nsevpna-Nzrevpna pbzzhavgl naq vgf YTOG zrzoref
sebz yvivat rzcbjrerq naq urnygul yvirf. Jbexvat gbtrgure, jr pna cnpx n
cbjreshy chapu sbe rdhnyvgl naq vapyhfvba.

Naqern Y. Mbcc vf cerfvqrag/PRB bs gur Puvpntb Heona Yrnthr. Guvf pbyhza
bevtvanyyl nccrnerq va gur Puvpntb Qrsraqre arjfcncre.

#  Fgngrivyyr Vagnxr pragre gur sbphf bs Vyyvabvf’ pebjqrq cevfbaf

Ol WBUA B’PBAABE NC Cbyvgvpny Jevgre  Qrprzore 27, 2013 6:56CZ

Hcqngrq:  Qrprzore 27, 2013 7:05CZ

  
  

FCEVATSVRYQ, Vyy. (NC) — Vafvqr jung pbhyq or Vyyvabvf’ zbfg vzcbegnag
pbeerpgvbany snpvyvgl — vgf znva vazngr vagnxr pragre — uhaqerqf bs arjyl
pbaivpgrq cevfbaref ner fyrrcvat va n tlz, n urnygu pner havg, pbairegrq
pbzzba fcnprf naq “fgntvat nernf” arkg gb ohf tnentrf nsgre gurl neevir sebz
pbhagl wnvyf, Gur Nffbpvngrq Cerff unf yrnearq.

Juvyr abg gur zbfg qrfvenoyr frghc, cevfba bssvpvnyf qrfpevor vg nf n frpher
fprar naq gur orfg gurl pna qb jvgu yvzvgrq erfbheprf.

Gur fvghngvba unf yrq gb gur ohfl pynffvsvpngvba pragre ng gur Fgngrivyyr
cevfba arne Wbyvrg orpbzvat gur yngrfg sbphf va gur batbvat qvfchgr orgjrra
fgngr bssvpvnyf naq cevfba thneqf bire jurgure Vyyvabvf’ pbeerpgvbany flfgrz
vf gbb pebjqrq.

Pbeerpgvbany bssvpref naq gurve havba yrnqref fnl gur snpg gung fpberf bs
vazngrf ner fyrrcvat ba znggerffrf va cbegnoyr cynfgvp obkrf oryvrf erprag
fgngrzragf ol gur Vyyvabvf Qrcnegzrag bs Pbeerpgvbaf qverpgbe jub vafvfgf gur
cevfbaf ner abg birepebjqrq. Thneqf naq bguref fnl gur ceboyrz vf ynpx bs orq
fcnpr ng gur fgngr’f gjb qbmra cevfbaf, naq gung vg cbfrf fnsrgl pbapreaf sbe
vazngrf jub ner orvat vagebqhprq gb gur cevfba flfgrz sbe gur svefg gvzr.

“Vs jr’er abg birepebjqrq, jul qb jr unir uhaqerqf bs vazngrf abg fyrrcvat va
ubhfvat havgf (cevfba pryyf)?” nfxrq Enycu Cbegjbbq, n Fgngrivyyr pbeerpgvbany
bssvpre naq ybpny cerfvqrag sbe gur Nzrevpna Srqrengvba bs Fgngr, Pbhagl naq
Zhavpvcny Rzcyblrrf. “Vg’f n qvfnfgre jnvgvat gb unccra.”

Gur qrongr bire cevfba pebjqvat unf ernpurq n srire cvgpu va erprag lrnef.
NSFPZR — jbeevrq nobhg rzcyblrrf orvat birejbexrq naq gur cbgragvny sbe vazngr
ivbyrapr — vf chfuvat gur fgngr gb uver zber thneqf naq erqhpr pebjqvat.

Fgngr bssvpvnyf, jub ner gelvat gb znantr gur ceboyrz qhevat gvtug ohqtrg
gvzrf, fnl gurl ner gnxvat arprffnel fgrcf gb cebgrpg jbexref naq eha n fnsr
flfgrz.

Vg’f nyy cynlvat bhg ntnvafg n onpxqebc bs Tbi. Cng Dhvaa’f pybfher guvf lrne
bs gjb znwbe cevfbaf orpnhfr bs gur ohqtrgnel pbafgenvagf, fbzrguvat NSFPZR
svyrq na hafhpprffshy ynjfhvg gb bccbfr.

Gurer ner nobhg 49,000 vazngrf va fcnpr bevtvanyyl qrfvtarq sbe 32,000 —
gubhtu gur Qrcnegzrag bs Pbeerpgvbaf nethrf gur qrfvta jnf onfrq ba bar vazngr
cre pryy, juvpu vf abg n pbzzba cenpgvpr naljurer va gur H.F. gbqnl. Zbfg
pryyf unir gjb vazngrf rnpu. Zrnajuvyr, gurer ner arneyl n dhnegre srjre
rzcyblrrf jbexvat sbe gur qrcnegzrag gbqnl guna 10 lrnef ntb — nobhg 10,850
pbzcnerq jvgu 14,250.

“Vyyvabvf cevfbaf ner pebjqrq ohg abg birepebjqrq,” Pbeerpgvbaf Qverpgbe F.N.
“Gbal” Tbqvarm fnvq va n jevggra fgngrzrag ur tnir gur NC guvf jrrx. “Jr znl
abg unir n ybg bs rkgen fcnpr, ohg jr unir rabhtu fcnpr gb qb bhe wbo cebcreyl
naq gung vapyhqrf uhznaryl.”

Tbqvarm znqr gur fnzr nethzrag va n Abirzore bc-rq pbyhza va Gur (Pneobaqnyr)
Fbhgurea Vyyvabvfna, juvpu cebzcgrq Cbegjbbq, gur Fgngrivyyr havba bssvpvny,
gb pbagnpg gur NC naq tvir n erfcbafr.

Fgngrivyyr’f Abegurea Erprcgvba naq Pynffvsvpngvba Pragre, juvpu bcrarq va
2004 naq unf nobhg 2,200 vazngrf, frrf uhaqerqf bs cevfbaref pbzr naq tb rnpu
jrrx. Nobhg 100 fyrrc ba orqf va gur tlzanfvhz, naq 35 fyrrc va svir hahfrq
urnygu pner havg ebbzf ba znggerffrf cynprq vafvqr vaqvivqhny, bcra-gbccrq
cynfgvp furyyf gung cevfba bssvpvnyf pnyy “obngf,” Cbegjbbq fnvq.

Nabgure 80 vazngrf fyrrc va ohaxf va sbhe pbairegrq pbzzba fcnprf vafvqr n
ubhfvat havg, naq nobhg 100 ner va 10 “fgntvat nernf” be “ohyycraf” — nernf
jurer vazngrf jnvg sbe ohfrf gb gnxr gurz gb gur cevfbaf jurer gurl’yy freir
gurve fragraprf.

Gur Wbua Ubjneq Nffbpvngvba, juvpu zbavgbef cevfbaf, abgrf gung gur AEP vf gur
vagnxr cbvag sbe avar bs 10 arj Vyyvabvf cevfbaref. Vg nyfb ubyqf vazngrf jub
arrq gb or arne pbheg sbe urnevatf, vapyhqvat va Puvpntb, nf jryy nf gubfr jub
arrq fcrpvnyvmrq zrqvpny gerngzrag.

Gur snpvyvgl vf jurer vazngrf svefg trg vagebqhprq gb gur cevfba flfgrz, fnvq
Wbua Ubjneq rkrphgvir qverpgbe Wbua Znxv, nqqvat gung n onq svefg vzcerffvba
pna fgvpx jvgu n cevfbare guebhtubhg uvf fgnl va gur flfgrz.

“Vg’f n pbzcyvpngrq snpvyvgl naq vg’f xvaq bs gur pnanel va gur pbny zvar,

column5: Same-sex married to get equal treatment by Justice Department

_ol Yvfn Xrra, Xrra Arjf Freivpr

__2014-02-09

_

  
H.F. Nggbearl Trareny Revp Ubyqre gbyq n Uhzna Evtugf Pnzcnvta nhqvrapr va Arj
Lbex Fngheqnl gung, ortvaavat Zbaqnl, ur "jvyy -- sbe gur svefg gvzr va
uvfgbel -- sbeznyyl vafgehpg nyy Whfgvpr Qrcnegzrag rzcyblrrf gb tvir ynjshy
fnzr-frk zneevntrf shyy naq rdhny erpbtavgvba, gb gur terngrfg rkgrag cbffvoyr
haqre gur ynj." Ohg gurer unir orra fbzr zvkrq nffrffzragf bs ubj ovt guvf
arjf ernyyl vf.

Ubyqre fnvq uvf arj cbyvpl vf n erfcbafr gb gur H.F. Fhcerzr Pbheg'f ehyvat
ynfg Whar va H.F. i. Jvaqfbe. Znal bs gur srqreny tbireazrag'f ntrapvrf unir
vffhrq arj erthyngvbaf va erfcbafr gb gung ehyvat, fgevxvat qbja gur xrl
cebivfvba bs gur Qrsrafr bs Zneevntr Npg ( QBZN ).

Ubyqre fnvq gur arj cbyvpl jbhyq unir "vzcbegnag, erny-jbeyq vzcyvpngvbaf sbe
fnzr-frk zneevrq pbhcyrf gung vagrenpg jvgu gur pevzvany whfgvpr flfgrz."
Fcrpvsvpnyyl, ur abgrq fnzr-frk fcbhfrf jbhyq abj unir gur fnzr evtugf nf
fcbhfrf va urgrebfrkhny zneevntrf abg gb grfgvsl ntnvafg gurve fcbhfr va n
pvivy be pevzvany gevny. Fnzr-frk pbhcyrf jvyy or noyr gb svyr onaxehcgpl
wbvagyl. Srqreny cevfbaref jvgu fnzr-frk fcbhfrf jvyy or ryvtvoyr sbe ivfvgf
sebz gurve fcbhfrf, rfpbegrq gevcf gb nggraq gurve fcbhfr'f shareny. Naq
choyvp fnsrgl bssvpref jvgu fnzr-frk fcbhfrf jvyy erprvir gur fnzr orarsvgf nf
gurve urgrebfrkhnyyl zneevrq crref.

Gur znvafgernz zrqvn ercbegrqyl gur arjf jvqryl. UEP Cerfvqrag Punq Tevssva
pnyyrq vg n "ynaqznex naabhaprzrag" gung "jvyy punatr gur yvirf bs pbhagyrff
pbzzvggrq tnl naq yrfovna pbhcyrf sbe gur orggre" naq unf "zber cebsbhaq"
rssrpgf va gur ybat-grez.

Wba Qnivqfba, yrtny qverpgbe sbe Ynzoqn Yrtny, fnlf gur naabhaprzrag vf "dhvgr
fvtavsvpnag."

"Vg vafgehpgf nyy tbireazrag nggbearlf gb erfcrpg nyy zneevntrf bs fnzr-frk
pbhcyrf, ertneqyrff bs gur ynjf bs gurve fgngr bs erfvqrapr gb nethr sbe
erpbtavgvba bs gurve zneevntrf sbe nyy checbfrf," fnlf Qnivqfba.

Ohg Tnel Ohfrpx, yrtny qverpgbe bs Tnl & Yrfovna Nqibpngrf & Qrsraqref, fnlf
gur "fhofgnapr" bs gur naabhaprzrag jnf yrff vzcerffvir. Znal bs gur orarsvgf
gbhgrq nf cneg bs gur arj cbyvpl jrer nyernql va cynpr "naq gur bgure vgrzf
ner tbbq ohg pregnvayl abg sne-ernpuvat."

Juvyr gurer vf vzcbegnag "flzobyvfz" va gur naabhaprzrag, fnvq Ohfrpx,
"onaxehcgpl jnf n qbar qrny frireny lrnef ntb; naq gur bgure vgrzf ner tbbq
ohg pregnvayl abg sne-ernpuvat."

Va Whar 2011, gur ynetrfg srqreny onaxehcgpl pbheg va gur Havgrq Fgngrf ehyrq
va er Onynf gung QBZN ivbyngrf gur rdhny cebgrpgvba thnenagrr bs gur H.F.
Pbafgvghgvba. Va n fgebatyl jbeqrq qrpvfvba, gur 20 whqtrf cnegvpvcngvat va
gur qrpvfvba ehyrq hanavzbhfyl "gurer vf ab inyvq tbireazragny onfvf sbe
QBZN." Ol gura, Ubyqre unq nyernql nqivfrq gur pbhegf gung gur QBW jbhyq abg
qrsraq QBZN, naq Ubhfr Fcrnxre Wbua Obruare qrpvqrq abg gb nccrny gur
qrpvfvba.

"Vg frrzf yvxr Ubyqre vf fcvaavat vg nf uvf ntrapl - QBW - pbzvat ba obneq
jvgu erfcrpg sbe bhe zneevrq pbhcyrf naq nqbcgvat n cynpr bs pryroengvba
ehyr," fnvq Ohfrpx. "V qvqa'g vzzrqvngryl frr vg nf n ovt qrny gung QBW jnf
fbzrubj bssvpvnyyl pbzvat ba obneq jvgu gur trareny geraq cbfg-Jvaqfbe. Ohg
creuncf V nz abg tvivat gurz rabhtu perqvg."

Va uvf bgure erznexf Fngheqnl avtug, Ubyqre gbyq gur Uhzna Evtugf Pnzcnvta
shaqenvfre nhqvrapr va Arj Lbex Pvgl, gung ur guvaxf gur fgehttyr sbe YTOG
pvivy evtugf unf ernpurq "n arj sebagvre va gur svtug sbe pvivy evtugf."

"Guvf vf ab gvzr gb erfg ba bhe ynheryf," fnvq Ubyqre. "Guvf vf ab gvzr gb
onpx qbja, gb tvir hc, be gb tvir va gb gur hawhfg naq hardhny fgnghf dhb.
Arvgure genqvgvba abe srne bs punatr pna nofbyir hf bs gur boyvtngvba jr funer
gb pbzong qvfpevzvangvba va nyy vgf sbezf. Naq, qrfcvgr rirelguvat gung'f orra
npuvrirq, rnpu bs hf unf zhpu zber jbex gb qb."

_ol Xnera Ybrjl, Ynzoqn Yrtny

__2014-02-19

_

  
D: Zl cnegare naq V unir orra gbtrgure sbe zber guna 30 lrnef, naq nf jr
nqinapr va ntr, jr'er jbaqrevat: Jvyy jr or noyr gb trg rnpu bgure'f Fbpvny
Frphevgl orarsvgf vs bar bs hf yvirf ybatre guna gur bgure?

N: Nf bhe pbzzhavgl ntrf, nqqvgvbany pbapreaf znl nevfr jvgu ertneqf gb
qvfpevzvangvba orpnhfr jr ner tnl, yrfovna, ovfrkhny be genaftraqre.
Uvfgbevpnyyl, YTOG fravbe pvgvmraf unir orra cnegvphyneyl ihyarenoyr jura vg
pbzrf gb rkrepvfvat gurve evtug gb srqreny orarsvgf yvxr Fbpvny Frphevgl,
juvpu ner cnegyl gvrq gb jurgure gur tbireazrag erpbtavmrf lbh nf fcbhfrf.

Gur qrzvfr bs QBZN znexf n gheavat cbvag va bs gur novyvgl bs zneevrq fnzr-frk
pbhcyrf gb npprff Fbpvny Frphevgl ergverzrag naq fheivibe'f orarsvgf. Nygubhtu
gur Fbpvny Frphevgl Nqzvavfgengvba ( FFN ) vf fgvyy jbexvat bhg gur shyy fpbcr
bs cebgrpgvbaf ninvynoyr gb pynvznagf jvgu fnzr-frk fcbhfrf, fbzr cebgrpgvbaf
ner pyrne. Sbe rknzcyr, FFN vf nyernql cebprffvat pynvzf sbe ergverzrag
orarsvgf, yhzc fhz qrngu orarsvgf, naq fcbhfny fheivibe orarsvgf sbe pbhcyrf
jub jrer inyvqyl zneevrq naq jub yvir va n fgngr gung erfcrpgf gurve zneevntr.

FFN pbagvahrf gb jbex jvgu gur Qrcnegzrag bs Whfgvpr gb qrgrezvar ubj vg jvyy
gerng pynvzf ol zneevrq pynvznagf jub yvir va n fgngr gung qbrf abg erfcrpg
gurve zneevntr be ol pynvznagf jub unir n pvivy havba be ertvfgrerq qbzrfgvp
cnegarefuvc, nzbat bgure vffhrf. Va gur zrnagvzr, FFN fgebatyl rapbhentrf
nalbar jub guvaxf gurl zvtug zrrg gur ryvtvovyvgl erdhverzragf sbe fcbhfny
orarsvgf gb tb nurnq naq nccyl ertneqyrff bs jurer gurl yvir. Gurer vf ab
cranygl sbe nccylvat, rira vs FFN yngre qrgrezvarf gung lbh ner abg ryvtvoyr,
naq nccylvat abj fgnegf gur pybpx sebz juvpu cbgragvny orarsvgf jvyy ortva vs
gurl ner tenagrq. FFN unf frg hc n fcrpvny frpgvba bs vgf jrofvgr gb nqqerff
cbfg-QBZN dhrfgvbaf, juvpu lbh pna svaq urer.

Sbe genaftraqre fcbhfrf, FFN unf na hasbeghangr cbyvpl bs ersreevat nyy pynvzf
sbe fcbhfny orarsvgf gb vgf ertvbany pbhafry bssvprf sbe erivrj. Guvf cbyvpl
bsgra erfhygf va haarprffnel qrynlf naq reebef nf gur pbhafry'f bssvpr
rinyhngrf gur inyvqvgl bs gur zneevntr. Ynzoqn Yrtny'f Genaftraqre Evtugf
Cebwrpg svyrq fhvg ba orunys bs Ebovan Nfgv, n 92-lrne-byq genaftraqre jbzna
jub jnf qravrq fheivibe orarsvgf ol FFN nsgre ure uhfonaq'f qrngu. Gur ntrapl
qravrq ure orarsvgf nsgre vg qrgrezvarq gung fur jnf "yrtnyyl znyr" ng gur
gvzr bs gurve zneevntr qrfcvgr ure guerr qrpnqrf bs yvivat nf n jbzna naq nyy
gur yrtny qbphzragf gb gur pbagenel. Jngpu n zbivat ivqrb gung gryyf Ebovan'f

phfgbql sbyybjvat n fgnaqbss gung xrcg Abegu Ynxr Fuber Qevir fuhg qbja ng
Shyyregba Nirahr sbe zber guna rvtug ubhef. Urer'f gur rneyvre fgbel: _

  
(NC) -- Cbyvpr va Puvpntb fheebhaqrq n iruvpyr gung penfurq ba gur pvgl'f Ynxr
Fuber Qevir ba Fhaqnl nsgre n punfr gung nhgubevgvrf fnvq vaibyirq n Trbetvn
zna jnagrq sbe zheqre.

Gur punfr pybfrq frpgvbaf bs Abegu Ynxr Fuber Qevir arne Shyyregba Nirahr sbe
ubhef, fgnegvat ng nebhaq 1 c.z. Fhaqnl.

Gur fgnaqbss fgvyy unq abg raqrq nf bs 9 c.z.

(Pyvpx urer sbe batbvat pbirevat sebz gur ** [ Puvpntb Fha-Gvzrf ][9] ** naq
gur ** [ Puvpntb Gevohar. ][10] ** )

Gur vapvqrag pnhfrq znwbe genssvp ceboyrzf ba Ynxr Fuber Qevir, jvgu bssvpref
univat gb pybfr frpgvbaf bs gur ebnq sbe ubhef. Zbgbevfgf jrer qviregrq jryy
njnl sebz gur fprar. Wbttref, jnyxref naq plpyvfgf nybat gur ynxrsebag nyfb
jrer ghearq njnl.

Bssvpref nebhaq gur iruvpyr jrer urnivyl nezrq, nppbeqvat gb gur Puvpntb Fha-
Gvzrf. Gurl fcbxr gb gur zna vafvqr gur sbhe-qbbe pne jvgu gvagrq jvaqbjf
guebhtu n ybhqfcrnxre, nfxvat uvz gb fubj uvf unaqf be chg gurz hc. Gurl nyfb
nfxrq uvz gb cvpx hc n cubar gung jnf nccneragyl vafvqr gur pne, fb ur pbhyq
gnyx gb gurz.

Yngre, nppbeqvat gb gur arjfcncre, bssvpref nfxrq gur zna gb guebj n xavsr bhg
bs gur pne. Vg'f abg pyrne vs ur qvq.

** PUNFR ORTNA 20 ZVYRF NJNL **

Gur punfr, juvpu ortna va gur Puvpntb fhoheo bs Uneirl, nobhg 20 zvyrf njnl,
jnf gur erfhyg bs na vairfgvtngvba vaibyivat Uneirl cbyvpr naq cbyvpr va Urael
Pbhagl, Tn., fnvq Uneirl Cbyvpr Qrcnegzrag fcbxrfjbzna Fnaqen Nyinenqb va n
arjf eryrnfr.

Fur fnvq nhgubevgvrf va Trbetvn erdhrfgrq uryc ba Fhaqnl nsgreabba naq Uneirl
cbyvpr jrer cebivqrq n qrfpevcgvba bs gur iruvpyr, ertvfgengvba, TCF ybpngvba
naq n inyvq neerfg jneenag. Fur fnvq gur zna jnf jnagrq va pbaarpgvba jvgu n
zheqre rneyvre guvf zbagu va Unzcgba, Tn., juvpu vf ebhtuyl 30 zvyrf sebz
Ngynagn.

Pnyyf gung Gur Nffbpvngrq Cerff znqr gb nhgubevgvrf va Urael Pbhagl, Tn., jrag
hanafjrerq Fhaqnl.

Gur iruvpyr va dhrfgvba jnf ybpngrq fubegyl nsgre naq "syrq sebz bssvpref,"
nppbeqvat gb Nyinenqb, pebffvat frireny vagrefgngrf naq raqvat va gur fgnaqbss
ba gur urnivyl geniryrq ebnqjnl nybat Ynxr Zvpuvtna.

Puvpntb cbyvpr qrrzrq vg na "npgvir oneevpnqr fvghngvba" ba Fhaqnl. Vyyvabvf
Fgngr Cbyvpr nyfb pnyyrq vg na "npgvir" fprar.

Gur fgnaqbss jnf gnxvat cynpr ba gur pvgl'f Abegu Fvqr abg sne sebz ynxrfvqr

Puvpntb Cbyvpr Fhcrevagraqrag Tneel S. ZpPnegul naabhapvat srqreny pevzvany
punetrf ntnvafg nyyrtrq yrnqref bs n Puvpntb tnat sbe ratntvat va n frevrf bs

#####  Negvpyr Rkgenf

![Fgbel Vzntr][4]

Hcqngrq:  Znepu 19, 2014 2:19NZ

  
  

Puvpntb Cbyvpr Fhcg. Tneel ZpPnegul fnvq Ghrfqnl gung gur pvgl’f fgengrtl gb
erqhpr tnat ivbyrapr vf “pyrneyl gnxvat ebbg,” cbvagvat gb n znwbe qrpernfr va
tnat-eryngrq fubbgvatf.

Gubfr glcrf bs fubbgvatf unir snyyra funecyl bire gur rneyl zbaguf bs guvf
lrne pbzcnerq jvgu gur fnzr crevbq bs 2013, nppbeqvat gb gur qrcnegzrag.

Gurl abj ercerfrag yrff guna unys bs gur gbgny ahzore bs fubbgvat vapvqragf va
Puvpntb.

“Vg’f abg na nppvqrag, vg’f abg gur jrngure — vg’f n geraq,” gur
fhcrevagraqrag fnvq va na vagreivrj.

ZpPnegul fnvq cbyvpr bssvpvnyf sebz bgure pvgvrf unir orra pbzvat gb Puvpntb
gb yrnea nobhg uvf tnat ivbyrapr erqhpgvba fgengrtl ynhapurq nobhg n lrne ntb.

Onygvzber’f gbc pbc pnzr gb Puvpntb sbe n ybbx naq frag uvf pbzznaqref gb
bofreir bar bs ZpPnegul’f PbzcFgng zrrgvatf — va juvpu cbyvpr fhcreivfbef ner
dhvmmrq nobhg jung gurl’er qbvat gb pbzong pevzr ceboyrzf va gurve
whevfqvpgvbaf.

“Onygvzber vf chggvat n ybg bs rssbeg vagb ercyvpngvat jung jr’er qbvat,”
ZpPnegul fnvq.

ZpPnegul’f fgengrtl eryvrf ba “tnat nhqvgf” gung cebivqr hcqngrq vasbezngvba
ba Puvpntb’f 600 tnat snpgvbaf naq gurve zrzoref. Nsgre n fubbgvat, pbzznaqref
va gur pvgl’f 22 cbyvpr qvfgevpgf erprvir vagryyvtrapr ercbegf ba gur tnatf
vaibyirq naq zbovyvmr gurve bssvpref gb cerirag ergnyvngvba.

“Nyzbfg bhe ragver sbphf vf fgbccvat gur arkg fubbgvat,” ZpPnegul fnvq.

Cneg bs gur fgengrtl vaibyirf “phfgbz abgvsvpngvbaf” va juvpu pbzznaqref xabpx
ba gur qbbef bs crbcyr ng evfx bs trggvat vaibyirq va n fubbgvat naq jnea gurz
abg gb cvpx hc n tha. Va ghea, gurl’er tvira bcgvbaf nobhg wbo genvavat naq
bgure fbpvny freivprf.

“Gurer jrer fubbgvatf bire gur jrrxraq va gur 4gu Qvfgevpg,” ZpPnegul
rkcynvarq. “Gbqnl, jr ner jbexvat ba jub jr jvyy zrrg gbzbeebj gb fgbc guvf
ubg pbasyvpg.”

Guvf lrne guebhtu Znepu 14, gurer jrer 188 “fubbgvat vapvqragf” va Puvpntb, 90
bs juvpu jrer tnat-eryngrq — be yrff guna unys, ZpPnegul fnvq.

Bire gur fnzr crevbq bs 2013, gurer jrer 267 fubbgvat vapvqragf naq 163 jrer
tnat-eryngrq — zber guna 60 creprag bs gurz.

Bire gur fnzr crevbq bs 2012, gurer jrer 343 fubbgvat vapvqragf, 223 bs juvpu
jrer tnat-eryngrq — zber guna 65 creprag bs gurz.

Naq bire gur fnzr crevbq bs 2011, gurer jrer 264 fubbgvat vapvqragf, 147 bs
juvpu jrer tnat-eryngrq — nobhg 56 creprag bs gurz.

Gur qrcnegzrag pbhagf “fubbgvat vapvqragf” nf sngny naq abasngny fubbgvatf
vaibyivat fbzrbar trggvat fubg — naq rnpu vapvqrag pna vapyhqr bar be zber
ivpgvzf, nppbeqvat gb n cbyvpr fcbxrfzna.

ZpPnegul fnvq eboorevrf ner gur frpbaq ovttrfg pngrtbel bs fubbgvatf orfvqrf
tnat-eryngrq barf. Uvf pbzznaqref unir orra sbphfvat ba ceriragvat ubyqhcf gb
erqhpr gubfr fubbgvatf, ur fnvq. Cbyvpr qb fb ol sbphfvat ba cnggreaf bs nezrq
eboorevrf.

Bgure glcrf bs fubbgvatf, fhpu nf gubfr fgrzzvat sebz enaqbz qvfchgrf, ner
zber qvssvphyg gb cerirag, gur fhcrevagraqrag fnvq.

“Va Ratyrjbbq, fbzr thlf gevrq gb onetr vagb n cnegl [Fngheqnl] . . . naq
fbzrbar sverq n fubg guebhtu n jvaqbj naq xvyyrq n thl. Ubj qb lbh cerirag
gung?” ZpPnegul fnvq Ghrfqnl.

Gur fhcrevagraqrag rzcunfvmrq gung ur punatrq gur jnl gur qrcnegzrag pbhagf
fubbgvatf, juvpu ur fnlf vf tvivat n zber npphengr cvpgher bs jung vf
unccravat.

Nyy fubbgvatf ner abj pynffvsvrq nf “fubbgvat vapvqragf.”

Va gur cnfg, fubbgvatf jrer pynffvsvrq nf ntteningrq onggrevrf jvgu n svernez
hayrff gurl vaibyirq nabgure pevzr yvxr eboorel be zheqre, juvpu vf ubj gurl
jbhyq gura or pynffvsvrq.

“Lbh unir gb zrnfher jung’f tbvat ba gb cerirag gur arkg bar,” ZpPnegul fnvq,
nqqvat: “Ol sbphfvat ba erqhpvat thafubgf, jr pna erqhpr gur zheqref.”

Nppbeqvat gb gur qrcnegzrag, gurer jrer srjre zheqref fb sne guvf lrne guna
bire gur fnzr crevbqf bs 2013 naq 2012.

Gurer jrer 49 zheqref guvf lrne guebhtu Znepu 13 pbzcnerq jvgu 58 bire gur
fnzr crevbq bs 2013 — n arneyl 16 creprag qrpernfr.

Vg’f n fgnex punatr sebz rneyl 2012, jura zheqref fxlebpxrgrq, cebzcgvat
urnqyvarf npebff gur pbhagel oenaqvat Puvpntb gur zheqre pncvgny bs gur Havgrq
Fgngrf. Gurer jrer 80 zheqref gung lrne guebhtu Znepu 13 — 17 zber zheqref
guna bire gur fnzr crevbq bs 2011.

N lbhat zna jnf fubg naq xvyyrq ol cbyvpr ba gur Fbhgu Fvqr Fngheqnl zbeavat.

Juvyr snzvyl zrzoref fnvq nyy gur zna qvq jnf eha sebz cbyvpr, nhgubevgvrf
fnvq ur unq chyyrq bhg n tha sbyybjvat n sbbg punfr nsgre bssvpref fnj uvz va
n “unaq-gb-unaq” qeht rkpunatr.

Vaqrcraqrag Cbyvpr Erivrj Nhgubevgl fcbxrfzna Yneel Zreevgg pbasvezrq gur
sngny bssvpre-vaibyirq fubbgvat, naq fnvq uvf qrcnegzrag jnf abgvsvrq nobhg
9:30 n.z.

Gur zna jnf fubg va gur 6200 oybpx bs Fbhgu Eubqrf Nirahr naq cebabhaprq qrnq
ng gur fprar, nppbeqvat gb gur Pbbx Pbhagl Zrqvpny Rknzvare’f bssvpr.

Snzvyl zrzoref vqragvsvrq gur qrnq zna nf 20-lrne-byq Ennfba Funj naq fnvq ur
jnf jnagrq ba n jneenag sbe zvffvat n pbheg nccrnenapr ba n zvfqrzrnabe
pevzvany gerfcnff punetr.

“Gurl fubg zl oebgure. Ur jnf tbvat gb gur snzvyl ubhfr naq gurl fubg uvz,”
Fureeryy Uneevf fnvq fgnaqvat bhgfvqr va gur pbyq. “Gurl fubg gb xvyy.”

Enrxjba Uneevf, Funj’f pbhfva, fnvq Funj fnj cbyvpr naq ena, naq jnf svefg
Gnfrerq ol cbyvpr.

Enrxjba Uneevf fnvq na bssvpre gura gbbx bhg n tha naq yrg bss frireny fubgf.

“V chyyrq vagb gur nyyrl naq gur bssvpre jnf va gur onpxlneq fgnaqvat bire uvz
jvgu uvf tha qbja. Ur [Funj] jnf snpr qbja. Fb jura V tbg gurer ur fnvq, ‘Trg
onpx. Trg onpx. V jvyy fubbg.’ V’z yvxr, ‘Lbh tbaan fubbg? Lbh whfg fubg uvz.
Lbh tbaan fubbg fbzrobql ryfr?’”

Enrxjba Uneevf fnvq uvf pbhfva jnf fubg va gur onpx.

“Ur unq n jneenag bhg ohg vg nva’g jbegu trggvat fubg sbe,” Enrxjba Uneevf
fnvq. “Gung qba’g tvir gurz ab evtug gb fubbg uvz.”

Snzvyl zrzoref fnvq Funj jbexrq va pbafgehpgvba. Funj’f tenaqzbgure pevrq arne
63eq naq Eubqrf fpernzvat, “V whfg jnag gb frr zl onol.”

Cbyvpr oybpxrq bss 63eq Fgerrg sbe ng yrnfg svir oybpxf nf uhaqerqf fgbbq ba
gur fgerrg sbe arneyl guerr ubhef, qrznaqvat nafjref.

Ng yrnfg gjb qbmra bssvpref yvarq gur fgerrg. Cbyvpr qvfcrefrq gur pebjq
nebhaq abba.

**ONYV, Vaqbarfvn (NC) —** Na Nzrevpna zna punetrq jvgu zheqrevat uvf tveysevraq
'f zbgure gbyq na Vaqbarfvna pbheg Guhefqnl ur jnf natel nsgre gur ivpgvz guerng
rarq gb xvyy uvf haobea onol naq fgenatyrq uvz uneq sbe nobhg unys n zvahgr.

Gbzzl Fpunrsre, 21, naq Urngure Znpx, 19, ner orvat gevrq frcnengryl ol
Qracnfne Qvfgevpg Pbheg, jurer gurl ner punetrq jvgu cerzrqvgngrq zheqre sbe
gur qrngu bs Furvyn iba Jvrfr-Znpx ynfg Nhthfg va Onyv. Gurl pbhyq snpr n

Grfgvslvat ng gur gevny bs Znpx, Fpunrsre gbyq gur pbheg gurve eryngvbafuvc
jnf abg raqbefrq ol uvf tveysevraq'f zbgure.

Fpunrsre fnvq ur ivfvgrq Onyv gb zrrg jvgu Znpx jub jnf nyernql va Onyv.

Nsgre zrrgvat jvgu Znpx ng gur ubgry, gurl qvfphffrq ubj gb vasbez iba Jvrfr-

naq ure zbgure jrer fgnlvat.

Fcrnxvat guebhtu na vagrecergre, Fpunrsre fnvq Znpx nfxrq uvz gb oevat n zrgny
sehvg objy, juvpu ur uvq haqre uvf fuveg nf n "cerpnhgvba."

Nfxrq ol n whqtr jul vg jnf uvqqra, Fpunrsre nafjrerq gung ur jnf abg fher
jurgure ur jbhyq hfr vg be abg gb cebgrpg uvzfrys.

Nppbeqvat gb Fpunrsre, ur neevirq va gur ebbz naq sbhaq Znpx jrrcvat. Ur qvq
abg xabj jul, ohg nyfb fnj gung Znpx'f zbgure jnf fpernzvat.

"Fur (iba Jvrfr-Znpx) jnf natel ng zr jura fur xarj gung Urngure jnf
certanag," Fpunrsre fnvq, juvyr gelvat gb ubyq onpx grnef. Znpx, jub jnf
fvggvat orfvqr ure ynjlre, fboorq ng gur grfgvzbal.

Ur fnvq gung gur ivpgvz vafhygrq uvz hfvat n enpvny fyhe naq qrfpevorq ure
qnhtugre nf n cebfgvghgr jub yvxrq n oynpx zna.

Ur fnvq gur fvghngvba tbg urngrq jura iba Jvrfr-Znpx nfxrq ure qnhtugre sbe na
nobegvba be gb xvyy gur haobea onol. Fpunrsre fnvq gung yrq gb n dhneery va
juvpu iba Jvrfr-Znpx fgenatyrq uvz uneq sbe nobhg 30 frpbaqf.

"V jnf natel, V gbbx gur sehvg objy naq uvg ure," Fpunrsre fnvq, va grnef.

Ur nqqrq gung ur qvq abg erzrzore ubj znal gvzrf ur uvg gur ivpgvz. Nsgre
npxabjyrqtvat fur jnfa'g oernguvat, ur gevrq gb tvir ure negvsvpvny
erfcvengvba, juvyr Znpx, jub unq eha va cnavp vagb gur onguebbz sbe nobhg
guerr zvahgrf, pnzr onpx naq gevrq gb erivir ure zbgure.

Ur fnvq ur jnf gerzoyvat naq fpnerq naq pnyyrq 911 ba uvf zbovyr cubar orsber
ernyvmvat gung ur jnf abg va gur Havgrq Fgngrf.

Nppbeqvat gb gur vaqvpgzrag, Fpunrsre onggrerq iba Jvrfr-Znpx jvgu gur zrgny

V qvq n fznyy cvrpr ba gur hcpbzvat ehabss orgjrra vaphzorag Puvpntb Znlbe

Gur bowrpg bs gung cvrpr jnf gb fhzznevmr gur Sroehnel 24, 2015 znlbeny

Yvivat bhgfvqr gur pvgl yvzvgf, V unir ab qbt va gung svtug.  Zl bayl pbzzrag

Abguvat bs pbafrdhrapr, abguvat gb juvpu V tnir n ybg bs gubhtug.  Gur

Vg'f orra fnvq gung gehgu vf gur svefg pnfhnygl bs jne.  Jura vg pbzrf gb

Vaare pvgl ivbyrapr vf n flzcgbz bs cbiregl, ynpx bs bccbeghavgl naq gur glcr

Puvpntb'f svanaprf jvyy cynl n znwbe cneg va gur gjb erznvavat qrongrf orgjrra

Puvpntb'f nobhg $60 Ovyyvba va qrog, jvgu nobhg unys bs gung orvat hashaqrq.

Zl ceboyrz jvgu Pbzzvffvbare Tnepvn vf gung ur frrzf gb ehaavat ba n cyngsbez

CHICAGO (Sun-Times Media Wire) - Illinois State Police are investigating a report of shots fired Monday afternoon on the Eisenhower Expressway on the West Side.

Someone reported shots fired on I-290 at Kedzie Avenue at 1:22 p.m., state police said.

No victims have been located, state police said.

Lane closures are possible during the investigation. ISP would not confirm media reports that the inbound Eisenhower was closed down between California and Independence.
column5: State police investigate report of shots fired on Eisenhower

column4:
Police are warning North Side residents after seven vehicular hijackings were reported on Friday.

The cars were either stolen at gunpoint or while the cars were left running, unlocked and unoccupied, according to an alert from Area North detectives.

The hijackings occurred:

  • about 9:45 a.m. in the 800 block of North Michigan Avenue;
  • about 10:20 a.m. in the 1700 block of West Wabansia;
  • about 11:20 a.m. in the 700 block of West Hubbard;
  • about 2:45 p.m. in the 3500 block of North Clark;
  • about 6:45 p.m. in the 1900 block of North Lincoln;
  • about 7:05 p.m. in the 700 block of North Armour; and
  • about 9:05 p.m. in the 1300 block of North Bosworth.

The suspects were described as black males wearing all dark clothing or a black and gray hooded sweatshirt, police said.

Anyone with information on the hijackings is asked to contact Area North detectives at (312) 744-8263.
column5: Police warn of North Side carjackings | Chicago Sun-Times

column4:
CHICAGO (WLS) --
A 16-year-old girl has been charged in robbing two women while riding on a CTA Pink Line train earlier this month, Chicago police said.

On May 4 at about 1:30 p.m., police said the suspect approached a 19-year-old woman, grabbed a cell phone from the victim's hands and fled the scene.

The suspect robbed a second woman on May 8 at about 9:20 p.m., police said. The 20-year-old victim was exiting the train when the suspect took the victim's cell phone, struck her and sprayed her with pepper spray before fleeing the scene, police said.

The suspect was taken into custody on Monday and spat on an officer during processing, police said. She has been charged with two counts of armed robbery and one count of aggravated battery of a peace officer.
column5: Girl, 16, charged in CTA Pink Line robberies

column4:
OAK LAWN -- People rallied against animal cruelty in the southwest suburbs Sunday after a man threw two toy poodles off the roof of a parking garage at Advocate Christ Hospital.

One of the dogs died, the other was severely injured. The owner of the poodles spoke at the rally.

Two counts of animal cruelty were filed against 22-year-old Oak Lawn resident Edward Hanania, a convicted felon. Officials say after the poodles became lost, Hanania responded to a Facebook ad seeking the rightful owner, claimed the dogs, and eventually took them to the hospital and flung them off the roof.

In court, prosecutors said the incident was captured by a hospital surveillance camera.
column5: Residents rally after dogs thrown from parking garage in Oak Lawn

column4:
LINCOLNWOOD, Ill. -- The Latest on charges filed against teenager in death of Uber driver. (all times local):

Prosecutors say a teenage girl used a stolen machete and a knife during a fatal attack on a suburban Chicago Uber driver.

Eliza Wasni is charged as an adult with first-degree murder in the death of Grant Nelson of Wilmette. A Cook County judge on Wednesday ordered the 16-year-old Wasni of Chicago held without bond.

Assistant State's Attorney Michelle Cunningham says the 34-year-old Nelson picked up the girl near a Walmart in Skokie, from which she stole the machete. Within minutes, she was attacking Nelson. He managed to stop his car and run into a condominium building lobby where he sought help.

Cunningham says Wasni drove off in Nelson's car, struck a median and then ran off. She was apprehended moments later after removing a bloody shirt.

Authorities say Nelson was able to describe his attacker to police before dying at a nearby hospital.

A public defender would only say Wasni attended a Chicago high school and lives with a single mother.

___

1:26 p.m.

Authorities say a 16-year-old girl has been charged as an adult with first-degree murder and accused of stabbing her Uber driver to death in suburban Chicago.

Lincolnwood police say they responded to a report of a man screaming for help at about 3:20 a.m. Tuesday when they found 34-year-old Grant Nelson of Wilmette with multiple stab wounds. They say Nelson told them he was a driver for the ride-sharing service Uber and that his passenger stabbed him. Police say they located Eliza Wasni near the crime scene in possession of two weapons they believe she used in the stabbing.

Nelson died later at a nearby hospital. The Cook County state's attorney's office says Wasni is scheduled to appear in bond court Wednesday afternoon in Skokie.
column5: The Latest: Girl charged with fatally stabbing Uber driver

column4:
After an NBC 5 Investigation revealed details about a website sharing nude photos of high school graduates, one alleged victim has come forward saying her photo was shared to the site years ago –showing her as an underage student.

Twenty-five-year-old Stephanie watched the recent NBC 5 investigation about users on trading nude images on the anonymous website, but as she learned more, she said her stomach sank.

“It scared me to know that something that happened (to me) four years ago has spread,” Stephanie said.

NBC 5 Investigates discovered online threads on the site, Anon-IB, listing at least 67 high schools in Illinois and the Chicago area , where members ask for women’s photos by name and graduating class. The threads appeared to go back to at least 2014.

  • Teen Girl Charged After Uber Driver Stabbed in Lincolnwood

But Stephanie, a former student of Homewood-Flossmoor High School, said she found her underage, intimate photos splashed on Anon-IB back in 2013.

“I was either 15 or 16 (when the photos were taken),” said Stephanie. “I sent them to somebody that I confided in, that I went to church with. He went to family events with me.”

Stephanie found the photos three years after she left Homewood-Flossmoor High School. She said her images, along with several other former students, were filed under a thread for her high school.

  • See Inside: Cutler, Cavallari List Lake Forest Mansion

“I saw quite a few girls that I knew or I went to class with. It was just very embarrassing,” Stephanie said.

Stephanie said she notified the other women, then contacted the Homewood Police Department, only to be “victim-shamed.”

“I’m bawling my eyes out, and they’re just screaming at me for something I had no control over,” Stephanie said. “(Homewood Police) told me I couldn’t press charges. That if I did, the state was going to prosecute me for distributing child pornography.”

  • 'Covfefe': Trump Lights Up Internet With Late-Night Tweet

This response is not at all surprising to veteran Naperville police Detective Rich Wistocki.

“We need to train our police officers,” Wistocki said.

According to the detective, many law enforcement officers don’t know how to properly investigate cyber-crimes.

  • Trump Family Slams Kathy Griffin as 'Sick,' 'Disturbing'

“We have to have (police) sensitive to these kids who are victimized,” said Det. Wistocki, who also runs a firm that specializes in cyber training for police, parents and kids called Be Sure Consulting . “Law enforcement needs to be taking those reports and acting appropriately to stop that assault on our children.”

Wistocki said he is pushing a bill, sponsored by state Sen. Mike Connelly, in the Illinois General Assembly that would require cyber-crime training for new police cadets.

According to Senate Bill 1410, the program would train law enforcement officers to “identify and investigate issues relating to crimes arising out of the use of personal technology devices on social media, internet communication, cell phone applications dealing with child exploitation, sending or receiving of sexually explicit messages, computer tampering, financial fraud, harassment and stalking through electronic means.”

  • Massive Fire Burns for Hours at Iconic Old Joliet Prison

“Crime is changing with the advent of these new technologies,” said Sen. Connelly. “A lot of municipalities and law enforcement agencies in other parts of the state will say, ‘We don’t have this down here. It’s a big city thing,’ when in fact, it’s all over the state. We’re trying to train that next generation of law enforcement personnel to be prepared to investigate and solve these crimes.”

SB 1410 has passed out of the Senate and is pending approval in the House. If the House does not act before Wednesday’s deadline, Sen. Connelly said he hopes to get an extension on the bill to the end of the year. Otherwise, he plans to reintroduce the bill in the future.

Stephanie said Homewood Police missed an opportunity four years ago to make an example of Anon-IB and its perpetrators.

  • Chicago Suburb Named Best City for Living the American Dream

“When I went to the police with this exact website, they just brushed it under the rug, acted like it didn’t even matter,” Stephanie said.

Homewood Police confirmed Stephanie filed a police report with the department in August 2013.

“The Criminal Investigations Unit worked diligently to get the images of (Stephanie), and other classmates she named, removed from Anon-IB website. That was an ongoing process as some images that were deleted, were reposted at a later date,” Homewood Police said in a statement.

  • Tiger Woods Says Prescribed Meds Led to DUI Arrest

Regarding Stephanie’s concerns about the investigation, Homewood Police said “we are always available to discuss and review the case with her and would encourage her to contact us directly.”

Homewood-Flossmoor High school administrators recalled Stephanie’s case.

“Although she reported this several years ago, the assistant principal remembers working with her and recalls the difficulties encountered by the local police department as the website she reported was international in origin,” Superintendent Dr. Von Mansfield said in an emailed statement. “Unfortunately, the case you mentioned was of a former student – who was legally an adult at the time of reporting in 2013 – so that may have limited the legal options available to law enforcement authorities.”

  • Actress Sophia Bush Leaving 'Chicago PD': Report

Mansfield also said the school educates students and holds parent and guardian seminars about the hazards of social media at the beginning of each semester.

“We diligently work with our students to help them understand the dangers of social media and instruct students to never take compromising photos of themselves nor share any private photos with their peers,” he said.

Published 16 minutes ago | Updated 3 minutes ago
column5: Nude Photo Trading Goes Back Years: Victim

column4:
Staff report

Crime Stoppers of Sangamon and Menard Counties is seeking information this week on a burglary at Discount Tobacco in Chatham on Sunday.

Police said the burglar smashed a window and stole several cartons of Newport cigarettes and a small amount of cash from the register shortly after 11 p.m.

Surveillance footage showed the burglar was wearing black shoes with white trim at the bottom and light-colored blue jeans with a pattern on the back pockets. The person also was wearing a dark, hooded sweatshirt over his shirt to conceal his identity, police said.

People with information on this or other crimes can submit tips anonymously by calling Crime Stoppers at 788-8427 or online at www.cashfortips.us. Tips can also be sent by text. Type TIP672 plus a message and send to CRIMES. Informants are eligible for cash rewards of up to $2,500.
column5: Crime Stoppers seeking info on burglary at Chatham tobacco shop

column4:
Friday marks the official start of Chicago’s Civilian Office of Police Accountability , which will be tasked with investigating police shootings and serious allegations of misconduct like excessive force.

The new agency, known by the acronym COPA (pronounced like Copacabana), is the latest effort to change Chicago’s system of disciplining officers, a key concern of activists, experts and the U.S. Department of Justice .

The agency will replace the Independent Police Review Authority (IPRA), which was scrapped amidst the public outcry after the release of a video that showed a Chicago police officer fatally shooting 17-year-old Laquan McDonald .

Here’s a look at how COPA formed and what the change will really mean.

What’s the difference between COPA and IPRA?

Let’s start with what’s the same. COPA will have largely the same mission as IPRA: investigate allegations of police misconduct and recommend discipline. Chief administrator Sharon Fairley will stay on to head COPA, which will have the same offices on the Near West Side.

But when training kicked off in May, Fairley insisted COPA will be different from IPRA.

“We have been in the process of building a new agency from the ground up,” Fairley said. “So everything about the way we operate is going to be different.”

The key difference, officials said, is how COPA is funded compared to its predecessor. The ordinance that created the new agency guaranteed it gets at least one percent of the annual appropriation for the Chicago Police Department. IPRA had no such guaranteed funding.

Unlike IPRA, COPA officials will also be permitted to seek outside legal counsel rather than being forced to rely on the city’s Law Department, which is controlled by the mayor.

The new agency will also be bigger, with a budgeted 100 investigators, compared to about 75 for IPRA. And officials said those investigators will be better trained.

How is the training different?

Every COPA investigator and member had to go through something the agency dubbed “COPA Academy,” a six-week training program on investigative processes, practices, and principles.

Fairley said it was a “much more comprehensive approach to training.”

“IPRA training was, I wouldn’t say, haphazard. But it wasn’t as systematically done,” Fairley said.

She said there will also be a focus on continued training that wasn’t available under her predecessors.

There are also tougher requirements for those employees who will be investigating police shootings. COPA includes a new position, called a major case specialist. Fairley said employees with that job will have to get state training to qualify as “lead homicide investigators.”

Why did city officials decide to dump IPRA?

When IPRA was created in 2007 it was heralded as an answer to complaints about the old police accountability system, the police department’s Office of Professional Standards.

But in the years between its inception and the release of the Laquan McDonald video in November of 2015, IPRA investigated about 400 shootings by police — and found the officers justified in every incident except two.

A WBEZ investigation found that IPRA leadership pressured investigators to reverse findings that went against police, and fired one investigator who refused to do so.

Mayor Rahm Emanuel’s Police Accountability Task Force report called the police accountability system broken, and said Chicago residents feel that police “have no regard for the sanctity of life when it comes to people of color.”

In May of 2016, Emanuel announced his plans to replace IPRA. He said he wanted a more independent civilian investigative agency.

What’s the reaction been to the new police accountability agency?

Police reform advocates scored major victories in the creation of COPA. Emanuel’s original ordinance did not include a funding floor or the freedom to get outside legal counsel — two things that critics said were essential for true independence.

After the final version passed last October, aldermen who are frequent Emanuel opponents applauded him for being willing to compromise.

The then-head of the city’s largest police union criticized the plan, saying the police department needed less citizen involvement, not more.

“If we continue to blanket this profession with multiple layers of civilian involvement that don’t know how this job is supposed to be performed, that’s very dangerous for the law-abiding populations of our inner cities,” said Dean Angelo, the former head of the union that represents the city’s police officers.

In its report, the U.S. Department of Justice struck a tone of cautious optimism about the new agency.

“[COPA] appears to have the potential to be a meaningful improvement over IPRA, but gaps also appear to remain within this entity and through all other components of Chicago’s accountability systems,” the report reads.

Patrick Smith is a WBEZ producer and reporter. Follow him @pksmid

.


  • #COPA
  • #IPRA
  • #police accountability
  • #police investigations
column5: What’s New In How Chicago Investigates Police Shootings? Officials Say Training And Funding

column4:
Chicago aldermen complained Wednesday that Mayor Rahm Emanuel ’s recommended full-year budget for the new police oversight agency falls below the funding floor that was a point of controversy when the office was created last year.

The 2016 ordinance holds that the Civilian Office of Police Accountability budget will be no less than 1 percent of the Police Department’s budget, excluding grant funds. COPA’s recommended 2018 budget is just under $13.3 million, about $1.9 million short of equaling 1 percent of the Police Department’s recommended allotment of about $1.52 billion in nongrant money.

The funding floor was added to the ordinance as Emanuel worked last year to build support for creating the agency. The former police oversight agency, the Independent Police Review Authority , was widely seen as insufficiently resourced for the task of overseeing a 12,000-strong police force plagued by allegations of excessive force and misconduct, and reform advocates voiced concern at the time that a new agency could represent a change in name only.

At COPA’s budget hearing Wednesday, Ald. Scott Waguespack , 32nd, said the City Council had worked “very diligently” on making sure the new agency was fully funded and independent.

“This was not what we agreed to, and … this has to change before we come back and vote on this budget,” he said.

Ald. Raymond Lopez , 15th, told COPA’s interim head, Patricia Banks, that a small amount of money could be significant to an agency with a budget that is tiny compared with the Police Department it oversees.

“Don’t be afraid to ask what you are owed as a department,” he told Banks.

Banks deferred to the Office of Budget and Management for a specific explanation of the numbers, but told aldermen, “At this point in time, I’m not prepared to say that we’re not adequately funded right now.”

Asked by reporters after the hearing whether COPA is being shortchanged, Banks said she didn’t know.

“With reference to the budget issue, again, I’m going to plead new,” she said. “I’m concerned that we as an agency get our fair share of the budget allotment.”

A spokeswoman for the budget office did not offer an immediate response to the aldermen’s concerns.

The new agency was forged in the controversy sparked nearly two years ago by the court-ordered release of video of a white police officer shooting black teen Laquan McDonald 16 times. That scandal drew attention to the many shortcomings of IPRA, which was sluggish and prone to clearing officers, even when compelling evidence suggested wrongdoing.

City officials have touted the new agency’s expanded staff and revamped practices, but COPA got off to a turbulent start in September when news emerged that Chief Administrator Sharon Fairley, who led the construction of the new office, would leave to run for Illinois attorney general. Her departure, made public just 10 days after the agency opened, added to multiple vacancies in the fledgling organization’s top ranks.

Fairley attended Wednesday’s hearing in the gallery of the City Council chambers.

The question of COPA’s leadership has been politically contentious, as reform advocates have said the head of the agency must be insulated from politics. Some 18 months ago, Emanuel's Police Accountability Task Force recommended that the city impanel a community oversight board to monitor law enforcement and pick COPA's leader. Emanuel said he would create the board but yielded to community groups' requests to help design it, his aides have said. Community groups have been working on recommendations, but those have yet to emerge.

In early October, Emanuel announced that he’d named a City Council ally, Ald. Ariel Reboyras , 30th, to co-chair a panel charged with finding a permanent leader, bucking his task force’s recommendation. At the same time, Emanuel named Banks, a retired Cook County judge who once ran the jurisdiction’s elder law division, as interim leader.

During Wednesday’s hearing, Banks noted that she’d only been with the agency a few weeks and referred numerous questions to her staff.

Chicago Tribune’s John Byrne contributed.

dhinkel@chicagotribune.com

Twitter @dhinkel

column5: Aldermen question funding for new Chicago police oversight agency

column4:
With Chicago’s police union calling on its members to pack next week’s City Council meeting to protest officer punishments under Mayor Rahm Emanuel , the mayor said Wednesday he’s playing it “down the middle of the fairway” when it comes to groups on opposite sides of the police reform issue.

Emanuel spoke to reporters the day after the Fraternal Order of Police sent a letter urging all its members to turn up at the May 23 council meeting “to demand that Mayor Rahm Emanuel back the police.” The group argues that recent police officer punishments have been politically motivated and arbitrary.

The planned protest comes as the FOP, whose members are working on an expired labor contract, is seeking a new deal with the city.

The FOP letter cites the high-profile case of Robert Rialmo, whose salary was frozen after the Police Board ruled last month that the December 2015 fatal shootings of Quintonio LeGrier and Bettie Jones were unjustified and he should be fired. It also complains about a city move to fire two officers for what the union terms “bogus claims they lied under oath.”

The union letter also contends Emanuel is “selling officers out in a federal consent decree that would give anti-police groups a voice in police oversight.”

Emanuel last year said he would try to strike an out-of-court agreement on police reform with President Donald Trump’s Justice Department rather than work out a federal consent decree with court oversight. When Illinois Attorney General Lisa Madigan sued the city in August, the mayor agreed to join her in pursuing a police reform agreement that includes court oversight.

In March, Black Lives Matter and a coalition of other community groups that had sued the city to press for the consent decree were given a seat at the table to provide input as the city and Madigan’s office negotiate the decree’s terms. And the groups have been promised meetings with an independent monitor to discuss the city’s compliance.

In addition, the letter hits the city corporation counsel’s office for “settling police misconduct cases that are clearly bogus and should go to trial.”

Emanuel spoke briefly on the union’s planned protest as he left an event at the riverwalk downtown, mentioning the competing calls for stronger policing to fight crime and more oversight of the department to deal with misconduct.

“The way I look at it is you have people on either side of the issue criticizing, and in my view we’re down the middle of the fairway, and we have the right things that are necessary both for public safety needs so we have a proactive Police Department, with the right amount of oversight and accountability and transparency,” he said.

jebyrne@chicagotribune.com

Twitter @_johnbyrne

RELATED

First public hearing on civilian oversight of CPD abruptly breaks up amid protest »

Chicago's deal with ACLU, Black Lives Matter changes political calculus for police reform »

Black Lives Matter, other community groups win seat at table in fight over Chicago police reform »
column5: Emanuel says he's 'playing it down the middle' on police reform as FOP urges members to protest him
